anya-e0103n:806_7: sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti dassetuṃ “sammā vā gato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:806_9: “Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto”ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṃ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:806_10: “Sassataṃ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato”ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:806_11: “Kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato”ti etena ariyamaggagatiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:807_22: Tatiyā nerayikādikassa nerayikādibhāvavibhāvanīkathā yathā “āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko”tiādikā.
anya-e0103n:807_23: Catutthī “vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṃ sugatiṃ āvahatī”ti lokassa byāmohanakathā.
anya-e0103n:807_26: Evaṃ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṃ abhūtādiṃ vajjetvā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato da-
anya-e0103n:807_29: Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṃ piyaṃ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā.
anya-e0103n:808_0: Apica sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugato.
anya-e0103n:808_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ bhaddakaṃ.
anya-e0103n:808_6: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n:808_7: Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
anya-e0103n:808_8: Lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
anya-e0103n:808_9: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
anya-e0103n:808_10: Tathā yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
anya-e0103n:808_11: sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammā paccakkhato gato abbhaññāsīti sugato.
anya-e0103n:809_2: Yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo,
anya-e0103n:809_12: Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo,
anya-e0103n:810_0: Iti “sabbathā lokaṃ avedī”ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṃ suttaṃ dassento “yattha kho āvuso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:810_1: Tattha “na jāyatī”tiādinā ujukaṃ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā “na cavati na upapajjatī”ti padadvayena aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0103n:811_0: Kāmaṃ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṃ ñātuṃ, daṭṭhuṃ,
anya-e0103n:811_2: apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṃ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:811_5: Aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:811_11: desatopi niddisīyati yathā “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
anya-e0103n:812_5: Tasmāti yasmā lokassantaṃ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:812_9: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṃ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū.
anya-e0103n:813_1: Evaṃ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā,
anya-e0103n:813_2: loko pana ekadeseneva vuttoti taṃ anavasesato dassetuṃ “apica tayo lokā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:813_9: santāno ca okāsaloko lokiyanti ettha tasā,
anya-e0103n:813_18: saddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0103n:813_19: Evaṃ hi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti.
anya-e0103n:813_21: na sattadhammoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:814_4: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
anya-e0103n:814_9: na saṅkhāravisayāti āha “sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:815_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
anya-e0103n:815_1: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṃ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
anya-e0103n:815_2: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakaṃ sahassappakāro okāsaloko,
anya-e0103n:816_2: Eko lokoti “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā,
anya-e0103n:816_3: tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n:816_4: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Nāma-
anya-e0103n:816_7: Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
anya-e0103n:816_10: Atha vā “na lujjati na palujjatī”ti yo gahito tathā na hoti,
anya-e0103n:816_11: so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā.
anya-e0103n:817_4: tadanattā”ti vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni.
anya-e0103n:817_8: tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā.
anya-e0103n:817_11: tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha “iti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
anya-e0103n:818_0: Āgamma cittaṃ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya.
anya-e0103n:818_1: Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo,
anya-e0103n:818_2: evaṃ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha seti,
anya-e0103n:821_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā.
anya-e0103n:822_0: Āsayaṃ jānātīti catubbidhampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0103n:823_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti,
anya-e0103n:823_1: kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti”ādi.
anya-e0103n:824_0: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti anusayā,
anya-e0103n:824_3: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n:824_7: Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi.
anya-e0103n:824_8: Taṃ sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0103n:825_6: Taṃ caritaṃ sabhāvato saṃkilesavodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
anya-e0103n:826_10: Indriyānaṃ hi tikkhamudubhāvādinā yathārahaṃ adhimuttiyā tikkhamudubhāvādiko veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:826_11: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodanīyaṃ “heṭṭhā gahitāpi adhimutti idha sattānaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā”ti.
anya-e0103n:827_1: appaṃ vā rajaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi etesanti apparajakkhā,
anya-e0103n:828_10: imassa dosarajo appo”tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:828_12: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti,
anya-e0103n:828_13: tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
anya-e0103n:829_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi.
anya-e0103n:829_1: Tassa pana jānanaṃ na nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:830_0: “Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi ‘taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
anya-e0103n:830_3: yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito,
anya-e0103n:831_3: Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā “cakkavāḷa”nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:832_2: Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho.
anya-e0103n:834_4: dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato yugandharapabbato,
anya-e0103n:834_5: ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:834_7: evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṃ suppatiṭṭhito,
anya-e0103n:834_13: Te vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:835_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā.
anya-e0103n:835_3: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā “sinerussa samantato”ti vuttā.
anya-e0103n:836_1: himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṃ satāni ucco ubbedho.
anya-e0103n:839_2: Tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṃ attano chāyāya vikalabhāvena upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n:839_13: Tiṇṇaṃ hi pattānaṃ aññamaññaāsannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antare ekeko lokantaranirayo.
anya-e0103n:840_4: anantāni cakkavāḷānī”ti tividhampi anantaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ paricchindati sayampi anantattā.
anya-e0103n:840_12: Anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā.
anya-e0103n:840_15: sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṃ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n:841_5: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
anya-e0103n:841_10: visesapaccayānaṃ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca ukkaṃsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa
anya-e0103n:841_12: Tena bhagavā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati,
anya-e0103n:842_6: Taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ satthu vimuttiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattati,
anya-e0103n:842_7: pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ savisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n:842_9: bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā lahuṃ lahuṃ pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n:843_0: Evaṃ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “asamo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:843_1: Tattha asamoti ekasmiṃ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena samā sadisāti asamo.
anya-e0103n:844_0: Na kho panāhaṃ samanupassāmīti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbalokaṃ passantopi tattha sadevake…pe…
anya-e0103n:844_1: pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṃ sampannatarasīlaṃ kañci puggalaṃ na kho pana passāmi,
anya-e0103n:845_2: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā,
anya-e0103n:845_3: tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. Ye,
anya-e0103n:845_7: Agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”ti –
anya-e0103n:847_1: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī,
anya-e0103n:848_0: Evamādīni suttapadāni veditabbāni. Ādikā gāthāyoti ettha –
anya-e0103n:849_0: “Ahaṃ hi arahā loke, ahaṃ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0103n:852_0: Mutto mocayataṃ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varo. ;
anya-e0103n:858_3: Taṃ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṃ yathārahaṃ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti āha “vinetīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:858_10: Tathā hi tiracchānapurisānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0103n:858_22: Vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehīti etasmiṃ atthe vitthāretabbaṃ yathārahaṃ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayassa dīpanato.
anya-e0103n:859_1: paṭhamajjhānalābhino dutiyajjhāna”ntiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari visesaṃ ācikkhantoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:859_3: “Dantepi dametiyevā”ti idaṃ pubbe “sabbena sabbaṃ damathaṃ anupagatā purisadammā”ti vuttāti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:859_4: Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṃ nātivattā,
anya-e0103n:860_4: Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti.
anya-e0103n:860_7: Tā hi aññamaññasambandhāpi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissantīti disā,
anya-e0103n:860_13: Satthārā pana damitā purisadammā ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti.
anya-e0103n:861_4: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko,
anya-e0103n:861_10: Tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ arahati,
anya-e0103n:861_15: Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo so etassa atthīti satthā,
anya-e0103n:861_17: So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā viyāti satthā,
anya-e0103n:862_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ “yathā satthavāho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:862_4: Ruḷhīvasena pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati.
anya-e0103n:862_10: Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṃ upanento tāreti.
anya-e0103n:864_2: Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi,
anya-e0103n:864_4: Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṃ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṃ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n:864_5: Maṇḍūkopi daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi.
anya-e0103n:864_8: tattha kiṃ nu kho kammamakāsi”nti āvajjanā.
anya-e0103n:864_9: Tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha “are ahampi nāma idha nibbatto”ti.
anya-e0103n:865_1: buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātukāmo “ko me vandatī”ti gāthāya pucchi.
anya-e0103n:865_12: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento,
anya-e0103n:865_14: sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti attho.
anya-e0103n:866_0: Evaṃ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṃ pavedento “maṇḍūkohaṃ pure āsi”nti gāthamāha.
anya-e0103n:866_3: “Udake maṇḍūko”ti etena uddhamāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:866_8: Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti “vārigocaro”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:866_9: Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṃ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa.
anya-e0103n:866_11: Avadhi vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresīti attho.
anya-e0103n:867_0: Sitaṃ katvāti “tathā parittatarenāpi puññānubhāvena evaṃ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarā sampattiyo labbhantī”ti
anya-e0103n:867_1: pītisomanassajāto bhāsurataradhavalavipphurantadassanakiraṇāvalīhi bhiyyoso mattāya taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento
anya-e0103n:869_0: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
anya-e0103n:870_0: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
anya-e0103n:871_0: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti. ;
anya-e0103n:873_1: Yaṃ pana kiñcīti ettha yanti aniyamitavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:873_4: Tasmā yaṃ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:873_15: tattha bhavaṃ tasmiṃ laddhe laddhabbato vimokkhantikañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:874_21: Vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti –
anya-e0103n:875_1: Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi,
anya-e0103n:875_2: tasmā dvīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭisambhidānayo vā”ti aniyamattho vā-
anya-e0103n:877_0: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n:877_1: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammānaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n:877_2: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhanīto sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n:877_3: Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n:877_4: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi chahi pariyāyehi niddakkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:877_5: Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṃ buddhiatthatāya buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṃ gatattā buddhoti vuccatīti attho.
anya-e0103n:877_6: Eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho,
anya-e0103n:877_7: atha kho sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho.
anya-e0103n:877_8: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti anatthantaraṃ.
anya-e0103n:877_11: Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṃ paññattīti bodhanatthaṃ vuttanti evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:878_2: Guṇavisiṭṭhasabbasattuttamagarugāravādhivacananti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi
anya-e0103n:878_6: accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamagāravaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0103n:879_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato “seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:880_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṃ “bhagavā”ti idaṃ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato vibhajitukāmo
anya-e0103n:880_1: nāmaṃyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento “catubbidhaṃ vā nāma”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:880_2: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ upādāya paññattaṃ voharitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:880_3: Tathā liṅgikaṃ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:880_17: “Vimokkhantika”nti iminā idaṃ nāmaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:880_19: atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha “saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā”ti.
anya-e0103n:880_20: Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṃ nipphajjamānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi buddhaguṇehi saddhiṃyeva nipphajjati.
anya-e0103n:880_23: Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti.
anya-e0103n:880_25: te satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n:883_11: bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_13: bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_14: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_15: bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ navannaṃ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_16: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇasamāpattīnaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_17: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ
anya-e0103n:883_18: pañcannaṃ balānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:883_19: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānaṃ catunnaṃ vesārajjānaṃ catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ channaṃ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā,
anya-e0103n:884_0: Ettha ca “gāravādhivacana”ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṃ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0103n:884_1: yathārahaṃ pana tesaṃ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni.
anya-e0103n:884_11: suṇantassa ca tadatthaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṃ attharaso.
anya-e0103n:884_18: Channaṃ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:885_1: Yadipi “bhāgyavā”tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho “bhagī bhajī”ti niddesagāthāya saṅgahito eva,
anya-e0103n:885_2: tathāpi padasiddhi atthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṃvaṇṇanānayo tato aññākāroti vuttaṃ “ayaṃ pana aparo nayo”ti.
anya-e0103n:885_6: dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:885_15: itarampi vā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pariyāyato lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ siyā.
anya-e0103n:886_11: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khīlajāto”ti evamāgatāni pañca cetokhīlāni.
anya-e0103n:886_15: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati,
anya-e0103n:886_16: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti āgatā pañca vinibandhā.
anya-e0103n:888_4: Sabbāni sattānaṃ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni abhañjīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:888_5: Ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato ca anantappabhedā kilesāti.
anya-e0103n:888_6: Saṅkhepatoti ettha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena kilesamāraṃ,
anya-e0103n:888_11: āyatiñca sattānaṃ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti kilesamāro.
anya-e0103n:888_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “vadhakaṃ rūpaṃ ‘vadhakaṃ rūpa’nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:888_15: Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti devaputtamāro.
anya-e0103n:888_17: jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā maccu eva māroti maccumāro.
anya-e0103n:889_13: dhammakāyaṃ paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanato upagatānañca tesaṃ āmisadānadhammadānehi upakāritā,
anya-e0103n:889_15: tasmā tumhehipi evameva paṭipajjitabba”nti evaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojanena abhigatānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi saṃyojanasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0103n:890_2: adhiṭṭhāniddhiādiko iddhividhopi cittissariyameva cittabhāvanāya vasībhāvappattiyā ijjhanato.
anya-e0103n:890_4: saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā.
anya-e0103n:890_13: aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā.
anya-e0103n:891_3: Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṃ āruppe uppannānaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā bhagavato guṇe anussarantānaṃ
anya-e0103n:891_8: “Tiṇṇo tāreyya”ntiādinā yaṃ yaṃ etena lokanāthena icchitaṃ manovacīpaṇidhānavasena,
anya-e0103n:892_2: saddena na kevalaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n:892_7: Dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṭṭho taṃsamaṅgino sattassa hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:892_13: Nidānaṭṭho “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:892_16: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā,
anya-e0103n:892_27: Satipi hi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādiṃ avatvā “maggādhipatino dhammā” icceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:892_30: Kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti?
anya-e0103n:894_2: Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṃ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:896_0: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n:897_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
anya-e0103n:898_2: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n:898_3: Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:898_86: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā
anya-e0103n:898_87: anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n:898_88: Tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-
anya-e0103n:901_1: Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi
anya-e0103n:901_17: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā,
anya-e0103n:901_21: evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena ta-
anya-e0103n:901_24: Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari,
anya-e0103n:903_0: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n:904_3: attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ niccakappaṃ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:904_6: khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
anya-e0103n:904_14: “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā,
anya-e0103n:904_15: te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ vasena sevi.
anya-e0103n:904_17: Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā,
anya-e0103n:904_18: “kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi,
anya-e0103n:906_0: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
anya-e0103n:907_1: Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ bhajīyantīti bhagā,
anya-e0103n:907_3: Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi,
anya-e0103n:907_4: yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakārakadhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi.
anya-e0103n:907_5: Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi.
anya-e0103n:907_7: jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiñāṇadassanamaggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādiuttarimanussadhammavasena ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi.
anya-e0103n:908_0: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū;
anya-e0103n:909_0: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n:910_1: Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā.
anya-e0103n:910_11: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno”ti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
anya-e0103n:910_13: Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti,
anya-e0103n:910_14: kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vāti.
anya-e0103n:910_15: Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti,
anya-e0103n:913_6: taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
anya-e0103n:914_0: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:916_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
anya-e0103n:917_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ,
anya-e0103n:917_3: yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n:917_4: Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāle mūgapakkhapaṇḍitakāle cūḷasutasomakāleti
anya-e0103n:917_5: evamādīsu nekkhammapāramipūraṇavasena devarajjasadisāya rajjasiriyā pariccattaattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ natthi.
anya-e0103n:917_7: cakkavattisampattisannissayaṃ sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
anya-e0103n:917_8: tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:917_12: Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti.
anya-e0103n:920_8: sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami.
anya-e0103n:920_9: Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ,
anya-e0103n:920_10: cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ,
anya-e0103n:920_11: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme,
anya-e0103n:920_27: dhammavicāra”ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena chaḍḍayi.
anya-e0103n:921_2: taṃ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:922_1: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena
anya-e0103n:926_0: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
anya-e0103n:928_0: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
anya-e0103n:929_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
anya-e0103n:930_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
anya-e0103n:930_8: Tasmā tesaṃ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṃ “araha”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:931_0: Tattha “araha”nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n:931_9: “Sugato”ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n:931_11: “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n:931_14: Evañca katvā “sammāsambuddho”ti vatvā “buddho”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:931_16: “Bhagavā”ti ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti,
anya-e0103n:932_2: Tattha “arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū”ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0103n:932_3: “Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna”nti imehi sattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0103n:932_6: “Sugato bhagavā”ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:933_5: pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṃ cittaṃ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:933_10: Etasmiṃ pakkhe rāgenāti rāgena hetunāti attho.
anya-e0103n:933_14: Atha vā ujugatamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṃ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṃ.
anya-e0103n:934_1: “So bhagavā itipi araha”ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe anuvitakkayatoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:934_7: Pīti uppajjatīti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati.
anya-e0103n:934_9: Kāyacittadarathāti kāyacittapassaddhīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā.
anya-e0103n:934_11: Anukkamena ekakkhaṇeti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n:934_15: bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṃ paṭukiccāva honti,
anya-e0103n:934_18: passaddhakāyassa samādhipadaṭṭhānaṃ sukhaṃ thirataraṃ hutvā pavattati,
anya-e0103n:934_19: sukhena anubrūhitaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n:934_20: Evaṃ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari paṭupaṭutarabhāvena pavattitvā bhāvanāya majjhimasamathapaṭipattiyā
anya-e0103n:934_21: indriyānañca ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n:935_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti…pe…
anya-e0103n:936_0: Kasmā panettha jhānaṃ appanāpattaṃ na hotīti āha “buddhaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāyā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:936_1: Gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0103n:936_6: bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṃ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n:936_7: Nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti?
anya-e0103n:936_11: Evampi yathā nānappakāresu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu manasikāraṃ pavattentassa ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:936_14: Tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato,
anya-e0103n:936_16: na ayamekasmiṃyeva guṇe ṭhātuṃ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:937_11: Dukkhādhivāsanasamattho buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato.
anya-e0103n:937_13: Buddhabhūmiyaṃ cittaṃ namati buddhaguṇānaṃ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n:937_14: Buddhānussatibhāvanāya sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṃ citte viparivattanato vuttaṃ “sammukhā satthāraṃ passato viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:937_15: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto.
anya-e0103n:938_3: Evaṃ mahānubhāvāyāti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena mahatā sāmatthiyena samannāgatāya.
anya-e0103n:940_2: sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanāvidhānameva dassetuṃ “dhammānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmenāpī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:940_3: Kasmā panettha buddhānussatiyaṃ viya “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:940_4: Nanu etā paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṃ vasena desanaṃ āruḷhāti?
anya-e0103n:940_6: evaṃ santepi “parisuddhasīlādiguṇānaṃ puthujjanānampi ijjhantī”ti dassanatthaṃ “aveccappasādasamannāgatenā”ti idha na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:940_8: Tathāpi pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:941_4: Lokuttaradhammovāti avadhāraṇaṃ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:941_6: Tathā hi pariyattidhammo bahussutena āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0103n:941_10: “Sandiṭṭhiyā jayatī”ti ayaṃ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati,
anya-e0103n:941_17: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
anya-e0103n:941_19: saupādānāya saṃvattanti no anupādānāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami,
anya-e0103n:941_26: pageva adhammā”ti ca evamādīhi suttapadehi vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n:941_29: Tato eva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi attano citte upanayanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:941_30: cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
anya-e0103n:941_33: Evaṃ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi pakkhipitvā manasikāro yujjateva.
anya-e0103n:942_3: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi,
anya-e0103n:942_4: yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu “gāthā”ti samaññā,
anya-e0103n:942_5: taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāraṃ āropetvā dassento “paṭhamena pādena ādikalyāṇā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:942_6: “Ekānusandhika”nti idaṃ nātibahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:942_7: itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhantīti.
anya-e0103n:943_0: Ayaṃ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṃvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n:943_1: idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṃ vasena taṃ dassetuṃ “sanidānasauppattikattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:943_5: dhammadesanāya ca taṃtaṃsikkhāpadabhāvena paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato.
anya-e0103n:944_0: Evaṃ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṃ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni
anya-e0103n:947_7: Paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo”ti āha.

anya-e0103n:1000_1: Sikkhāya sagāravoti sīladhanaṃ nissāya paṭiladdhasamādānattā sātisayaṃ sikkhāya sagāravo sappatisso hoti.

anya-e0103n:1003_0: Sataṃ dhammaṃ anukkamanti sādhūnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ dhammaṃ paveṇiṃ anu anu kamanto okkamanto,
anya-e0103n:1004_2: tena maccherena ceva lobhādimalena cāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1004_7: Sotāpannassa satoti gehaṃ āvasantassa sotāpannassa samānassa.
anya-e0103n:1004_10: Abhibhavitvāti agāraṃ āvasantānaṃ aññesaṃ uppajjanakarāgādiupakkilese abhibhuyya.
anya-e0103n:1005_5: evaṃ dānabahulo puggalo “payatapāṇī”ti vuttoti dassento “dātuṃ sadā dhotahatthoyevā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1005_12: Yājena yuttoti dānena yutto sadā pariccajanato.
anya-e0103n:1006_1: Yathā parisuddhasīlassa puggalassa akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlassa anussarantassa sīlānussatibhāvanā ijjhati,
anya-e0103n:1006_2: evaṃ parisuddhauḷārapariccāgassa puggalassa anupakkiliṭṭhameva attano pariccāgaṃ anussarantassa bhāvanā
anya-e0103n:1007_5: Paṭiggāhakesu mettāyanavasena pariccāgo hotīti mettāya mettābhāvanāya anulomakārī anurūpapaṭipatti.
anya-e0103n:1007_6: Visāradoti visado attanova guṇena katthacipi amaṅkubhūto abhibhuyya vihārī.
anya-e0103n:1009_3: Yādisā hi ariyānaṃ santāne lokiyāpi saddhādayo,
anya-e0103n:1009_8: Tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino tatthūpapannāti taṃsahacaritaṃ ṭhānaṃ tāvatiṃsaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1009_18: Devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāti “yathārūpāya maggenāgatāya saddhāya samannāgatā,
anya-e0103n:1009_19: sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya samannāgatā ito cutā tattha upapannā tā devatā,
anya-e0103n:1009_20: mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññā ca saṃvijjatī”ti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakkhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1010_1: taṃ kathanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “sutte panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1010_3: tāsañca devatāna”nti ubhayaṃ samadhuraṃ viya sutte kiñcāpi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1010_5: Sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbanti “vutta”nti parato padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1010_6: Kimatthaṃ pana sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapananti āha “devatānaṃ attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthanti veditabba”nti.
anya-e0103n:1010_7: Kasmā pana sutte yathārutavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā evaṃ attho gayhatīti āha “aṭṭhakathāyañhī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1011_1: Tasmāti yasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1011_2: sīlacāgānussatīsu viya idhāpi attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ jhānuppattinimittaṃ yuttaṃ, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:1011_6: Yadi attano eva idha guṇā anussaritabbā,
anya-e0103n:1011_11: Pubbabhāge vā pavattaṃ devatāguṇānussaraṇaṃ upādāya “devatānussatī”ti imissā samaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1011_12: Tathā hi vakkhati “pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1013_5: Atthavedanti vā hetuphalaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhimāha.
anya-e0103n:1013_7: “Ārakattā araha”nti anussarantassa hi yaṃ taṃ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṃ, so hetu.
anya-e0103n:1013_15: “yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā”tiādinā ca tattha tattha hetuapadeso katoyevāti.
anya-e0103n:1014_1: Ariyasāvakānaññeva ijjhantīti ariyasāvakānaṃ ijjhantiyevāti uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1014_7: kasmā mahānāmasuttādīsu bahūsu suttesu ariyasāvakaggahaṇaṃ katanti?
anya-e0103n:1017_1: Evaṃ santepīti evaṃ mahānāmasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu ariyasāvakasseva vasena chasu anussatīsu desitāsupi.
anya-e0103n:1017_3: Pītiṃ paṭilabhitvāti anussavavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā.
anya-e0103n:1022_2: Sā hi chasu anussatīsu sabbapacchā niddiṭṭhattā āsannā,
anya-e0103n:1022_5: Maraṇassa sati maraṇassatīti maraṇaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tattha maraṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_6: Kāmañcettha khandhānaṃ bhedo “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti vacanato cutikhandhānaṃ vināso maraṇanti vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1022_7: visesato pana taṃ jīvitindriyassa vināsabhāvena kammaṭṭhānikānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhatīti “jīvitindriyassa upacchedo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_10: Jīvitindriyassa upacchedoti jīvitindriyappabandhassa vicchedo āyukkhayādivasena antaradhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_11: Samucchedamaraṇanti arahato santānassa sabbaso ucchedabhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_12: Saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgasaṅkhātanti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ udayavayaparicchinnassa pavattikhaṇassa bhaṅgo nirodhoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_13: Khaṇikamaraṇanti yathāvuttakhaṇavantaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe labbhamānaṃ maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_15: tasmiṃ anupacchinnepi allatādivigamanaṃ nissāya matavohāro sammutimaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1022_16: Na taṃ idha adhippetanti taṃ samucchedakhaṇikasammutimaraṇaṃ idha maraṇānussatiyaṃ nādhippetaṃ abāhullato,
anya-e0103n:1024_4: uttarakurukādīnaṃ viya āhārasampattiyā ca abhāvena. Ādi-
anya-e0103n:1024_8: ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ vassasatamattaparimāṇassa viya āyuno khayavasenāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1024_9: Evaṃ hi anāgatepi paramāyuno saṅgaho kato hoti,
anya-e0103n:1024_10: atīte pana gatisampattiyā viya kālāhārādisampattiyā bhāvena anekavassasahassa parimāṇopi āyu ahosi.
anya-e0103n:1024_11: Ayañca vibhāgo vattamānassa antarakappassa vasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1024_15: tatthāpi puññakkhayamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ ubhayakkhayamaraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇa”nti vuttappabhedaṃ maraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1025_5: Tattha ayoniso pavattayatoti anupāyena satiṃ, saṃvegaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1025_10: Yo hi “maraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ jātassa ekantika”nti paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sarati,
anya-e0103n:1025_13: Tasmāti yasmā ayoniso manasikāraṃ pavattayato ete dosā, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:1026_1: Vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānatoti ghātakassa viya pati pati upaṭṭhānato āsannabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1026_3: Upasaṃharaṇatoti paresaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetvā attano maraṇassa upanayanato.
anya-e0103n:1027_1: saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento “vadhakassa viya paccupaṭṭhānato”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivaranto “yathā hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1027_4: Jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbattanti “yathā hi ahicchattakamakuḷaṃ uggacchantaṃ paṃsuvirahitaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1027_5: evaṃ sattā nibbattantā jarāmaraṇavirahitā na hontī”ti ettakena upamā.
anya-e0103n:1027_7: sattā pana kathañcipi jarāmaraṇavirahitā na hontīti khaṇikamaraṇaṃ tāva upamābhāvena dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1027_8: Atha vā yadime sattā jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbattanti,
anya-e0103n:1027_13: Hārahārinīti pavāhe patitassa tiṇapaṇṇādikassa ativiya haraṇasīlā.
anya-e0103n:1027_15: Vattatevāti pavāhavasena vattati eva na tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n:1028_6: Yebhuyyena sattā rattiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti rattiggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1028_11: Sa gacchaṃ na nivattatīti so evaṃ gacchanto khaṇamattampi na nivattati,
anya-e0103n:1029_1: Pāto āporasānugatabandhanānanti purimadivase divā sūriyasantāpena anto anupavisitvā puna rattiyaṃ bandhanamūlaṃ
anya-e0103n:1030_8: Papatatoti papatanato bhayaṃ sāmikānaṃ rukkhe ṭhatvā kamme viniyuñjitukāmānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1030_11: Mā maṃ amma nivāraya pabbajjāyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1031_0: Koci mittamukhasatturandhagavesī saha vattamānopi na haneyya,
anya-e0103n:1031_1: ayaṃ pana ekaṃsena hanatiyevāti dassetuṃ “sahajātiyā āgatato”ti vatvā “jīvitaharaṇato cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1034_3: Nabhaṃ āhaccāti vipulattā eva ākāsaṃ abhivihacca sabbadisāsu pharitvā.
anya-e0103n:1034_7: Kulena vā rūpena vā sīlena vā sutena vā saddhādīhi vā seṭṭhoti sambhāvanāya khattiyādīsu na kañci parivajjeti.
anya-e0103n:1034_8: Tehi eva nihīnoti avamaññamānāya suddādīsu na kañci parivajjeti.
anya-e0103n:1034_10: Daṇḍādiupāyā ca tattha avisayā evāti dassetuṃ “na tattha hatthīnaṃ bhūmī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1035_1: Parehi saddhiṃ attano upasaṃharaṇatoti parehi matehi saddhiṃ “tepi nāma matā,
anya-e0103n:1035_2: kimaṅgaṃ pana mādisā”ti attano maraṇassa upanayanato.
anya-e0103n:1035_8: Cānuro yo baladevena nibbuddhaṃ katvā mārito.
anya-e0103n:1036_0: Saha iddhīhīti vejayantakampananandopanandadamanādīsu diṭṭhānubhāvāhi attano iddhīhi saddhiṃ maccumukhaṃ paviṭṭho.
anya-e0103n:1037_0: Kalaṃ nagghanti soḷasinti soḷasannaṃ pūraṇabhāgaṃ na agghanti.
anya-e0103n:1037_2: āyasmato therassa sāriputtassa paññaṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato ekaṃ bhāgaṃ soḷasadhā gahetvā laddhaṃ ekabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0103n:1037_3: kalaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ sattānaṃ paññā na agghantīti.
anya-e0103n:1038_0: Sabbassāpi saṃkilesapakkhassa samugghāto ñāyena āraddhavīriyassa hotīti āha “ñāṇavīriyabalenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1038_1: Sammādiṭṭhisammāvāyāmesu hi siddhesu aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo siddhova hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1038_3: Paratoghosena vinā sayameva bhūtā paṭividdhākuppāti sayambhuno.
anya-e0103n:1039_0: Hatthagatasuvaṇṇavalayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrassa katthaci asattatāti evamādikaṃ taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ āgamma.
anya-e0103n:1039_6: khaggamigasiṅgaṃ vā samūpamā yesaṃ te khaggasiṅgasamūpamā.
anya-e0103n:1040_1: vicitro acchariyabbhuto rūpakāyo etassāti asīti…pe… rūpakāyo.
anya-e0103n:1040_2: Saha vāsanāya sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā sabbākāraparisuddhasīlakkhandhādiguṇaratanehi samiddho dhammakāyo etassāti sabbākāra…pe…
anya-e0103n:1042_0: Maraṇaṃ sāmaññaṃ etassāti maraṇasāmañño, tassa bhāvo maraṇasāmaññatā, tāya.
anya-e0103n:1043_0: 172. Kimikulānanti kimisamūhānaṃ, kimijātīnaṃ vā. Jīyantīti jaraṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n:1044_2: So mamassa antarāyoti sā yathāvuttā na kevalaṃ kālakiriyāva,
anya-e0103n:1044_3: atha kho mama atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā ṭhitassa satthusāsanamanasikārassa antarāyo assa bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n:1044_5: Satthakena viya aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kantanakā maraṇakāle sandhibandhanacchedanakavātā satthakavātā.
anya-e0103n:1045_8: paviṭṭhe vā anikkhamanteti ekasseva pavesanikkhamo viya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1045_12: Atisītena abhibhūtassa kāyassa vipajjanaṃ mahiṃsaraṭṭhādīsu himapātakālena dīpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1045_13: Tattha hi sattā sītena bhinnasarīrā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0103n:1045_14: Atiuṇhena abhibhūtassa vipajjanaṃ marukantāre uṇhābhitattāya pacchiṃ,
anya-e0103n:1045_18: Pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ pakopena sarīrassa vikārāpatti parato dhātukammaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ āgamissati.
anya-e0103n:1047_0: Ito paranti ettha paranti paraṃ aññaṃ kālanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1047_3: Tato paraṃ sattānaṃ jīvanassa abhāvato “vavatthānābhāvato”ti vattuṃ na sakkāti.
anya-e0103n:1047_15: Yantayuttagoṇo viyāti yathā yante yuttagoṇo yantaṃ nātivattati,
anya-e0103n:1048_1: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato upari “dasa vā vassāni,
anya-e0103n:1048_2: vīsati vā”tiādinā dutiyaṃ vassasataṃ apāpuṇanto appakaṃ vā jīvatīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1051_1: tiṇagge ussāvabindu sūriye uggacchante khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati,
anya-e0103n:1051_6: Balavā puriso jivhagge kheḷapiṇḍaṃ saṃyūhitvā akasireneva vameyya.
anya-e0103n:1051_7: Divasaṃ santatte ayokaṭāhe maṃsapesi pakkhittā khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati,
anya-e0103n:1051_9: Gāvī vajjhā āghātanaṃ nīyamānā yaṃ yadeva pādaṃ uddharati,
anya-e0103n:1051_13: govajjhūpamaṃ jīvitaṃ manussānaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ bahudukkhaṃ bahupāyāsaṃ mantāyaṃ boddhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1053_2: Bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti bahuṃ vata mayā attahitaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0103n:1053_4: Ekaṃ piṇḍapātanti ekaṃ divasaṃ yāpanappahonakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1054_8: Tasmā sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikattā lahusaṃ ittaranti dassento “paramatthato”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1055_2: cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā katūpāsanā catuddisā ṭhitā assu,
anya-e0103n:1055_4: katūpāsanānaṃ catuddisā kaṇḍe khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyaṃ gahetvā āharissāmī’ti. Yathā ca,
anya-e0103n:1055_12: yathā ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṃ purato dhāvanti,
anya-e0103n:1056_1: Tatra hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi,
anya-e0103n:1056_2: pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātatopi parittako rūpajīvitindriyassa so khaṇo vutto,
anya-e0103n:1056_10: Ekacittappavattimattoyeva ekassa cittassa pavattimatteneva sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanakkhaṇassa paricchinnattā.
anya-e0103n:1056_14: Tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatteti yena vattamānacittakkhaṇena “jīvatī”ti vuccati,
anya-e0103n:1056_15: tasmiṃ citte nirodhaṃ bhaṅgaṃ pattamatte taṃsamaṅgī satto niruddho matoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1056_17: Tena tīsupi kālesu sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanaṃ nāma cittakkhaṇavasenevāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1057_2: Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1057_7: Lahuso vattati khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.
anya-e0103n:1058_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cutito uddhaṃ “niruddhā”ti vattabbā ye khandhā.
anya-e0103n:1058_1: Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhā khandhā.
anya-e0103n:1058_2: Sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0103n:1058_3: Gatā appaṭisandhikā puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā.
anya-e0103n:1059_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti ajāto nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1059_1: Paccuppannena vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1059_2: Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato
anya-e0103n:1059_4: Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā yā taṃ taṃ dharantaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati,
anya-e0103n:1060_4: bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ pahāya ekattavasena maraṇārammaṇameva hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1060_6: Sabhāvadhammānaṃ bhedo sabhāvadhammagatiko evāti āha “sabhāvadhammattā pana ārammaṇassā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1060_10: Saṃvejanīyattāti saṃvegajananato mahābhūtesu mahāvikāratā viya gayhamānā maraṇaṃ anussariyamānaṃ uparūpari
anya-e0103n:1060_11: ubbegameva āvahatīti tattha na bhāvanācittaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0103n:1060_13: lokuttarajjhānaṃ ekaccāni arūpajjhānāni ca kathanti āha “lokuttarajjhānaṃ panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1060_16: evaṃbhūtassa visuddhibhāvanānukkamassa vasena lokuttarajjhānaṃ appanāppattameva hoti.
anya-e0103n:1060_17: Ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotīti aññesaṃ sabhāvadhammārammaṇakammaṭṭhānānaṃ viya cittassa samādhāne byāpāro natthi.
anya-e0103n:1060_18: Yathāsamāhitena pana cittena ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattameva bhāvanāya kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1061_8: Abhayo asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti pageva maraṇasaññāya sūpaṭṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n:1063_9: Tathā hi sumedhatāpasena sarīraṃ jigucchantena vuttaṃ –
anya-e0103n:1066_8: Satisampajaññāyāti sabbattha satiavippavāsāya ca sattaṭṭhāniyasampajaññāya ca.
anya-e0103n:1066_19: Anekehi ākārehi tesu tesu suttantesu pasaṃsitvā yaṃ taṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1066_22: Tattha hi “kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave”tiādinā ayaṃ desanā āgatā.
anya-e0103n:1066_26: kena ca pakārena punappunaṃ katā ānāpānajjhānādīnaṃ nipphattiyā mahapphalā,
anya-e0103n:1067_1: sammasanavāro pana tattha sātisayoti dhātumanasikārapabbampi “vipassanāvasena vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1067_2: “Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”ti tattha tattha asubhāniccatādīhi saddhiṃ kāye ādīnavassa
anya-e0103n:1067_8: taṃ idha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhimiñjeneva saṅgaṇhitvā desanā āgatāti dassento “matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjena saṅgahetvā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1067_11: kāye vā gatā sati kāyagatāsatīti satisīsena idaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1068_4: tassa vā avayavesu sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ pādatalanti vuttaṃ “uddhaṃ pādatalā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1068_8: tacaparicchinnabahulatāya pana kāyassa tacaparicchinnatā hotīti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1068_9: Taco pariyanto assāti tacapariyantoti etena pana vacanena kāyekadesabhūto taco gahito eva,
anya-e0103n:1068_10: tappaṭibaddhā ca kesādayo tadanupaviṭṭhamūlā tacapariyantāva hontīti dvattiṃsākārasamūho sabbopi kāyo tacapariyanto vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1069_5: saddaṃ vaṇṇantehipi asucisamudāyabhāveneva icchitabboti dassento “asucisañcayato”ti vatvā puna naṃ niruttinayena dassetuṃ “kucchitāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1069_9: Yehi nānappakāraṃ asuci vutta”nti te kesādike dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “kesā lomā”tiādi vuttanti imamatthaṃ dīpento āha “ete kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1069_11: Evaṃ sambandhoti “atthi imasmiṃ kāye nakhā”tiādinā sabbakoṭṭhāsesu “atthi imasmiṃ kāye”ti padattayena sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1070_1: samantato vā pādatalakesamūlesu ca tacassa labbhanato.
anya-e0103n:1072_1: Tesaṃ kira cattāro māse sajjhāyantānaṃ sajjhāyamaggeneva koṭṭhāse upadhārentānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā dvattiṃsākārā vibhūtatarā hutvā khāyiṃsu,
anya-e0103n:1072_3: te tasmiṃ nimitte jhānaṃ appetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dassanamaggaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
anya-e0103n:1073_4: vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ, aṭṭhi, nhāru, maṃsaṃ, taco, dantā, nakhā, lomā,
anya-e0103n:1073_5: kesāti evaṃ vakkapañcakādīsu anulomasajjhāyaṃ vatvā paṭilomasajjhāyo purimehi sambandho vutto.
anya-e0103n:1073_7: purimehi ekato tipañcāhanti chapañcāhaṃ sajjhāyo vutto,
anya-e0103n:1075_4: Cirataraṃ suṭṭhu pavattanena paguṇabhūtā kammaṭṭhānatanti samāvajjitvā manasi karontassa ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0103n:1075_5: yāva pariyosānā katthaci asajjamānā nirantarameva upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1075_6: tadanusārena tadatthopi vibhūtataro hutvā khāyatīti āha “vacasā sajjhāyo hi…pe…
anya-e0103n:1076_0: Paṭikkūlasabhāvasallakkhaṇassa kassaci vaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena koṭṭhāsā vavatthānaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0103n:1076_4: kassaci sabbaso paricchijjaggahaṇamukhenāti vaṇṇādito sallakkhaṇaṃ uggahakosallāvahaṃ vuttanti taṃ dassento
anya-e0103n:1077_8: Saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti “kesā”ti vutte “akesā na hontī”ti ayamattho viññāyati.
anya-e0103n:1077_10: na ca ghaṭādīsu pasaṅgopakaraṇeneva tesaṃ nivattitattā.
anya-e0103n:1078_1: Tattheva visuṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānassa kathitattā ca dhātuvibhaṅgo pakkusātisuttaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇe dhātuvibhaṅgapāḷi ca.
anya-e0103n:1078_3: taṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya jhānāni kesādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇāni vibhattāni.
anya-e0103n:1078_7: Kāyagatāsatisutte hi paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbaṃ gahetvā idha kāyagatāsatibhāvanā niddisīyati.
anya-e0103n:1079_1: Na ekantarikāyāti ekantarikāyapi na manasi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1079_4: lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ na pāpuṇāti ekantarikāya manasi karontoti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1080_2: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ pāpuṇātīti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā manasikāramattaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1080_3: Avibhūtaṃ pana hoti paṭikkūlākārassa suṭṭhu asallakkhaṇato.
anya-e0103n:1081_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchatīti paṭipāṭiyā sabbakoṭṭhāse manasi karotoyeva vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0103n:1081_1: Te sātisayaṃ pāṭikkūlato manasi karontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0103n:1081_2: imassa pana ativiya dandhaṃ manasi karoto vibhūtato upaṭṭhānameva natthi,
anya-e0103n:1082_0: Bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇeti “asuci paṭikkūla”nti kesādīsu pavattetabbaṃ asubhānupassanaṃ hitvā subhādivasena
anya-e0103n:1082_2: Rūpādayo hi nīlādivasena puthusabhāvatāya puthuttārammaṇaṃ nāma,
anya-e0103n:1082_5: So satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā sakkaccaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontena paṭibāhitabbo.
anya-e0103n:1083_4: Tassā ugghāṭitattā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāse paṭikkūlato upaṭṭhahante “paṭikkūla”nti cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1083_10: Tena manussānaṃ udapāne nhānapivanādi viya yogāvacarassa pubbabhāge kesā lomāti paṇṇattivasena manasikāro.
anya-e0103n:1083_11: Abhiṇhasañcārena manussānaṃ saññāṇena vinā udapāne kiccakaraṇaṃ viya yogāvacarassa manasikārabalena paṇṇattiṃ
anya-e0103n:1083_14: pākaṭo hotīti “kesā lomā”tiādinā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa kesādipaññattiyā saddhiṃyeva koṭṭhāsānaṃ paṭikkūlabhāvo pubbabhāge pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0103n:1083_16: Paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti koṭṭhāsānaṃ paṭikkūlākāreyeva bhāvanācittaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1084_3: Pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ tantianusārena ādito kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1084_4: Tathā hissa manasā sajjhāyo viya manasikāro te te koṭṭhāse āmaṭṭhamatte katvā gacchati,
anya-e0103n:1084_6: Yadā pana ne lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena suṭṭhu upadhārento manasi karoti,
anya-e0103n:1084_13: tesampi dvinnaṃ eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati tāva.
anya-e0103n:1085_0: Ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvāti pubbe viya ekatthakatāya ukkuṭṭhiyā kamena sabbatālesu patitvā uṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhahitvā pariyantatālaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1085_1: āditālañca āgantvā tato tato tattha tattheva katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhahitvāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1087_1: Kiṃ paccekaṃ koṭṭhāsesu hoti udāhu aññathāti vicāraṇāyaṃ āha “appanākoṭṭhāsato”ti,
anya-e0103n:1089_11: etassa saṃvattanassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1089_19: Na ca pabhaṅgūti kammaniyabhāvūpagamanena na ca pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ suddhantaṃ viya suvaṇṇaṃ viniyogakkhamaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1090_2: Tañcāti taṃ piḷandhanavikatisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ assa suvaṇṇakārassa anubhoti pahoti sādheti.
anya-e0103n:1090_3: Assa vā suvaṇṇassa atthaṃ suvaṇṇakāro anubhoti pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n:1091_0: Abhiññāya iddhividhādiñāṇena sacchikaraṇīyassa iddhividhapaccanubhavanādikassa abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassa.
anya-e0103n:1091_5: Sakkhi ca so bhabbo cāti vā sakkhibhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1091_10: Sati sati āyataneti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pubbahetuādike kāraṇe sati.
anya-e0103n:1092_2: Niggaṇhātīti uddhaṭaṃ cittaṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhaṇavasena niggaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1092_3: Paggaṇhātīti līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhaṇavasena paggaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1092_4: Sampahaṃsetīti samappavattaṃ cittaṃ tathāpavattiyaṃ paññāya toseti,
anya-e0103n:1092_6: Yadā vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati,
anya-e0103n:1092_7: tadā jātiādīni saṃvegavatthūni paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti.
anya-e0103n:1092_8: Ajjhupekkhatīti yadā pana cittaṃ alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ sammadeva bhāvanāvīthiṃ otiṇṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1092_9: tadā paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu kañci byāpāraṃ akatvā samappavattesu yugesu sārathi viya ajjhupekkhati upekkhakova hoti.
anya-e0103n:1092_10: Paṇītādhimuttikoti paṇīte uttame maggaphale adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro.
anya-e0103n:1093_0: Suggahitaṃ katvāti yathāvuttaṃ uggahakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ suṭṭhu uggahitaṃ pariyāpuṇanādinā supariggahitaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1093_1: Suṭṭhu vavatthapetvāti manasikārakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ sammadeva sallakkhaṇavasena upadhāretvā.
anya-e0103n:1093_3: Punappunaṃ parivattetvāti kammaṭṭhānatantiṃ paguṇabhāvaṃ pāpento bhiyyo bhiyyo vācāya,
anya-e0103n:1093_5: Gaṇṭhiṭṭhānanti yathā rukkhassa dubbinibhedo araññassa vā gahanabhūto padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati,
anya-e0103n:1093_6: evaṃ kammaṭṭhānatantiyā atthato dubbinibhedo gahanabhūto ca padeso “gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna”nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1094_2: Edisena payojanena luñcanampi anavajjanti dassetuṃ “luñcitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1094_8: itaresu sutvā ca ñatvā ca nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1099_2: Nakhā tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti visuṃ vavatthitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1099_3: Tameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dve nakhā ekato natthī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1102_0: Anulomena paṭilomena cāti ettha aṃsapadesato paṭṭhāya bāhuno piṭṭhipadesena otaraṇaṃ anulomo,
anya-e0103n:1102_1: maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya bāhuno purimabhāgena ārohanaṃ paṭilomo.
anya-e0103n:1102_2: Teneva nayenāti dakkhiṇahatthe vuttena nayena anulomena paṭilomena cāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1102_4: Antomukhacammādikoṭṭhāsesu vā tacena paricchinnattā yaṃ durupalakkhaṇīyaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1102_6: Tañhi vuttanayena ñāṇena tacaṃ vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:1102_7: Idha chavipi tacagatikā evāti “taco upari ākāsena paricchinno”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n:1103_3: Tālaguḷapaṭalaṃ nāma pakkatālaphalalasikaṃ tālapaṭṭikādīsu limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahitapaṭalaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1103_5: Paṇhikamaṃsādithūlānaṃ sakalasarīrassa kisānaṃ yebhuyyena maṃsena paṭicchāditattā vuttaṃ “tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinna”nti.
anya-e0103n:1104_0: 189. Jālākāro kañcuko jālakañcuko. Visuṃ vavatthitabhāveneva nhārū tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
anya-e0103n:1105_1: Dantānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā “ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīnī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1105_5: Evaṃ timattānīti evaṃ mattasaddehi ānisadaṭṭhiādīni idha avuttānipi dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1105_6: Evañca katvā “atirekatisataaṭṭhikasamussaya”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:1106_0: Kīḷāgoḷakāni suttena bandhitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kīḷanagoḷakāni.
anya-e0103n:1106_2: Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānanti jaṇṇukaṭṭhimhi pavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1106_3: Tena ūruṭṭhinā patiṭṭhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ yaṃ kaṭiṭṭhino,
anya-e0103n:1107_3: tasmiṃ takkamhi vijjhitvā ṭhapitagoḷakā vaṭṭanā nāma,
anya-e0103n:1110_3: Bhavati hi kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇavohāro yathā “corehi gāmo daḍḍho”ti.
anya-e0103n:1110_5: tampi lohitagatikameva hutvā tiṭṭhatīti “yaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1114_1: Papphāsamaṃsanti yathāṭhāne eva lambitvā thokaṃ parivattakamaṃsaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1116_2: Tesaṃ bandhanabhūtaṃ antaguṇaṃ nāmāti dassento āha “antaguṇanti antabhogaṭṭhānesu bandhana”nti.
anya-e0103n:1116_3: Kuddālapharasukammādīni karontānaṃ antabhoge agaḷante ekato ābandhitvā, kiṃ viya?
anya-e0103n:1119_1: Heṭṭhānābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antareti purimabhāgavasena nābhiyā heṭṭhāpadesassa pacchimabhāgavasena heṭṭhimapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ vemajjhe.
anya-e0103n:1121_0: 204. Pūtibhāvaṃ āpannaṃ kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ pūtikukkuṭaṇḍaṃ. Uddeko pittādīhi vinā kevalo uddhaṅgamavāto.
anya-e0103n:1123_1: Vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānanti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇeneva temeti,
anya-e0103n:1123_2: itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1124_4: tiriyañca sedaṃ visamaṃ paggharatīti dassetuṃ visamacchinna-
anya-e0103n:1125_3: Sammohavinodaniyaṃ pana “visabhāgāhāra”ntveva vuttaṃ tadā pavattamānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ visabhāgattā.
anya-e0103n:1126_1: “Nhānakāle”ti idaṃ udakassa upari sinehassa sambhavadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1127_3: Hadayaṃ āgilāyatīti visabhāgāhārādiṃ paṭicca hadayappadeso vivattati.
anya-e0103n:1128_3: Tālumatthakavivarena otaritvāti matthakavivarato āgantvā tālumatthakena otaritvā.
anya-e0103n:1129_1: Telaṃ viya sakaṭassa nābhiakkhasīsānaṃ aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā.
anya-e0103n:1130_1: Samūlakūlamāsaṃ jhāpetvā chārikaṃ avassāvetvā gahitayūso māsakhāro.
anya-e0103n:1130_4: Yassa pana āraggamattampi udakassa pavisanamukhaṃ natthi,
anya-e0103n:1131_2: Idāni yathāvuttaṃ manasikārakosallapaṭipattimpi nigamanavasena gahetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ “anupubbato”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1131_3: Tattha paṇṇattisamatikkamāvasāneti kesādipaṇṇattisamatikkamavasena pavattāya bhāvanāya avasāne.
anya-e0103n:1131_9: Te dhammāti vaṇṇādivasena vavatthāpitā paṭikkūlākārato upaṭṭhitā koṭṭhāsadhammā.
anya-e0103n:1132_5: Evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesūti yathā attano kāye,
anya-e0103n:1132_6: evaṃ paresampi kāye sabbesu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu paṭikkūlavasena vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhitesūti attho.
anya-e0103n:1132_7: Ayamettha kasiṇesu vaḍḍhanasadiso yogino bhāvanāviseso dassito.
anya-e0103n:1133_2: Punappunaṃ manasi karototi vuttanayena attano kāye kesādike “paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā”ti abhiṇhaso manasikāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1133_3: pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamathāni visadāni pavattanti,
anya-e0103n:1133_4: tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ balappattehi sattahi saddhammehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti.
anya-e0103n:1133_5: Tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi.
anya-e0103n:1133_7: so taṃyeva nimittaṃ āsevanto bhāvento bahulīkaronto appanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n:1134_0: Yadi panetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ aviññāṇakāsubhakammaṭṭhānāni viya paṭhamajjhānavasena sijjhati,
anya-e0103n:1134_2: Nānāvaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu pavattamānāya satiyā kiccamettha sātisayanti āha “satibalena ijjhanato”ti.
anya-e0103n:1135_2: kāmaguṇesu ca ratiṃ sahati abhibhavatīti aratiratisaho sarīrasabhāvacintanena anabhiratiyā pahīnattā.
anya-e0103n:1135_3: Tathā koṭṭhāsabhāvanāya attasinehassa parikkhīṇattā bhayabheravaṃ sahati,
anya-e0103n:1135_7: Imaṃ pana koṭṭhāsabhāvanamanuyuttassa na kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānamattameva,
anya-e0103n:1137_1: Yaṃ taṃ evaṃ pasaṃsitvā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1137_2: Tattha yasmā “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādikāya pucchāpāḷiyā atthe vibhāvite thomanāpāḷiyāpi attho vibhāvitoyeva hoti bhedābhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1137_3: tasmā taṃ laṅghitvā “kathaṃ bhāvito cā”tiādinā ārabhati.
anya-e0103n:1137_4: Tattha hi ito pasaṃsābhāvo “ayampi kho”ti vacanañca viseso.
anya-e0103n:1137_7: Tañhi sutvā bhikkhū “bhagavā imaṃ samādhiṃ anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati,
anya-e0103n:1137_8: santo kirāyaṃ samādhi paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro pāpadhamme ca ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”ti sañjātābhirucayo
anya-e0103n:1137_10: “Ayampi kho”ti padassa ye ime mayā nibbānamahāsarassa otaraṇatitthabhūtā kasiṇajjhānaasubhajjhānādayo desitā,
anya-e0103n:1137_12: ayampi khoti bhagavā attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ desanānubhāvena tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ āsannaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1137_13: paccakkhañca karonto sampiṇḍanavasena evamāhāti sambandhamukhena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1138_0: Soḷasavatthukanti catūsu anupassanāsu catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1138_1: Sabbākāraparipūroti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā padattho piṇḍattho upamā codanā parihāro payojananti evamādīhi sabbehi ākārehi paripuṇṇo.
anya-e0103n:1139_3: Sā ca upari desanaṃ āruḷhānaṃ sabbesaṃ pakāravisesānaṃ āmasanavasenāti imamatthaṃ dassento “kathanti…pe…
anya-e0103n:1139_5: Kathaṃ bahulīkatoti etthāpi “ānāpānassatisamādhī”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1139_7: Bahulīkato ānāpānassatisamādhīti tathāpuṭṭhadhammanidassananti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati.
anya-e0103n:1139_8: Tathā santabhāvādayopi tassa yehi bhāvanābahulīkārehi siddhā,
anya-e0103n:1140_2: yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā vuccatīti
anya-e0103n:1140_3: tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1140_4: Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ ito gatoti bhāvito,
anya-e0103n:1140_12: Purimasmiñhi atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo vutto sampayuttavacanato,
anya-e0103n:1140_14: Upacārajjhānasahagatā hi sati appanāsamādhissa upanissayo hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1140_23: “vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-
anya-e0103n:1141_5: Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1141_11: Ārammaṇasantatāyāti anukkamena vicetabbataṃ pattaṃ ārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n:1141_12: Sante hi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti.
anya-e0103n:1141_15: Ārammaṇasantatāya tadārammaṇadhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā.
anya-e0103n:1142_5: Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1142_9: Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantamappaṇītaṃ siyā.
anya-e0103n:1142_10: Upacārena vā natthi ettha santatāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1142_22: upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1142_25: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “appitappitakkhaṇe”ti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1142_32: taṃ pana jhānakattukassa idhādhippetattā pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ hotīti āha “vikkhambhetī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1142_34: Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti āha “suṭṭhu upasametī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1143_0: Nanu ca aññopi samādhi attano pavattikkhaṇeneva paṭipakkhadhamme antaradhāpeti vūpasameti,
anya-e0103n:1143_1: atha kasmā ayameva samādhi evaṃ visesetvā vuttoti?
anya-e0103n:1143_8: Tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ sandhāya “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1143_9: Atha vā nimittapātubhāve sati khaṇeneva aṅgapātubhāvasabbhāvato ayameva samādhi “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n:1143_10: Yathā taṃ mahato akālameghassa uṭṭhitassa dhārānipāte khaṇeneva pathaviyaṃ rajojallassa vūpasamo. Tenāha –
anya-e0103n:1143_14: Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyāva hotīti āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1143_16: Imameva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā sabbepi sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti.
anya-e0103n:1143_17: Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “anupubbena ariyamaggavuddhippatto”ti.
anya-e0103n:1144_0: Ayaṃ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati.
anya-e0103n:1144_1: Heṭṭhā papañcavasena vuttamatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassento “ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho”ti āha,
anya-e0103n:1145_1: Tamatthanti taṃ “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādinā pucchāvasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1145_10: imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhū”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1145_13: Bāhirakā hi jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti.
anya-e0103n:1145_23: Parappavādāti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.
anya-e0103n:1146_2: Yathā thanehi sabbaso khīraṃ na paggharati,
anya-e0103n:1148_2: buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa ceva aññakammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1150_0: Bhikkhu dīpisadiso araññe ekiko viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato.
anya-e0103n:1151_3: Rukkhasamīpanti “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati,
anya-e0103n:1151_5: ettāvatā rukkhamūlanti vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ rukkhassa samīpaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1151_6: Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1152_3: Tathā hi gimhakāle ca araññaṃ anukūlaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1152_27: Na paripatatīti na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅghati,
anya-e0103n:1152_28: tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesuppattiyā vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
anya-e0103n:1152_32: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhitvāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1152_35: Tasmā pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā,
anya-e0103n:1153_1: Satovāti satiyā samannāgato eva saranto eva assasati nāssa kāci sativirahitā assāsappavatti hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1153_2: Sato passasatīti etthāpi satova passasatīti eva-
anya-e0103n:1153_7: Yadi “satova assasati sato passasatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1153_12: Tasmā ekarasaṃ desanaṃ kātukāmatāya sabbattha “satokāri”cceva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1154_0: Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghaassāsavasena vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso.
anya-e0103n:1154_2: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmacittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato.
anya-e0103n:1154_3: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0103n:1154_4: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇenāti yathāvuttāya satiyā,
anya-e0103n:1154_8: asammohato vā pajānantassa tattha sati upaṭṭhitā eva hoti,
anya-e0103n:1154_11: tadadhīnasatisampajaññena taṃsamaṅgī yogāvacaro satokārī nāma hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1154_12: Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasenāti paṭinissaggānupassī hutvā assasanassa vasena.
anya-e0103n:1154_18: Suttantanayena pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso,
anya-e0103n:1155_0: “Assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti,
anya-e0103n:1155_1: “passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti –
anya-e0103n:1157_1: tasmā pavattikkamena assāso paṭhamaṃ vuttoti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:1157_2: Tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyatīti tāluṃ āhacca nirujjhati.
anya-e0103n:1157_3: Tena kira sampatijāto bāladārako khipitaṃ karoti.
anya-e0103n:1157_5: Keci “evaṃ tāvāti anena pavattikkamena assāso bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti adhippāyo”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:1158_4: Tattha desaddhānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā kāladdhānavasena assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1158_11: sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhena kāladdhānavaseneva dīgharassatā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1158_15: Dīghaṃ assasantīti dīghaṃ assāsappabandhaṃ pavattentīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1158_17: Sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ assasanti ca passasanti cāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1159_0: Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito vuttā tayo ākārā,
anya-e0103n:1159_1: te ca kho ekacco assāsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkheti,
anya-e0103n:1159_3: ekacco tadubhayanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0103n:1159_4: Keci pana “assasatipi passasatipīti ekajjhaṃ vacanaṃ bhāvanāya nirantaraṃ pavattidassanattha”nti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:1160_0: Kāmaṃ cettha ekassa puggalassa tayo eva ākārā labbhanti,
anya-e0103n:1160_2: tesaṃ vasena parikammassa kātabbattā ca “tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1160_3: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ yathāvuttehi ākārehi assāsapassāse pajānato,
anya-e0103n:1160_5: Ekenākārenāti dīghaṃ assāsādīsu catūsu ākāresu ekena ākārena,
anya-e0103n:1161_0: “Dīgho rasso ca assāso, passāsopi ca tādiso;
anya-e0103n:1162_0: Cattāro vaṇṇā vattanti, nāsikagge va bhikkhuno”ti.
anya-e0103n:1163_0: Ayaṃ bhāvanā assāsapassāsakāyānupassanāti katvā vuttaṃ “kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1164_2: Tattha kathaṃ pajānātīti pajānanavidhiṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchati.
anya-e0103n:1164_10: Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo kusalacchando uppajjati.
anya-e0103n:1164_11: Chandavasenāti tathāpavattachandassa vasena savisesaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ gamentassa.
anya-e0103n:1164_13: Bhāvanābalena hi paṭippassaddhadarathapariḷāhatāya kāyassa assāsapassāsā sukhumatarā hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0103n:1164_14: Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ sukhumatarabhāvena ārammaṇassa santataratāya,
anya-e0103n:1164_15: kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthipaṭipannatāya bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddikādibhedā taruṇapīti uppajjati.
anya-e0103n:1164_16: Cittaṃ vivattatīti anukkamena assāsapassāsānaṃ ativiya sukhumatarabhāvappattiyā anupaṭṭhahane vicetabbākārappattehi cittaṃ vinivattatīti keci.
anya-e0103n:1164_17: Bhāvanābalena pana sukhumatarabhāvappattesu assāsapassāsesu tattha paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati.
anya-e0103n:1164_18: Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1165_0: Imehi navahi ākārehīti imehi yathāvuttehi navahi pakārehi pavattā.
anya-e0103n:1165_1: Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā kāyoti dīghākārā assāsapassāsā cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi samūhaṭṭhena kāyo.
anya-e0103n:1165_3: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0103n:1165_7: cittaṃ taṃsampayuttadhamme ca “arūpa”nti vavatthapetvā nāmarūpassa anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1165_9: Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti so kāyo ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantvā sati ettha tiṭṭhatīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0103n:1165_10: Ettha ca “kāyo upaṭṭhāna”nti iminā itarakāyassāpi saṅgaho hoti yathāvuttasammasanacārassāpi idha icchitattā.
anya-e0103n:1165_11: No satīti so kāyo sati nāma na hoti.
anya-e0103n:1165_17: Anupassatīti jhānasampayuttañāṇena ceva vipassanāñāṇena ca anu anu passati.
anya-e0103n:1165_18: Tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti tena anupassanena yathāvutte kāye ayaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1166_2: tassa nissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā anudakabhūtāya marīciyā udakānupassanā viya na aniccādisabhāve kāye niccādibhāvānupassanā,
anya-e0103n:1166_4: Atha vā kāye “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā gahetabbassa kassaci abhāvato tādisaṃ
anya-e0103n:1166_6: tāya kāyānupassanāya sampayuttā satiyeva upaṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1167_2: Etthāti etasmiṃ yathādassite “kathaṃ dīghaṃ assasanto”tiādinā āgate pāḷinaye.
anya-e0103n:1169_3: Nāsikagge va bhikkhunoti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “nāsikagge vā”ti, vā-
anya-e0103n:1170_1: Sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedīti sabbassa kāyassa paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ sammadeva vedanasīlo jānanasīlo,
anya-e0103n:1170_2: tassa vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi,
anya-e0103n:1170_3: taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedamānoti attho.
anya-e0103n:1170_5: ggahaṇena assāsādikāyassa anavasesapariyādāne siddhepi anekakalāpasamudāyabhāvato tassa sabbesampi bhāgānaṃ saṃvedanadassanatthaṃ paṭi-
anya-e0103n:1170_9: Tattha yathā samānepi assāsapassāsesu yogino paṭipattividhāne paccekaṃ sakkaccaṃyeva paṭipajjitabbanti dassetuṃ visuṃ desanā katā,
anya-e0103n:1170_10: evaṃ tamevatthaṃ dīpetuṃ satipi atthassa samānatāya “sakalassā”tiādinā padadvayassa visuṃ visuṃ atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1170_13: Pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanaṃ ñāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento “evaṃ viditaṃ karonto”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1170_14: Tattha tasmāti yasmā ñāṇasampayuttacitteneva assāsapassāse pavatteti,
anya-e0103n:1170_16: tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatīti vuccati buddhādīhīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1170_19: ñāṇassa ca vasena tathā pubbābhisaṅkhārassa pavattattā.
anya-e0103n:1170_22: ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsupi ṭhānesu ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ pavattetabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1171_7: Tāya satiyāti yā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya.
anya-e0103n:1171_8: Tena manasikārenāti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro,
anya-e0103n:1172_2: Tatthāpi kāmaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ labbhateva assāsapassāsānaṃ yāthāvato dīgharassabhāvāvabodhasabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1172_3: tathāpi taṃ na dukkaraṃ yathāpavattānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇamattabhāvatoti tattha vattamānakālappayogo kato.
anya-e0103n:1172_4: Idaṃ pana dukkaraṃ purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ gamanasadisaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1172_5: tasmā sātisayenettha pubbābhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetuṃ anāgatakālappayogo katoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1173_1: So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyappaṭibaddhavuttitāya tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1173_2: Yo pana “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”ti evamāgato kāyasaṅkhāro cetanālakkhaṇo satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ yebhuyyavuttiyā,
anya-e0103n:1173_5: Passambhentotiādīsu pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1173_7: tañca tathāpayoge asati uppajjanārahassa oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa payogasampattiyā anuppādananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1173_11: “Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”ti hi iminā kāyapariggaho,
anya-e0103n:1173_16: sā ca nesaṃ sadarathatā garubhāvena viya oḷārikatāya avinābhāvinīti āha “oḷārikā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1173_18: Santā hontīti cittaṃ tāvaṃ bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā pavattamānaṃ santaṃ hoti vūpasantaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1173_21: kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tannissitā assāsapassāsā santasabhāvā anukkamena sukhumatarasukhumatamā hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0103n:1174_4: Tasseva atthassa manasi karaṇaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ manasikāro.
anya-e0103n:1176_1: Paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kariyamānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa nānāvajjanaṃ parikammaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dūrasamussāritapaṭipakkhanti
anya-e0103n:1176_2: katvā taṃsamuṭṭhāno kāyasaṅkhāro paṭhamajjhāne ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷārikoti sadiso vutto.
anya-e0103n:1176_4: Atha vā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya paṭipajjato dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena kilamato yogino kāyakilamathacittūpaghātādivasena,
anya-e0103n:1176_5: vitakkādisaṅkhobhena ca sapariphandatāya cittappavattiyā dutiyajjhānādiupacāresu kāyasaṅkhārassa oḷārikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1176_6: Atisukhumoti aññattha labbhamāno kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne atikkantasukhumo.
anya-e0103n:1177_1: ekāsaneneva vā sabbesaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ sandhāya majjhimabhāṇakā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijhānūpacārepi sukhumataraṃ icchanti.
anya-e0103n:1177_2: Tattha hi sopacārānaṃ jhānānaṃ uparūpari visesavantatā,
anya-e0103n:1177_5: Evañhi heṭṭhā vuttavādena imassa vādassa avirodho siddho bhinnavisayattā.
anya-e0103n:1177_7: Yasmā te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1177_8: “Apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatī”ti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1177_9: Na hi te eva oḷārikā assāsādayo sukhumā honti.
anya-e0103n:1178_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1178_6: Pubbe vuttanayenāti “apariggahitakāle”tiādinā samathanaye vuttena nayena “apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro
anya-e0103n:1178_7: mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī”tiādinā vipassanānayepi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:1180_2: taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1180_3: yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti kathetukamyatāya pucchitvā kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato,
anya-e0103n:1180_11: tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi kāyena saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā.
anya-e0103n:1181_10: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento.
anya-e0103n:1181_11: Tasmiṃ hi passambhite ānamanādayopi passambhitā eva honti.
anya-e0103n:1182_0: Santaṃ sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo na honti,
anya-e0103n:1182_3: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati.
anya-e0103n:1182_4: Atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte
anya-e0103n:1182_5: sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā tepi paṭippassambhetvā paramasukhumatāya koṭippattaṃ yaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambheti,
anya-e0103n:1182_6: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti.
anya-e0103n:1183_6: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne.
anya-e0103n:1183_9: assāsādivātārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā uppādanā pavattanā na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1183_11: Assāsapassāsānañca bhāvanāti oḷārike assāsapassāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvanā ca na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1183_13: Ānāpānassatiyāti ānāpānārammaṇāya satiyā ca pavattanaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1183_15: Tato eva taṃsampayuttassa ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā uppādanāpi na hoti.
anya-e0103n:1183_16: Na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sārammaṇadhammā sambhavanti.
anya-e0103n:1183_17: Na ca naṃ tanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1183_18: Taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā paññavanto na ceva samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1183_19: Evaṃ codako sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvūpanayanaṃ passambhananti adhippāyena codeti.
anya-e0103n:1184_0: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā.
anya-e0103n:1184_5: Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
anya-e0103n:1184_6: sukhumā pana atthevāti anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa vasena nimittuppattiyā ānāpānassatiyā,
anya-e0103n:1185_0: Yathā kathaṃ viyāti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ taṃ kathaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1185_18: saddanimittassa pana suggahitattā sukhumatarasaddanimittārammaṇabhāvenāpi cittaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0103n:1185_19: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittaṃ avikkhittena cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena
anya-e0103n:1185_20: pariyosāne atisukhumasaddanimittampi ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattateva.
anya-e0103n:1185_21: Cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati tasmiṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte samādhānasabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1186_1: Tattha yassa suttapadassa saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi attho vutto,
anya-e0103n:1186_2: taṃ uddharitvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānāni vibhāgato dassetuṃ “passambhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1188_8: Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti,
anya-e0103n:1188_9: tato parampi vā sallakkhaṇādivasena matthakappattīti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvassa sallakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1189_0: Attanāpi na kilamati odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato.
anya-e0103n:1189_1: Tato eva ācariyampi na viheseti dhammādhikaraṇampi bhāvanāya matthakaṃ pāpanato.
anya-e0103n:1190_1: Anuvahanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anupavattanā.
anya-e0103n:1190_2: Phusanāti assāsapassāse gaṇentassa gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa yathā appanā hoti,
anya-e0103n:1190_3: tathā cittaṃ ṭhapentassa ca nāsikaggādiṭṭhānassa nesaṃ phusanā.
anya-e0103n:1190_4: Yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi,
anya-e0103n:1190_5: phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti āha.
anya-e0103n:1190_7: Taṃ hi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:1190_8: Tathā hi samādhi “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0103n:1190_12: nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vivaṭṭanā nāma maggo.
anya-e0103n:1191_0: Khaṇḍanti ekaṃ tīṇi pañcāti evaṃ gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1191_3: “Sikhāppattaṃ nu kho”ti idaṃ cirataraṃ gaṇanāya manasi karontassa vasena vuttaṃ.
