anya-e0103n:1191_4: So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ maññeyya.
anya-e0103n:1191_6: taṃ gahetvā”ti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1191_10: “Yo upaṭṭhātī”ti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1191_11: so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1191_12: Pavattamānaṃ pavattamānanti āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1192_6: Eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañcāti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1192_7: Tasmā aṭṭhātiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva paccekaṃ aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni.
anya-e0103n:1193_0: Nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha “nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1193_1: Anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasi karonto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma.
anya-e0103n:1193_3: Vātabbhāhatanti abbhantaragataṃ vātaṃ bahulaṃ manasi karontassa vātena taṃ ṭhānaṃ abbhāhataṃ viya,
anya-e0103n:1193_7: tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamannesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu cittaṃ vidhāvatīti āha “puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1195_1: Anugamananti pavattapavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena satiyā anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1195_6: Tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva.
anya-e0103n:1195_10: Hadayaṃ majjhanti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo majjhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1195_11: Nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānanti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsasamaññāya tadavadhibhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1195_13: na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ sambhavo atthi.
anya-e0103n:1197_0: Ādimajjhapariyosānavasenāti ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasena na manasi kātabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1197_1: “Anubandhanāya manasi karontena phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabba”nti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1197_4: anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ phusanāvasena,
anya-e0103n:1197_9: gaṇanā pana yathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetabbā,
anya-e0103n:1197_12: Tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve gaṇanānubandhanā eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ
anya-e0103n:1197_13: tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1197_14: Yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese visuṃ gahitāti āha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyevā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1197_15: Tattha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento”ti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1197_16: Tenāha “gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1197_19: Satiyā anubandhantoti gaṇanāvīthiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto,
anya-e0103n:1197_21: Appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā appanā hoti,
anya-e0103n:1197_22: evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto.
anya-e0103n:1197_23: Anubandhanāya cātiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1197_25: tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhanto”ti ca vutto,
anya-e0103n:1197_27: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchināti,
anya-e0103n:1197_28: sā mānassa samīpeti upamā yathā “goṇo viya gavayo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1198_15: Satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n:1199_0: 226. Teti nagarassa antobahigatā manussā, tesaṃ saṅgahā ca hatthagatā.
anya-e0103n:1200_5: Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa. Ca-
anya-e0103n:1200_8: Nupalabbhatīti na upalabbhati na sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho,
anya-e0103n:1201_1: Ime tayo dhammātiādīsu padayojanāya saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso –
anya-e0103n:1201_2: ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti,
anya-e0103n:1201_3: tathāpi na cime na ca ime tayo dhammā aviditā honti,
anya-e0103n:1201_5: Tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ vikkhepaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0103n:1201_6: padhānañca bhāvanāya nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0103n:1201_7: nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca yogī kathaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0103n:1202_1: Bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā,
anya-e0103n:1202_2: tathā ca sati kakacadantagati dubbiññeyyāti āha “same bhūmibhāge”ti.
anya-e0103n:1202_6: Tena kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1202_7: Tenāha “na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karotī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1202_10: Na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti sabbattha satiyā upaṭṭhitattā chinditabbaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā gacchantānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1203_1: Upanibandhati ārammaṇe cittaṃ etāyāti sati upanibandhanā nāma,
anya-e0103n:1203_5: Evamevāti yathāpi so puriso kakacena rukkhaṃ chindanto āgatagate kakacadante amanasikarontopi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0103n:1203_8: Nāsikagge mukhanimitteti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge itaro mukhaṃ dasanaṃ nimīyati chādīyati etenāti mukhanimittanti laddhanāme uttaroṭṭhe.
anya-e0103n:1204_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena āraddhavīriyassa yogino kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ bhāvanākammakkhamaṃ bhāvanākammayoggaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1204_1: idaṃ vīriyaṃ padhānanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1204_2: Upakkilesā pahīyantīti cittassa upakkilesabhūtāni nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n:1204_3: Vitakkā vūpasamantīti tato eva kāmavitakkādayo micchāvitakkā upasamaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0103n:1204_4: nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkavūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha.
anya-e0103n:1204_5: Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogo payogo.
anya-e0103n:1204_6: Saṃyojanā pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n:1204_7: Anusayā byantī hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā anuppattidhammatāpādanena bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti.
anya-e0103n:1204_8: Ettha ca saṃyojanappahānaṃ nāma anusayanirodheneva hoti,
anya-e0103n:1204_9: pahīnesu ca saṃyojanesu anusayānaṃ lesopi na bhavissatīti ca dassanatthaṃ “saṃyojanā pahīyanti anusayā byantī hontī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1204_10: Ayaṃ visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.
anya-e0103n:1205_5: tatheva yena dīgharassapajānanādividhinā anupubbaṃ paricitā suṭṭhu bhāvitā,
anya-e0103n:1205_6: tato eva paripuṇṇā soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā.
anya-e0103n:1205_7: So bhikkhu imaṃ attano khandhādilokaṃ paññobhāsena pabhāseti.
anya-e0103n:1205_8: Yathā kiṃ abbhā muttova candimā abbhupakkilesavimutto candimā tārakarājā viyāti.
anya-e0103n:1207_3: vicārādīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1207_7: tasmā taṃ “appanā”ti dassento “avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1207_8: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutīti ettha “anukkamato…pe…
anya-e0103n:1207_9: laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hotī”ti ettako gantho parihīno.
anya-e0103n:1208_3: Gattānisadakapparādīnaṃ sandhiṭṭhānesu valiṃ gaṇhāti tattha tattha valitaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n:1208_4: Yasmā sāraddhakāyo garuko hotīti kāyadarathavūpasamena saddhiṃ sijjhamāno oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodho byatirekamukhena tassa sādhanaṃ viya vutto.
anya-e0103n:1208_6: Tattha kāyadarathe vūpasanteti cittajarūpānaṃ lahumudukammaññabhāvena yo sesatisantatirūpānampi lahuādibhāvo,
anya-e0103n:1208_8: Svāyaṃ yasmā cittassa lahuādibhāvena vinā natthi,
anya-e0103n:1209_0: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1210_1: Uparūpari vibhūtānīti bhāvanābalena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pākaṭāni honti.
anya-e0103n:1211_1: “kassa natthī”ti puggalavasena vīmaṃsiyamānamatthaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vibhāvetuṃ “antomātukucchiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1211_2: Tattha yathā udake nimuggassa puggalassa niruddhokāsatāya assāsapassāsā na pavattanti,
anya-e0103n:1211_11: rūpabhave rūpānaṃ bhavaṅgassa ca sukhumabhāvato rūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0103n:1211_15: Nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti satiyā tattha tattha sukhappavattanatthaṃ thiratarasañjānanaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1211_17: Imamevāti imaṃ eva anupaṭṭhahantassa kāyasaṅkhārassa kaṇṭakuṭṭhāpananayena upaṭṭhāpanavidhimeva.
anya-e0103n:1211_24: bhāventassa anukkamena anupaṭṭhahante assāsapassāse vīmaṃsitvā “ime te”ti upadhāretuṃ,
anya-e0103n:1211_25: sammadeva pajānituñca samatthāhi satipaññāhi virahitassāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1212_3: Sā cassa garukatā bhāvanāya sudukkarabhāvenāti āha “garukabhāvana”nti.
anya-e0103n:1212_4: Uparūpari santasukhumabhāvappattito “balavatī suvisadā sūrā ca satipaññā ca icchitabbā”ti vatvā sukhumassa
anya-e0103n:1212_5: nāma atthassa sādhanenāpi sukhumeneva bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1212_6: Idāni anupaṭṭhahantānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ pariyesanupāyaṃ dassento “tāhi ca panā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1212_12: Satirasmiyā bandhitvāti vā vuttamevatthamāha “tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1212_13: Na hi upameyye bandhanayojanaṭṭhānāni visuṃ labbhanti.
anya-e0103n:1214_2: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ekaṃyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ anekākārato upaṭṭhātīti āha “tañca paneta”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:1214_6: Atthabyañjanasampattiyā samantabhaddakaṃ suttaṃ sabbabhāgamanoharā sabbapāliphullā vanaghaṭā viyāti āha “ekā vanarāji viyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1214_9: Nānānusandhikaṃ nānāpeyyālaṃ vividhanayanipuṇaṃ bahuvidhakammaṭṭhānamukhasuttantaṃ atthikehi sakkaccaṃ samupajīvitabbanti āha “sītacchāyo…pe…
anya-e0103n:1215_2: Natthīti kammaṭṭhānavasena manasikātabbabhāvena natthi na upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n:1215_3: Na ca upacāranti upacārampi na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0103n:1216_0: Idāni vuttasseva atthassa samatthanatthaṃ kakacūpamāyaṃ āgatā “nimitta”ntiādikā gāthā paccānītā.
anya-e0103n:1217_6: handāhaṃ dāni yadā vā tadā vā visesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0103n:1217_7: Visīdeyyāti “ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa nimittampi na uppannaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1218_0: “Imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmīti paṭipannassa nimitta”nti vutte kathaṃ saṅkocāpatti,
anya-e0103n:1218_5: Pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ “anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī”ti,
anya-e0103n:1218_7: phusanañca vissajjetvā ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hotīti ṭhapanāvaseneva bhāvetabbanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1219_7: Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikaroto antarahitā viya honti.
anya-e0103n:1219_11: Sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhatīti tāya eva ṭhapanāya attano cittaṃ upanibandhati,
anya-e0103n:1219_13: Ye pana “vibhāvayanti vibhāvento viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0103n:1219_16: dhitisampannattā dhīro yogī assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento nānākārato te pajānanto vidite pākaṭe karonto,
anya-e0103n:1219_17: nānākāraṃ vā oḷārikoḷārike passambhento vūpasamento tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1219_18: tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
anya-e0103n:1220_4: Nimittassa rakkhaṇaṃ nāma tattha paṭiladdhassa upacārajhānassa rakkhaṇeneva hotīti āha “punappunaṃ manasikāravasena vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ gamayitvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1221_6: Nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1221_16: karajakāyaṃ pana vinā tesaṃ appavattanato “kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1222_1: Paccayaṃ pariyesatīti “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādinā avijjādikaṃ paccayaṃ vīmaṃsati pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1222_2: Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti ādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati pajahati.
anya-e0103n:1222_5: Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikantīti ime obhāsādayo dasa.
anya-e0103n:1222_6: Udayaṃ pahāyāti udayabbayānupassanāya gahitaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ vissajjetvā tesaṃ bhaṅgasseva anupassanato
anya-e0103n:1222_7: bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ patvā ādīnavānupassanāpubbaṅgamāya nibbidānupassanāya nibbindanto.
anya-e0103n:1222_10: Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyo virajjati vimuccatīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1223_1: Visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi paṭhamacatukkavasena adhigatajhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena desitattā.
anya-e0103n:1224_0: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiyā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedanāsīlo,
anya-e0103n:1224_1: tassā vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi,
anya-e0103n:1224_2: taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedayamāno.
anya-e0103n:1224_4: ggahaṇeneva pītiyā sakkaccaṃ viditabhāvo bodhito hoti,
anya-e0103n:1224_5: yehi pana pakārehi tassā saṃvedanaṃ icchitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1225_0: Tattha kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti pucchāvacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1225_1: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatīti pītisahagatāni dve paṭhamadutiyajhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati.
anya-e0103n:1225_3: “Paṭisaṃviditā”ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1225_7: tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
anya-e0103n:1225_9: Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito gahito eva hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā,
anya-e0103n:1225_10: evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1226_0: Kathaṃ asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1226_6: tasmiṃ vidite so yāthāvato vidito eva hoti.
anya-e0103n:1227_7: dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1227_8: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato.
anya-e0103n:1227_9: Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
anya-e0103n:1227_10: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti.
anya-e0103n:1227_11: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1227_12: Tāya satiyāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0103n:1227_13: Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1228_5: Tassa sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1228_6: Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya passantassa.
anya-e0103n:1228_8: Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti “ettakaṃ velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa.
anya-e0103n:1228_9: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasībhāvānaṃ vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
anya-e0103n:1229_3: vipassanāmaggapariyāpannānañca saddhādīnaṃ vasena pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1229_15: Keci panettha pītiyā eva vasena abhiññeyyādīni uddharanti,
anya-e0103n:1229_16: taṃ ayuttaṃ jhānādisamudāyaṃ uddharitvā tato pītiyā niddhāraṇassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n:1230_0: Ettha ca “dīghaṃ assāsavasenā”tiādinā paṭhamacatukkavasena ārammaṇato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1230_5: Kasmā panettha vedanānupassanāyaṃ pītisīsena vedanā gahitā,
anya-e0103n:1230_7: Bhūmivibhāgādivasena vedanaṃ bhinditvā catudhā vedanānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ.
anya-e0103n:1230_8: Apica vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento bhagavā pītiyā oḷārikattā taṃsampayuttasukhaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pītisīsena dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1231_0: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānīti “sukhapaṭisaṃvedī cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī”ti padāni pītipaṭisaṃvedipade āgatanayeneva atthato veditabbāni.
anya-e0103n:1231_2: cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato”tiādinā pītiṭṭhāne sukhādipadāni pakkhipitvā “sukhasahagatāni tīṇi jhānāni,
anya-e0103n:1231_3: cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjatī”tiādinā atthaṃ viññātuṃ.
anya-e0103n:1231_11: “Imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle”tiādinā vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vutto,
anya-e0103n:1232_0: Evaṃ cittasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ atidesena dassetvā yadaññaṃ imasmiṃ catukke vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1232_3: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena taṃsampayuttā vedanā vuttā,
anya-e0103n:1232_6: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra”nti cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃyuttesu dvīsu padesu.
anya-e0103n:1232_8: Tato eva kāmaṃ cittena saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā,
anya-e0103n:1232_10: idha pana upalakkhaṇamattaṃ saññā vedanāva adhippetāti āha “saññāsampayuttā vedanā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1233_1: Cittapaṭisaṃvedīti ettha dvīhākārehi cittapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1233_5: tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhenātiādinā vuttanayānusārena sabbaṃ suviññeyyanti āha “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1233_6: Cittaṃ modentoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno,
anya-e0103n:1233_7: taṃ vā pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā modayamāno.
anya-e0103n:1234_0: Sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodetīti jhānacittasampayuttāya pītisambojjhaṅgabhūtāya odagyalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0103n:1234_1: jhānapītiyā tameva jhānacittaṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena ceva jhānapaccayavasena ca paribrūhento haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ
anya-e0103n:1234_3: Ārammaṇaṃ katvāti uḷāraṃ jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva
anya-e0103n:1234_4: ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaro haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento “āmodeti pamodetī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1235_1: uddhaccapakkhañca anupagamma anonataṃ anunnataṃ yathā indriyānaṃ samattapaṭipattiyā avisamaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1235_2: samādhissa vā ukkaṃsagamanena āneñjappattiyā sammadeva ṭhitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1235_4: Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhenāti aniccādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena.
anya-e0103n:1235_6: Sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti.
anya-e0103n:1236_3: Bhaṅgo hi nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi,
anya-e0103n:1236_4: tasmā tāya bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro cittamukhena sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccato passati,
anya-e0103n:1236_7: dukkhassa ca anattakattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
anya-e0103n:1236_11: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
anya-e0103n:1236_15: Tasmā bhaṅgadassanānusārena “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti saṅkhāragate diṭṭhe tasmiṃ nibbindati,
anya-e0103n:1236_19: So evaṃ nibbindanto virajjanto lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti,
anya-e0103n:1236_22: Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ,
anya-e0103n:1236_30: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato,
anya-e0103n:1236_31: saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1236_32: Tasmā tāya samannāgato yogāvacaro vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati,
anya-e0103n:1236_34: Tena vuttaṃ “so vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento …pe…
anya-e0103n:1236_35: paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati cā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1237_2: Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1238_2: aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo aniccānupassīti ettha kiṃ panetaṃ aniccaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1238_5: kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ vibhāvetabbanti taṃ dassento “aniccaṃ veditabba”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1239_0: Tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1239_3: atthato saṅkhatā dhammāti āha “aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n:1239_6: Tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ ahutvā sambhavo attalābho uppādo.
anya-e0103n:1239_9: Yathā hi uppādāvatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo natthi,
anya-e0103n:1239_14: Ekaṃsena ca uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno abhedo icchitabbo,
anya-e0103n:1240_1: tasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye aniccatāsamaññāti “aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta”nti vatvā visesato dhammānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1241_4: Accantamettha etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārā virajjanti nirujjhantīti accantavirāgo, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1241_14: pade vuttanayānusārena “dve nirodhā khayanirodho ca accantanirodho cā”ti evamādiatthavaṇṇanaṃ atidisati,
anya-e0103n:1241_15: tasmā virāgaṭṭhāne nirodhapadaṃ pakkhipitvā “khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tassa atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1242_0: Paṭinissajjanaṃ pahātabbassa tadaṅgavasena vā samucchedavasena vā pariccajanaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo.
anya-e0103n:1242_1: Tathā sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggabhūte visaṅkhāre attano nissajjanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1242_2: tanninnatāya vā tadārammaṇatāya vā tattha pakkhandanaṃ pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo.
anya-e0103n:1243_0: Tadaṅgavasenāti ettha aniccānupassanā tāva tadaṅgappahānavasena niccasaññaṃ pariccajati,
anya-e0103n:1243_1: pariccajantī ca tathā appavattiyaṃ ye “nicca”nti gahaṇavasena kilesā,
anya-e0103n:1243_6: Tenāha “vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1244_4: Saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatīti maggena kilesesu pariccattesu avipākadhammatāpādanena abhisaṅkhārā,
anya-e0103n:1244_5: tammūlakā ca khandhā anuppattirahabhāvena pariccattā nāma hontīti sabbepi te maggo pariccajatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1244_8: Maggañāṇampi hi gotrabhuñāṇassa anu pacchā nibbānadassanato “anupassanā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1245_0: Soḷasavatthuvasena cāti soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasenāpi vuccamānasantabhāvādivasenāpīti samuccayattho ca- saddo.
anya-e0103n:1246_4: Uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu pavattiyeva ito cito ca cittassa vidhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1247_3: Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti kāyānupassanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena tassā bhāvanāya pavattanato.
anya-e0103n:1247_4: Satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya vinā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā abhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1248_5: Tasmāti tīsu bhavesu nihīne kāmabhave pavattanato.
anya-e0103n:1248_10: Cuticittassa puratoti vā cuticittaṃ avadhibhāvena gahetvā tato oraṃ soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvāti
anya-e0103n:1248_11: evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatāva assāsapassāsānaṃ vuttā hoti.
anya-e0103n:1249_0: Ime kira imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭā hontīti ānetvā sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1251_0: Candālokaṃ oloketvāti juṇhapakkhe padosavelāyaṃ samantato āsiñcamānakhīradhāraṃ viya gaganatalaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1251_3: kīva ciraṃ nu kho ayaṃ dukkhabhāro vahitabbo”ti attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā parikkhīṇeti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1251_4: Lekhaṃ katvāti caṅkame tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1254_2: Sabbadukkhūpasamasaṅkhātassāti dukkhadukkhādibhedaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ upasammati etthāti sabbadukkhūpasamoti saṅkhātabbassa.
anya-e0103n:1255_0: “Paññattidhammā”tiādīsu asabhāvopi ñāṇena dhārīyati avadhārīyatīti dhammoti vuccatīti tato nivattento “dhammāti sabhāvā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1255_4: Te hi attano sabhāvassa dhāraṇato dhammāti,
anya-e0103n:1255_16: Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā mānamadādayo taṃ patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha “tamāgamma…pe…
anya-e0103n:1255_18: Tattha “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā maññanāvasena pavatto māno eva mānamado.
anya-e0103n:1255_23: Madā nimmadīyanti ettha amadabhāvaṃ vināsaṃ gacchantīti madanimmadano.
anya-e0103n:1255_27: Kāmaguṇā eva āliyanti ettha sattāti kāmaguṇālayā.
anya-e0103n:1256_0: Ye guṇe nimittaṃ katvā madanimmadanādināmāni nibbāne niruḷhāni,
anya-e0103n:1256_1: te madanimmadanatādike yathāvutte nibbattitanibbānaguṇe eva gahetvā āha “madanimmadanatādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ vasenā”ti,
anya-e0103n:1256_2: na pana madā nimmadīyanti etenāti evamādike.
anya-e0103n:1256_8: Nibbānaṃ hi kenaci pariyāyena asantabhāvābhāvato ekaṃseneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena saccaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1256_16: atisukhumasantasabhāvatāya ca anupacitañāṇasambhārehi daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya suṭṭhu duddasaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1256_18: etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa jarābhāvoti ajaraṃ.
anya-e0103n:1256_19: Tato eva jarādīhi apalokiyatāya thiraṭṭhena dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1257_4: ca bodhitā idha avuttā guṇā saṅgayhanti,
anya-e0103n:1257_5: tattha natthi etassa uppādanto vā vayanto vāti ananto,
anya-e0103n:1257_21: Sacchikiriyaṃ muñcitvā na takkañāṇena avacaritabboti atakkāvacaro.
anya-e0103n:1257_22: Buddhādīhi paṇḍiteheva veditabbato adhigantabbato paṇḍitavedanīyoti evamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1258_8: Sukhaṃ supatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ mettākathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0103n:1264_1: aññaṃ adhigantukāmena aññattha ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā kimatthiyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1264_3: Tathā hi adosaniddese “metti mettāyanā mettāyitatta”nti niddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1264_5: Sā pana atthato adosappadhānā cattāro arūpakkhandhāti mettāya sijjhamānāya titikkhākhanti siddhā eva hotīti āha “khanti adhigantabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1265_0: Khantī paramaṃ tapoti parāpakārasahanādikā titikkhalakkhaṇā khanti uttamaṃ tapo akattabbākaraṇakattabbakaraṇalakkhaṇāya sammāpaṭipattiyā mūlabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1265_1: Khantibalaṃ balānīkanti paramaṃ maṅgalabhūtā khanti eva balaṃ etassāti khantibalaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1265_3: Dosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya anīkabhūtena teneva ca khantibalena balānīkaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1265_4: Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti attano paresañca anatthapaṭibāhano,
anya-e0103n:1265_5: atthāvaho ca khantito uttari apassayo natthi.
anya-e0103n:1266_7: Paṭhamanti vakkhamānena koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsantarupasaṃharaṇanayena vinā sabbapaṭhamaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1267_11: “appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṃ acarī”tiādinā ca āghātavatthubhūto,
anya-e0103n:1268_0: Idāni yathāvuttesu chasu puggalesu abhāvetabbatāya kāraṇaṃ dassento “appiyaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1268_1: Tattha appiyaṃ hi piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti dosena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha.
anya-e0103n:1268_3: na ca tassa piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapanena vinā bhāvanā sijjhati.
anya-e0103n:1268_4: Atippiyasahāyakaṃ majjhattaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatīti rāgena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha atippiyasahāyassa gehassitapemaṭṭhānabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1268_6: Majjhattaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāhi majjhasabhāvaṃ neva piyaṃ nāppiyanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1268_7: Garuṭṭhāne piyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapento kilamati majjhatte sambhāvanīyapiyāyitabbatānaṃ abhāvā.
anya-e0103n:1269_2: Bhittiyuddhamakāsīti sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pihitadvāre gabbhe sayanapīṭhe nisīditvā mettaṃ bhāvento mettāmukhena
anya-e0103n:1269_3: uppannarāgena andhīkato bhariyāya santikaṃ gantukāmo dvāraṃ asallakkhetvā bhittiṃ bhinditvāpi nikkhamitukāmatāya
anya-e0103n:1270_0: Ādānanikkhepaparicchinne addhāpaccuppannabhūte dharamānatāya paccakkhato viya upalabbhamāne khandhappabandhe idha sattādiggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1270_2: Kasmā pana kālakate mettābhāvanā na ijjhatīti?
anya-e0103n:1270_5: Yattha sati sambhave payogato hitūpasaṃhāro labbheyya,
anya-e0103n:1270_7: Dukkhāpanayanamodappavattīsupi eseva nayoti karuṇābhāvanādīnampi kālakate anijjhanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1270_8: Aññattha paguṇamettājhāno ācariyassa kālakatabhāvaṃ ajānanto taṃ mettāya pharitukāmo “ācariyaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ ārabhatī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n:1270_12: so jīvati na jīvatī”ti jānāhīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1271_1: Attani bhāvanā nāma sakkhibhāvatthāti nānāvidhasukhānubandhaanavajjasukhaabyāsekasukhādi yaṃ attani upalabbhati,
anya-e0103n:1271_2: taṃ nidassento tassa vattamānatāya āha “ahaṃ sukhito homī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1271_4: īdisassa puggalassa anokāsaṃ cittadukkhanti tadabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “niddukkhoti vā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1271_8: Sā panāyaṃ niddukkhatā verīnaṃ puggalānaṃ verasaññitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ abhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1271_10: anavajjakāyikasukhasamaṅgitāya ca hotīti dassento āha “avero abyāpajjo anīgho sukhī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1271_11: Attānaṃ pariharāmīti evaṃbhūto hutvā mama attabhāvaṃ pavattemi,
anya-e0103n:1272_4: “Yaṃ vibhaṅge vutta”nti vatvā vibhaṅgadesanāya samānagatikaṃ suttapadaṃ āharanto “kathañca bhikkhū”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1273_3: Sakkhibhāvavasenāti ahaṃ viya sabbe sattā attano sukhakāmā,
anya-e0103n:1273_4: tasmā tesu mayā attani viya sukhūpasaṃhāro kātabboti evaṃ tattha attānaṃ sakkhibhāve ṭhapanavasena.
anya-e0103n:1273_6: Kasmā pana attani bhāvanā appanāvahā na hotīti?
anya-e0103n:1273_8: Koṭṭhāsantare pana bhāvitabhāvanassa tatthāpi sīmasambhedo hotiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1274_2: Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacīti sabbussāhena pariyesanto atisayena attato piyataraṃ aññaṃ sattaṃ katthaci disāya neva adhigaccheyya na passeyya.
anya-e0103n:1274_3: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassaci attato piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena puthu visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo.
anya-e0103n:1275_1: attano ca piyatarabhāvaṃ nidassetvā tesu karuṇāyanaṃ vadatā bhagavatā sukhesitāya “attānaṃ sakkhibhāve
anya-e0103n:1275_2: ṭhapetvā sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā”ti mettābhāvanāya nayadassanaṃ katamevāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1277_2: tādisaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa bhāvanaṃ ārabhanto yogī yuttappattakārī,
anya-e0103n:1277_4: tena pana yoginā tāvatā santoso na kātabboti.
anya-e0103n:1277_7: attā piyo majjhatto verīti vibhāgākaraṇanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1277_11: garuṭṭhānīye paṭiladdhaṃ mettāmanasikāraṃ atippiyasahāyake upasaṃharitabbanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1277_12: Sukhūpasaṃhārakatassa taṃ hoti pageva paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhitattā.
anya-e0103n:1277_13: Atippiyasahāyakato anantaraṃ majjhatte mettā bhāvetabbā majjhattaṃ piyagaruṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ sukarabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1277_15: Paguṇamanasikārādhigamato paṭṭhāya hissa sopi piyaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n:1277_16: Majjhattato verīpuggaleti majjhattapuggale mettāyantena tattha paguṇamanasikārādhigamena piyabhāvaṃ upasaṃharitvā
anya-e0103n:1277_17: tadanantaraṃ verīpuggalaṃ bhāvanāya majjhatte ṭhapetvā tato majjhattato piyabhāvūpasaṃhārena verīpuggale
anya-e0103n:1277_20: Ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvāti piyagaruṭṭhānīyo, atippiyo,
anya-e0103n:1277_22: verīti catūsu puggalakoṭṭhāsesu paṭhamaṃ tāva piyagaruṭṭhānīye mettābhāvanaṃ adhigantvā vasībhāvappattiyā
anya-e0103n:1277_23: tathāpavattaṃ cittaṃ koṭṭhāsantarūpasaṃhāratthaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ atippiyasahāye atippiyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1277_24: vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvamatte cittaṃ ṭhapentena bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā,
anya-e0103n:1277_25: tampi vasībhāvāpādanena muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ majjhatte udāsinabhāvaṃ vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā,
anya-e0103n:1277_26: puna tampi vasībhāvāpādanena muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ verimhi verīsaññaṃ vikkhambhetvā majjhattabhāvūpaṭṭhapanamukhena
anya-e0103n:1278_0: Verīpuggalo vā natthi kammabalena vā etarahi payogasampattiyā vā sabbaso anatthakarassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1278_2: Tādiso hi sabbasaho parāparādhaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññati.
anya-e0103n:1278_3: Tena vuttaṃ “anatthaṃ karontepi pare verīsaññāva nuppajjatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1279_1: Purimapuggalesūti piyādīsu jhānassa ārammaṇabhūtesu purimesu puggalesu.
anya-e0103n:1279_2: Mettaṃ samāpajjitvāti paṭighaṃ vikkhambhetvā uppāditaṃ mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā.
anya-e0103n:1279_3: Mettāyantena paṭighaṃ paṭivinodetabbanti ettha keci pana “upacārajjhānaṃ sampādetvā”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0103n:1279_4: tesaṃ upacārajjhānato vuṭṭhānampi icchitabbaṃ siyā “vuṭṭhahitvā”ti vuttattā.
anya-e0103n:1279_5: Pubbe tasmiṃ puggale asatiyā amanasikārena paṭighaṃ anuppādentassa sādhāraṇato taṃ vikkhambhetvā jhānassa uppādanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1279_7: Idāni pana taṃ anussarantassapi manasi karontassapi yathā paṭighaṃ na uppajjati,
anya-e0103n:1279_8: taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ “taṃ puggalaṃ mettāyantena paṭighaṃ vinodetabba”nti.
anya-e0103n:1280_0: Anusāratoti anugamanato, paccavekkhaṇatoti attho. Ghaṭitabbanti vāyamitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1281_0: Tañca kho ghaṭanaṃ vāyamanaṃ. Iminā idāni vakkhamānena ākārena.
anya-e0103n:1282_0: Ubhato dvīsu ṭhānesu daṇḍo etassāti ubhatodaṇḍakaṃ, tena.
anya-e0103n:1282_12: Sārambhādikassa kilesānubandhassa vatthubhāvato kodhassa sāvajjataṃ ñatvāpi kujjhanato sace kodhe anavajjasaññī
anya-e0103n:1283_7: Dubbaṇṇova hotīti pakatiyā vaṇṇavāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattopi mukhavikārādivasena virūpo eva hoti etarahi,
anya-e0103n:1283_9: Kodhābhibhavassa ekantikamidaṃ phalanti dīpetuṃ “dubbaṇṇo vā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ katvā puna “kodhābhibhūto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1284_3: Majjhe gūthagatanti vemajjhaṭṭhāne sunakhassa vā siṅgālassa vā uhadena gūthena makkhitaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1284_7: Imanti “so ca hoti abhijjhālū”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sandhāya satthā vadati,
anya-e0103n:1285_0: So dāni tvantiādi yathāvuttehi suttapadehi attano ovadanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1286_1: Yo yo dhammoti kāyasamācārādīsu yo yo sucaritadhammo.
anya-e0103n:1288_1: Paṭisanthārakusaloti yathā parehi chiddaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1288_7: Pubbabhāsīti yena kenaci samāgato paṭisanthāravasena paṭhamaṃyeva ābhāsanasīlo.
anya-e0103n:1288_9: Sarabhāṇaṃ pana karonto parimaṇḍalehi paripuṇṇehi padehi ca byañjanehi ca abyākulehi dhammakathaṃ katheti.
anya-e0103n:1290_1: evarūpo puggalo nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjanto bahukālaṃ tattheva saṃsaratīti dassetuṃ “aṭṭhamahānirayasoḷasaussadanirayaparipūrako
anya-e0103n:1290_4: Avīcimahānirayassa dvāre dvāre cattāro cattāro katvā kukkuḷādayo soḷasa ussadanirayā.
anya-e0103n:1290_7: tattha paṭigho anokāsovāti āha “kāruññampi paṭicca āghāto vūpasammatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1291_0: Imassa ca atthassāti “yo yo dhammo”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa.
anya-e0103n:1292_2: so tassa vasena “attano visaye”ti vutto bhikkhuno kāyo.
anya-e0103n:1292_11: Kodho hi uppajjamānova pāṇātipātādivasena hirottappādīni ucchindati.
anya-e0103n:1293_5: Dukkhaṃ tassa ca nāmāti dukkhañca nāma tassa aparādhakassa.
anya-e0103n:1294_1: sattu pana tassa vasavattitāya dāsasadisoti aṭṭhānaṃ paccāpakiriyāya.
anya-e0103n:1294_3: Khaṇikattāti udayavayaparicchinno attano pavattikālasaṅkhāto khaṇo etesaṃ atthīti khaṇikā,
anya-e0103n:1294_5: Kassa dānīdha kujjhasīti aparādhakassa santāne yehi khandhehi te aparādho kato,
anya-e0103n:1294_7: Idāni pana aññe tiṭṭhantīti kassa tvaṃ idha kujjhasi.
anya-e0103n:1294_8: Na hi yuttaṃ anaparādhesu kujjhananti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1294_9: Taṃ vinā kassa so kareti yo puggalo yassa dukkhaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n:1294_10: taṃ dukkhakiriyāya visayabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ vinā kassa nāma so dukkhakārako dukkhaṃ kare kareyya.
anya-e0103n:1294_11: Sayampi dukkhahetu tvamitīti evaṃ sayampi tvaṃ etassa dukkhassa hetu,
anya-e0103n:1294_12: evaṃ samāne tassa tuyhañca tassa dukkhassa hetubhāve kiṃ kāraṇā tassa kujjhasi na tuyhanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1295_1: Paralokepi anugāmibhāvato kammaṃyeva sakaṃ santakaṃ etesanti kammassakā,
anya-e0103n:1295_4: nisedhanañca bhāvino kammassāti āha “yaṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1295_8: so tassa kammassa phalanissandena “neva sammāsambodhi”ntiādinā byatirekato vuccamānamevatthaṃ joteti.
anya-e0103n:1296_0: 247. Satthu pubbacariyaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā, satthu gāravenāpi paṭighaṃ vūpasameyyāti.
anya-e0103n:1297_0: Bodhisattopi samāno nanu te satthā cittaṃ nappadūsesi,
anya-e0103n:1297_2: Deviyā paduṭṭhenāti deviyā saddhiṃ padubbhinā micchācāravasena aparaddhena.
anya-e0103n:1297_6: Purisakāraṃ katvāti āvāṭato nikkhamanatthāya bāhubalena purisakāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1298_0: Āsīsethevāti yathādhippete atthe ñāyato anavajjato āsaṃ kareyya.
anya-e0103n:1298_1: Na nibbindeyyāti “evaṃ kicchāpannassa me kuto sotthibhāvo”ti na nibbindeyya.
anya-e0103n:1298_4: Yathā icchinti yena pakārena kassaci pīḷaṃ akatvā rajje patiṭṭhitaṃ attānaṃ icchiṃ,
anya-e0103n:1299_0: Kāsiraññāti kalābunā kāsirājena. Sakaṇṭakāhīti ayakaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭakāhi.
anya-e0103n:1301_0: Cittapariggaṇhanakāloti visevanaṃ kātuṃ adatvā cittassa sammadeva damanakālo.
anya-e0103n:1302_4: Imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā mayi evaṃ karaṇaṃ nāma na tava vasena hoti,
anya-e0103n:1302_6: rājamattassa vā ayaṃ payogo uyyojanāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1304_5: Taṃ pana yasmā upacārena pathassa hitanti vuccati,
anya-e0103n:1304_7: “Mittadubbhī vatāyaṃ andhabālo”ti kāruññena assupuṇṇehi nettehi taṃ purisaṃ udikkhamāno.
anya-e0103n:1305_0: Mā ayyosi me bhadanteti ettha māti nipātamattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1305_2: tena upari tena kātabbaṃ vippakāraṃ paṭisedheti.
anya-e0103n:1305_3: Ayyo meti ayyirako tvaṃ mama atithibhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1305_5: Tvaṃ nāmetādisaṃ karīti tvampi evarūpaṃ akāsi nāma.
anya-e0103n:1306_0: Tiracchānabhūtopi pana mahākapi hutvā khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1307_0: Peḷāya pakkhipantepīti khuddakāya peḷāya pādehi koṭetvā pakkhipantepi.
anya-e0103n:1308_8: uttamattho na sijjhatīti tadā attanā tattha diṭṭhaṃ ādīnavaṃ dasseti bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:1309_0: Aḷārāti yena sayaṃ tadā luddahatthato mocito,
anya-e0103n:1310_0: Ativiya ayuttaṃ appatirūpaṃ paṭighacittuppādanena kenaci appaṭisamakhantiguṇassa satthusāsanāvokkamanappasaṅgato.
anya-e0103n:1312_1: Saṅkū laggāpetvā te ālambitvā gamanamaggo saṅkupatho.
anya-e0103n:1312_5: Aññāni ca dukkarāni karitvā dhanāsāya pabbatavidugganadīviduggādipakkhandanavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1312_8: tatra nappatirūpaṃ manaṃ padūsetunti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādetabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1312_9: Evaṃ cittuppādanañca etarahi dissamānena puttādīnaṃ posanādinā atītassa anumānato gahaṇavasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1314_2: Aparādho nāma aparajjhantassa puggalassa rūpadhammamukhena gayhatīti katvā āha “kiṃ kesānaṃ kujjhasī”tiādi,
anya-e0103n:1314_4: Idāni nibbattitaparamatthadhammavaseneva vinibbhogavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1314_8: Kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti yathā āragge sāsapassa,
anya-e0103n:1314_10: evamassa “verī”ti parikappite puggale kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1315_4: Tassevaṃ karototi evaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ karontassa tassa dāyakassa.
anya-e0103n:1315_6: “Mama mātarā upāsikāya dinno”ti idaṃ “dhammiyalābho”ti etassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1316_0: Sabbatthasādhakanti “attattho parattho diṭṭhadhammiko attho samparāyiko attho”ti evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ, hitānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1317_4: gahaṇeneva cettha appiyapuggalassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ verimhi mettāya siddhāya tasmimpi mettāsiddhito,
anya-e0103n:1317_5: piyato pana atippiyasahāyakassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ āsannapaccatthikassa dubbinimocayabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1318_5: Hitacittova pāṇinanti kevalaṃ sattesu hitacitto evāti pavuccati,
anya-e0103n:1318_6: na pana “mettāya nikāmalābhī”ti vā “kusalī”ti vā pavuccati. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n:1318_8: Kasmā panāyaṃ hitacitto kusalīti na vuccatīti?
anya-e0103n:1318_10: Imassa ca puggalassa mettābhāvanā na visesavatī.
anya-e0103n:1318_11: Atha vā na nikāmalābhī mettāya yato attādīsu passati nānattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1318_13: yasmā hitacittova pāṇinanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1318_14: Gāmasīmādayo viya gāmantarādīhi sattasaṅkhāte mettāvisaye bhāvanāya pubbe aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇamariyādārūpena
anya-e0103n:1318_15: ṭhitattā attādayo idha sīmā nāmāti āha “catasso sīmāyo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1318_16: Sambhinnā hontīti ettha vuttaṃ sambhedaṃ dassetuṃ “samaṃ pharati mettāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1319_1: Nimittanti yathā kasiṇakammaṭṭhānādīsu taṃtaṃkasiṇamaṇḍalādipariggahamukhena bhāvanāvasena laddhaṃ uggahanimittaṃ
anya-e0103n:1319_3: na evamidha upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0103n:1319_6: Tasmiṃ hi laddhe bhāvanāya sātisayattā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti,
anya-e0103n:1320_2: Pañcaṅgavippahīnantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva.
anya-e0103n:1321_0: “Paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ aññataravasenā”ti idaṃ vakkhamānāya vikubbanāya tesaṃ sādhāraṇatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1321_3: anodhiso ca disāpharaṇādivasena jhānassa pavijambhanā vikubbanā vividhā kiriyāti katvā.
anya-e0103n:1322_1: Mettāsahagatenāti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā mettāya saha pavattena saṃsaṭṭhena sampayuttenāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1322_2: Yasmā pana taṃ vuttanayena mettāya sahagataṃ,
anya-e0103n:1322_5: saddo “adhicetaso”tiādīsu samādhipariyāyopi hotīti tato visesetuṃ “cetasāti cittenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1322_7: Disodhipariggaho sattodhipariggahamukheneva hotīti dassento āha “ekissā disāya paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1322_10: Pharaṇañca sārammaṇassa dhammassa attano ārammaṇassa phassanā paccakkhato dassanaṃ gahaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇamevāti
anya-e0103n:1322_17: tena sambandhañca vinā natthīti tadubhayampi dassetuṃ “yathā puratthimādīsū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1322_18: Tattha tathā dutiyanti ettha pharitvā viharatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1322_26: evaṃ uddhaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1322_31: saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassetuṃ “adhodisampi tiriyaṃ disampī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1322_38: yattha tattha vā attano heṭṭhimadisāya sattā gayhanti,
anya-e0103n:1322_40: yattha tattha vā attano uparimadisāyaṃ sattā gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1323_2: Īsakampi bahi avikkhipamānoti appakampi kammaṭṭhānato bahi vikkhepaṃ anāpajjanto hitūpasaṃhārato aññathā thokampi avattamāno.
anya-e0103n:1323_3: Sabbattatāyāti vā sabbena attabhāvena yathā sabbabhāvena attani attano attabhāve hitesitā,
anya-e0103n:1323_4: evaṃ sabbadhi sabbasattesu mettāya pharitvā viharatīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1323_7: tasmā sabbasattakāyasaṅkhātā pajā etassa atthīti sabbāvantoti padatthato dassento “sabbāvantanti sabbasattavanta”nti āha.
anya-e0103n:1323_16: Pariyāyadassane ca pubbe gahitapadānipi puna gayhanti,
anya-e0103n:1323_17: yathā “saddhā saddahanā”ti ettha vuttampi saddhāpadaṃ puna indriyādipariyāyadassane “saddhā saddhindriya”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1323_18: Tathāsaddo vā itisaddo vā na vuttoti “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti etassa anuvattako tathā-
anya-e0103n:1323_20: saddo ca tesaṃ pharaṇānantarādiṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhānanti katvā te na vuttāti puna “mettāsahagatena cetasāti vutta”nti attho.
anya-e0103n:1323_21: Vuttassevatthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti āha “nigamanavasena vā etaṃ vutta”nti.
anya-e0103n:1323_22: Nanu ca samāpanavasena vuttassevatthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti?
anya-e0103n:1323_23: Nāyaṃ doso odhisoanodhisopharaṇānaṃ samāpane eva vuttattā.
anya-e0103n:1323_25: mahattañcassa asubhakammaṭṭhānādīsu viya ārammaṇassa ekadesameva aggahetvā anavasesaggahaṇavasenāti āha “pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1324_1: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandacittavīriyapaññehi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ.
anya-e0103n:1324_8: Taṃ hi pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya appamāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1324_18: Taṃ panassa abyāpajjattaṃ pañcaviññāṇādīnaṃ viya na sabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1324_21: tesu tesu ca suttapadesesu āgataṃ mettābrahmavihāravikubbanamāha.
anya-e0103n:1325_3: dasahākārehī”ti ākāravibhāgena paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttāya ca vikubbanāya majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvamupasaṃharati
anya-e0103n:1325_5: Kevalaṃ panettha paṭisambhidāmagge viya sattodhi na gahitoti ayameva viseso.
anya-e0103n:1326_0: Idāni bhedābhāvadassanamukhena uddesato ānītaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ niddesato dassetvā tassā anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tattha cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1327_4: “sattā”ti pana padena paricchinnaṃ attano visayaṃ asesetvāva pariyādiyatīti āha “anavasesapariyādānameta”nti.
anya-e0103n:1328_1: Sattoti sajjanakiccena chandādipariyāyena lobhena āsatto laggo.
anya-e0103n:1329_3: avītarāgesu vā pavattitvā indriyabaddhakhandhasantānatāya taṃsadisesu vītarāgesu ruḷhena saddena.
anya-e0103n:1329_4: Atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi aññasmiṃ tannimittayutte katthaci visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāya
anya-e0103n:1329_5: nimittavirahepi pavatti ruḷhī nāma yathā “gacchantīti gāvo”ti,
anya-e0103n:1329_8: Satvayogatoti ettha satvaṃ nāma buddhi, vīriyaṃ, tejo vā,
anya-e0103n:1330_6: Sattā hi nibbattantā taṃtaṃsattanikāyaṃ pūrentā viya honti,
anya-e0103n:1330_13: Paññattimattasambhavatoti paramatthato asantepi sattasaññite paññattimattena sambhavato.
anya-e0103n:1331_0: Yathā ca sattāti vacananti yathā satta-
anya-e0103n:1331_1: saddo yathāvuttenaṭṭhena nippariyāyato padesavuttipi ruḷhīvasena anavasesapariyādāyako.
anya-e0103n:1331_3: Tānipi hi rūpārūpabhavūpagacatutthajjhānādisamaṅgīnaṃ assāsapassāsābhāvato avinipātadhammānaṃ pugalanassa abhāvato padesavuttīni.
anya-e0103n:1331_4: Ruḷhīvasena āropetvā yathāvuttāya ruḷhiyā vasena katthaci visaye avijjamānampi pāṇapuggalabhāvaṃ āropetvā.
anya-e0103n:1331_5: Yadi sādhāraṇato sattavevacanānīti gahetvā anodhisopharaṇā mettā vuccati,
anya-e0103n:1331_6: atha kasmā pañcaheva ākārehi vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmañcā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1331_7: Keci panāhu “na kho panetāni “sattā”tiādīni padāni vevacanatāmattaṃ upādāya gahitāni,
anya-e0103n:1331_13: Tesaṃ taṃ matimattanti dassento āha “anodhisopharaṇā virujjhatī”ti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n:1331_17: Tathā atthaṃ aggahetvāti sattādisaddā sappadesavisayāti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā pubbe vuttanayena nippadesavisayāti evamatthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1331_19: Pañcasu ākāresūti “sabbe sattā”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ āgatesu pañcasu bhāvanākāresu.
anya-e0103n:1332_1: Idāni dvāvīsatiyā bhāvanākāresu appanā pariggahetvā dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1332_3: Tasmāti yasmā na kevalaṃ yathāvuttaākāravibhāgamattato appanāvibhāgo, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:1332_5: Yaṃ yaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yadipi pubbabhāge tattha tattha abhinivese anekakoṭṭhāsavaseneva manasikāraṃ pavatteti,
anya-e0103n:1332_6: bhāvanāya samijjhanakkhaṇe pana tattha yaṃ paguṇataratāya supākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1333_1: Tatiyā pana pakati yadipi paṭhamadukena na saṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n:1333_2: dutiyadukena pana tikena ca saṅgahitā eva.
anya-e0103n:1335_1: Evaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha ānisaṃse vibhāvetuṃ “itī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1335_2: Tattha sesā janāti mettāya cetovimuttiyā alābhino.
anya-e0103n:1335_3: Samparivattamānāti dakkhiṇena passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā.
anya-e0103n:1335_5: Sukhaṃ supatīti ettha duvidhāsupanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0103n:1335_8: Yasmā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati,
anya-e0103n:1336_0: Niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1336_2: ito cito viparivattanañca hotīti āha “nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1336_3: Ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādirahitova paṭibujjhati.
anya-e0103n:1337_4: Dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1338_0: Ure āmuttamuttāhāro viyāti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1338_2: anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1339_1: Sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā desassa khematāya,
anya-e0103n:1341_1: Thero kira attanā paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhavihāre “ahamettha āgantuko”ti acintetvā tattha tattha yathārahaṃ attanā kātabbavattāni paripūrento eva vihāsi.
anya-e0103n:1341_3: Ayaṃ hi thero arahattādhigamato pubbepi mettāvihārī ahosi.
anya-e0103n:1342_0: Vanantare ṭhitoti thero kira tathā samappavattavāsavasena caramāno ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ vanantaraṃ
anya-e0103n:1342_1: disvā tattha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā yathāparicchedena tato uṭṭhito attano guṇāvajjanahetukena
anya-e0103n:1343_3: Rukkhadevatānaṃ hi yebhuyyena nivāsarukkhavasena vohāro yathā phandanadevatāti.
anya-e0103n:1345_0: Khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati kenaci paripanthena parihīnajjhānassa byāpādassa dūrasamussāritabhāvato khippameva samādhiyati.
anya-e0103n:1345_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena adhigatajjhānānampi sukhasupanādayo ānisaṃsā labbhanti, yathāha –
anya-e0103n:1348_1: tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato brahmavihārānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1348_5: Byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu siddhesu sukhasupanādayo hatthagatā eva hontīti.
anya-e0103n:1350_3: “idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā aññataraññatarena vā sattānaṃ viheṭhanajātiko hotī”ti evaṃ vuttaviheṭhaneti attho.
anya-e0103n:1350_5: Yathā tathā sattānaṃ viheṭhanāya pāpako vipāko idha ceva samparāye ca.
anya-e0103n:1350_6: Tathā hi yo satte jīvitā voropanena vā aṅgapaccaṅgacchedanena vā dhanajāniyā vā alābhāya vā avāsāya vā
anya-e0103n:1350_7: anatthāya vā ayasatthāya vā parisaṃsakkanena vā antamaso yathāvajjadassanenapi viheṭheti,
anya-e0103n:1350_8: tassa so pamādavihāro diṭṭheva dhamme alābhāyapi hoti,
anya-e0103n:1350_18: appāyukopi hoti parittajīvitoti evamādianekānatthānubandhitā vihesāya paccavekkhitabbā,
anya-e0103n:1350_20: Tena vuttaṃ “nikkaruṇatāya ādīnavaṃ karuṇāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1350_22: Piyaṃ hi puggalaṃ karuṇāyitumārabhantassa na tāva piyabhāvo vigacchati,
anya-e0103n:1351_3: So hi bhogapārijuññato sukhasādhanānaṃ abhāvena dukkhaṃ gato upagato duggatoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1351_4: Atha vā duggatanti dukkhena samaṅgibhāvaṃ gataṃ.
anya-e0103n:1351_7: Kāyaduccaritādīhi upetattā tamaparāyaṇabhāve ṭhito durupetoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1352_0: Vadhetha nanti “ghātetha naṃ cora”nti evaṃ pahitāya rañño āṇāya khādanīyampi…pe…
anya-e0103n:1353_0: Eteneva upāyenāti yena yena vidhinā etarahi yathāvutte paramakicchāpanne āyatiṃ vā dukkhabhāgimhi puggale karuṇāyituṃ karuṇā uppāditā,
anya-e0103n:1353_3: Etarahi vā dissamānaṃ āyatiṃ vā bhāviniṃ dukkhappattiṃ gahetvā karuṇā pavattetabbāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1353_5: Yo hi so karuṇāya vatthubhūto duvidho puggalo vutto,
anya-e0103n:1353_7: iminā pana bhikkhunā tattha bhāvanaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā sīmāsambhedaṃ kātuṃ tadanantaraṃ piyapuggale,
anya-e0103n:1353_10: Bhāventena ca ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvā tadanantare tadanantare upasaṃharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1353_12: mahāpurisajātikattā vā anatthaṃ karontepi verisaññāva nuppajjati,
anya-e0103n:1353_13: tena majjhatte me cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1353_14: idāni verimhi upasaṃharāmīti byāpārova na kātabbo.
anya-e0103n:1354_3: “kakacūpamaovādādīnaṃ anussarato”tiādinā ca mettābhāvanāya vuttena nayena taṃ paṭighaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1354_4: Evaṃ etarahi mahādukkhappatte sukhitepi akatakusalatāya āyatiṃ dukkhappattiyā vasena karuṇāyanavidhiṃ
anya-e0103n:1354_5: dassetvā idāni katakalyāṇepi taṃ dassetuṃ “yopi cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1354_7: Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ anatikkantattāti sammāsambuddhenāpi akkhānena pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa anāgatassa āpāyikassa
anya-e0103n:1354_10: sukhappattiyā akatakusalatāya vā katākusalatāya vāti sabbapakārenapi karuṇāya vatthubhāvassa sallakkhaṇena
anya-e0103n:1354_11: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ puggale karuṇaṃ katvā karuṇābhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā.
anya-e0103n:1354_12: Vuttanayenevāti “athānena punappunaṃ mettāyantenā”tiādinā mettābhāvanāyaṃ vuttena nayena.
anya-e0103n:1354_14: Mettāya vuttanayenevāti yathā mettābhāvanāyaṃ “appakasirenevā”tiādinā tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanā
anya-e0103n:1354_15: “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā tassā vaḍḍhanā ca vuttā,
anya-e0103n:1354_16: evamidha karuṇābhāvanāyaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanā veditabbā ca vaḍḍhetabbā ca,
anya-e0103n:1354_18: Vuttanayenevāti avadhāraṇena “paṭhamaṃ veripuggalo karuṇāyitabbo”ti idaṃ yathā pāḷiviruddhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1354_20: Paṭhamaṃ hi veriṃ samanussarato kodho uppajjeyya,
anya-e0103n:1354_24: “Appanā vaḍḍhetabbā”ti iminā ca appanāppattacittasseva “karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā
anya-e0103n:1355_0: Karuṇāpadamattameva cassā pāḷiyā visesoti taṃ anāmasitvā paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttavikubbanā,
anya-e0103n:1355_1: mettāya vuttaānisaṃsā ca idha labbhantīti dassetuṃ “tato paraṃ…pe…
anya-e0103n:1355_3: Tattha tato paranti “karuṇāsahagatena cetasā”ti vuttavikubbanato upari.
anya-e0103n:1357_10: sammodakatāti evamādike muditāya padaṭṭhānabhūte visese ulliṅgeti,
anya-e0103n:1357_11: īdisehi visesehi virahitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Eva-
anya-e0103n:1357_14: Piyapuggalepi hi paramāya sampattiyā pamudite haṭṭhatuṭṭhe bhikkhuno muditokāsaṃ labheyya.
anya-e0103n:1358_3: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena ādito muditābhāvanāya vatthuṃ dassetvā idāni pāḷinayena dassetuṃ “piyapuggalaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1358_7: Aho sādhūti tassa sattassa sampattiyaṃ sampajaññapubbapamodanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1358_8: Puna aho suṭṭhūti tassa pamodanassa bahulīkāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1359_6: “So evāyaṃ datto tisso”ti addhāpaccuppannatāya vijjamānabhāvena gahetabbato.
anya-e0103n:1359_7: Kathaṃ panassa anāgate sampatti ārammaṇaṃ hotīti?
anya-e0103n:1359_9: paccuppannāya vā payogasampattiyā anumānato laddhāya gahetabbato.
anya-e0103n:1360_3: Anukkamenāti atippiyapuggalo piyapuggalo majjhatto verīti catūsu koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ, muduṃ,
anya-e0103n:1360_5: Kiñcāpi catūsu janesu samacittatāva sīmāsambhedo sīmā sambhijjati etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0103n:1360_6: Bhāvanāya pana tathā bahuso pavattamānāya purimasiddhaṃ hetuṃ,
anya-e0103n:1360_7: itaraṃ phalañca katvā vuttaṃ “samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1360_8: Yathāvuttasīmābhāvo vā sīmāsambhedoti vuttaṃ “samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1362_6: Appaguṇaṃ hi uparijhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0103n:1362_12: Mettādīnaṃ rāgagehassitadomanassasomanassānaṃ āsannavuttitāya yathārahaṃ paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1362_14: dukkhato muccantu modantū”ti hitesitabhāvappattiyā tissannampi anunayassa āsannacāritā.
anya-e0103n:1362_15: Sati ca tabbipariyāye lohitappakope pubbo viya laddhokāsamevettha paṭighanti avisesena tāsaṃ paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0103n:1363_2: Mettādivasena pana oḷārikabhāve vuccamāne vitakkavicārapītiyogeneva oḷārikatā vattabbā siyā,
anya-e0103n:1363_5: Na vā vattabbā tatiyajjhānikānaṃyeva mettādīnaṃ idhādhippetattā,
anya-e0103n:1363_6: taṃtaṃjhānasamatikkameneva ca taṃtaṃjhānikā mettādayopi samatikkantā eva nāma honti,
anya-e0103n:1363_11: Sukhumatā paṇītatā vidūrakilesatā vipulaphalatāti evamādayopi upekkhāya ānisaṃsā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0103n:1363_12: Pakatimajjhattoti kiñci kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā pakatiyā sabhāveneva imassa bhikkhuno udāsinapakkhe ṭhito.
anya-e0103n:1363_13: Ajjhupekkhitvāti attanā katakammavaseneva ayamāyasmā āgato gacchati ca,
anya-e0103n:1363_14: tvampi attanā katakammavaseneva āgato gacchasi ca,
anya-e0103n:1363_15: na tassa tava payogena kiñci sukhaṃ vā upanetuṃ,
anya-e0103n:1363_20: yadidaṃ sabbasattesu majjhattatāti evaṃ paṭipakkhajigucchāmukhena majjhattatāya samupajātagāravabahumānādaro taṃ puggalaṃ punappunaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
anya-e0103n:1363_22: tassa tathā paṭipajjato pakatiyāpi udāsinattā sātisayaṃ tattha majjhattatā saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0103n:1363_31: tasmā aññaṃ ekaṃ puggalanti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0103n:1363_39: Iti “ekaṃ puggalaṃ neva manāpaṃ nāmanāpa”nti iminā attano,
anya-e0103n:1364_1: Attasinehassa balavabhāvato veritopi attani majjhattatāya durūpasaṃhārattā “imesu ca attani cā”ti attā pacchā vutto.
anya-e0103n:1364_2: Pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayenevāti “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā”tiādinā pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena.
anya-e0103n:1364_7: catutthajjhāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā catutthādhigamāya yogaṃ karontassa catutthajjhānassa uppajjanākāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1364_8: Tasmā tattha vuttaṃ “pathavīsaddaṃ apanetvā tadeva nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjatī”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1365_3: Kāmaṃ kasiṇānāpānesu uppannassāpi tatiyajjhānassa upekkhābrahmavihārena rūpāvacarajjhānāditāya attheva sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n:1365_4: taṃ pana akāraṇaṃ ārammaṇassa visadisatāyāti āha “ārammaṇavisabhāgatāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1365_6: aññathā brahmavihārabhāvanāti bhāvanāvasenāpi yathāvuttajjhānānaṃ attheva visadisatāti?
anya-e0103n:1365_8: bhāvanāvasena pana visadisatā anuppattiyā na ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1365_11: Tathāpi sattesu yathāpavattitaṃ hitesitādiākāraṃ byatirekamukhena āmasantī,
anya-e0103n:1365_14: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissantī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1365_15: Ārammaṇasabhāgatāpi cettha atthīti mettādivasena paṭiladdhatatiyajjhānassa ijjhati upekkhābrahmavihāro.
anya-e0103n:1367_0: 262. Brahmuttamenāti ettha sammutibrahmāno upapattibrahmāno visuddhibrahmānoti tividhā brahmāno.
anya-e0103n:1369_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe. ;
anya-e0103n:1371_0: Ca evamādīsu hi brahmasaddena sammutibrahmāno vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1376_0: “Atha kho brahmā sahampatī”ti ca evamādīsu brahmasaddena upapattibrahmāno vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1376_2: tato nibbattattā avisesena sabbepi ariyā visuddhibrahmāno nāma paramatthabrahmatāya.
anya-e0103n:1376_5: tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato sammāsambuddho uttamabrahmā nāma sadevake loke brahmabhūtehi guṇehi ukkaṃsapāramippattito.
anya-e0103n:1376_7: brahmā ca so uttamo cāti vā brahmuttamo, bhagavā.
anya-e0103n:1376_8: Tena kathite “so mettāsahagatena cetasā”tiādinā tattha tattha veneyyānaṃ desite.
anya-e0103n:1376_9: Itīti evaṃ yathāvuttena bhāvanākkamena ceva atthavaṇṇanākkamena ca viditvā jānitvā.
anya-e0103n:1376_10: Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ taṃtaṃbrahmavihārapaṭiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0103n:1376_11: sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha tattha pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattitā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n:1377_0: Mejjatīti dhammato aññassa kattunivattanatthaṃ dhammameva kattāraṃ katvā niddisati.
anya-e0103n:1377_1: Siniyhatīti ettha sattesu byāpajjanavasena lūkhabhāvassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ hitākārapavattivasena sinehanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1377_5: Nanu ca taṇhāsinehopi byāpādavirodhī tena sahānavaṭṭhānato.
anya-e0103n:1377_6: Yadipi tena saha ekasmiṃ citte nappavattati,
anya-e0103n:1377_11: mitte vā ārammaṇabhūte piye puggale bhavā,
anya-e0103n:1377_12: mittassa esā pavatti mejjanavasena vāti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1378_2: kiṃ nimittanti āha “paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampana”nti.
anya-e0103n:1378_3: Kampananti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa apanetukāmassa asahanākārena cittassa aññathattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1379_2: muditāvinimutto natthi tattha koci kattāti tameva kattubhāvena niddisati “sayaṃ vā modatī”ti,
anya-e0103n:1379_4: Dhammānaṃ avasavattanatoti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ “modanamattameva vā tanti muditā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1380_0: Piyādīsu pakkhapātupacchedanamukhena udāsinabhāvasaṅkhātā upapattito ikkhā upekkhā.
anya-e0103n:1380_2: Tattha upekkhatīti kattuniddese kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0103n:1381_6: “Anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā pavattanakassa āghātassa vinayanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:1382_0: Karuṇādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1382_3: Apanayanaṃ pana hotu vā mā vā,
anya-e0103n:1382_6: Apanetukāmatāya paresaṃ dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ paradukkhāsahanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1382_13: sattānaṃ viheṭhanākārena pavatto karuṇāya paṭipakkhabhūto paṭighacittuppādo.
anya-e0103n:1383_4: adhikusaladhammesu ca asahanaṃ aramaṇaṃ aratiicceva saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0103n:1383_6: tassa vā vighātaṃ vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1384_1: Sattesu samabhāvadassanarasāti piyādibhedesu sabbasattesu udāsinavuttiyā samabhāvasseva dassanakiccā,
anya-e0103n:1384_2: upapattito ikkhaṇato samabhāveneva tesaṃ gahaṇakiccāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1384_3: Sattesu paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlākārānaṃ aggahaṇato tattha paṭighānunayānaṃ vūpasamanākārena vuttiyā tesaṃ vūpasamaṃ
anya-e0103n:1384_6: paccāmasanto mettādīnaṃ tissannaṃ pavattiākārapaṭisedhanamukhena pavattaṃ kammassakatāñāṇaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa
anya-e0103n:1385_1: Vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti cāti ettha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro cāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1385_4: Te pana heṭṭhā vuttā evāti idha na gahitā.
anya-e0103n:1386_5: Evañca katvā rāganissaraṇatāvacanaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa suṭṭhu samatthitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1387_4: Rāgopi tattha yathā tathā guṇaggahaṇamukheneva pavattati manāpasaññāpalobhatoti āha “guṇadassanasabhāgatāyā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1387_5: Tasmā mittamukhasapatto viya tulyākārena dūsanato rāgo mettāya āsannapaccatthiko,
anya-e0103n:1387_6: so lahuṃ otāraṃ labhati satisammosamattenāpi mettaṃ apanīya tassā vatthusmiṃ uppajjanārahattā.
anya-e0103n:1387_11: Sattesu hi manāpākāragāhino mettāsabhāgassa tabbiparītasabhāvo byāpādo tena visabhāgo.
anya-e0103n:1387_12: Tasmā so otāraṃ labhamāno cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya mettāya dūrapaccatthiko.
anya-e0103n:1388_5: Appaṭilābhato samanupassatoti appaṭilābhena ahamime na labhāmīti paritassato.
anya-e0103n:1388_12: Vipattidassanasabhāgatāyāti yesu sattesu bhogādivipattidassanamukhena karuṇā pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1388_13: tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati yathāvuttadomanassamukhena soko uppajjeyya,
anya-e0103n:1388_16: Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti ettha sattesu dukkhāpanayanakāmatākārassa karuṇāsabhāgassa tesu dukkhūpanayanākāro
anya-e0103n:1388_17: vihesāsabhāvo visabhāgoti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya sā otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa
anya-e0103n:1388_18: dūre ṭhitasapatto viya karuṇāya dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1389_0: Sampattidassanasabhāgatāyāti yesu sattesu bhogādisampattidassanamukhena muditā pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1389_1: tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpāna”ntiādinā vuttasomanassamukhena pahāso uppajjeyya,
anya-e0103n:1389_4: Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti bhogādisampattīhi muditesu sattesu pamodanākārassa muditāsabhāgassa tattha anabhiramanākārā
anya-e0103n:1389_5: arati visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya sā otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto
anya-e0103n:1389_7: Pamudito cātiādi muditāya siddhāya ayampi arati na hotīti laddhabbaguṇadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1389_9: Kāyacittavivekapaṭipakkhāya vā aratiyā vikkhambhitāya muditāya paṭipakkhā arati suvikkhambhaneyyā hotīti
anya-e0103n:1390_4: odhijinā vā sekkhā odhisova kilesānaṃ jitattā.
anya-e0103n:1390_9: Anekādīnave sabbesampi pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhūte sammohe ādīnavānaṃ adassanasīlatāya anādīnavadassāvino.
anya-e0103n:1390_11: Ediso ekaṃsena andhaputhujjano nāma hotīti tassa andhaputhujjanabhāvadassanatthaṃ punapi “puthujjanassā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1390_13: Rūpaṃ sā nātivattatīti rūpānaṃ samatikkamanāya kāraṇaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1390_16: Dosaguṇāvicāraṇavasena sabhāgattāti yathā brahmavihārupekkhā mettādayo viya sattesu hitūpasaṃhārādivasena
anya-e0103n:1390_18: evaṃ aññāṇupekkhā sattesu vijjamānampi guṇadosaṃ acintentī kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva pavattatīti dosaguṇāvicāraṇavasena sabhāgā.
anya-e0103n:1390_19: Tasmā sā lahuṃ otāraṃ labhatīti brahmavihārupekkhāya āsannapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1390_20: Sabhāgavisabhāgatāyāti iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu majjhattākārassa upekkhāsabhāgassa tattha anurodhavirodhapavattiākārā
anya-e0103n:1390_21: rāgapaṭighā visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya te otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyunti purisassa
anya-e0103n:1390_22: dūre ṭhitasapatto viya upekkhābrahmavihārassa dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1391_1: Kattukāmatā chando ādi “chandamūlakā kusalā dhammā”ti vacanato,
anya-e0103n:1391_2: atha vā sattesu hitesitādukkhāpanayanakāmatādinā anavajjābhipatthanāvasena pavattanato “kattukāmatā chando ādī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1391_3: Upekkhābrahmavihāropi hi sattesu anirākatahitacchandoyeva “tattha abyāvaṭatā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā”ti ajjhupekkhanākārena
anya-e0103n:1391_7: Katthaci sattaggahaṇampi saṅkhāraggahaṇameva hoti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya yathā “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti,
anya-e0103n:1391_8: na evamidhāti āha “paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto aneke vā sattā ārammaṇa”nti.
anya-e0103n:1391_11: Taṃ pana “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti vipassanāya aniccalakkhaṇagahaṇaṃ viya appadhānabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1391_13: Upacāre vā patte ārammaṇavaḍḍhanaṃ tatthāpi sīmāsambhedasiddhitoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1392_0: Ekamāvāsaṃ paricchinditvāti ettha “satte mettāya pharissāmī”ti evaṃ ñāṇena paricchedaṃ katvā ekā racchā paricchinditabbāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1392_1: Racchāgahaṇena racchāvāsino sattā gahitā yathā ekaṃ disanti.
anya-e0103n:1393_1: Kasiṇānaṃ nissandoti kasiṇajjhānānaṃ nissandaphalasadisā āruppā arūpajjhānāni,
anya-e0103n:1393_5: heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ arūpajjhānasamādhīnañca nissando paṭipāṭiyā te adhigantvāva paṭilabhitabbato.
anya-e0103n:1393_10: “Purimabrahmavihārattayanissando”ti iminā mettādivasena tīṇi jhānāni adhigantvā ṭhitasseva upekkhābrahmavihāro,
anya-e0103n:1393_12: Tamevatthaṃ upamāya pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1394_4: Imāni pana “sabbe sattā sukhitā hontū”tiādinā parahitapaṭipattibhūtāni.
anya-e0103n:1394_5: Tasmā sattesu sammā paṭipattibhāvena seṭṭhā ete vihārā.
anya-e0103n:1394_7: Te hi idha jhānabhāvanāya vinīvaraṇacittā hutvā brahmaloke uppannā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ vinīvaraṇacittāva honti.
anya-e0103n:1394_9: Brahmānoti vā sakalabuddhaguṇahetubhūtānaṃ dānapāramitādīnaṃ buddhakaradhammānaṃ paripūraṇavasena brūhitaguṇā mahāsattā bodhisattā.
anya-e0103n:1395_2: Visuddhimaggādivasāti ettha byāpādasaṃkilesādito visujjhanupāyo visuddhimaggo. Ādi-
anya-e0103n:1396_5: tameva upamāya dassetuṃ “yasmā ca yathā mātā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1396_6: Tattha vuttassāpi hitūpasaṃhārādiatthassa upameyyabhāvaṃ upanetvā dassetuṃ atthupanayanattho “yasmā cā”ti ca- saddo.
anya-e0103n:1396_11: tathā sabbasattesu mettādivasena mettāyanādivasikena bhavitabbanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1396_12: Tasmāti yasmā sabbepi saṃkilesadhammā yathārahaṃ dosamoharāgapakkhiyā,
anya-e0103n:1396_16: Catassopi etā bhāvetukāmena na ekekanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1396_19: Sambhāvetvā vāti “imāya paṭipattiyā ayaṃ nirayādīsu nibbatteyyā”ti parikappetvā vā.
anya-e0103n:1396_23: Ayaṃ kamoti ayaṃ imāsaṃ appamaññānaṃ yebhuyyena pavattanakkamoti katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1396_26: Mettādīnaṃ hi tissannaṃ bhāvanānaṃ kamaniyamo natthi,
anya-e0103n:1396_27: yaṃ vā taṃ vā paṭhamaṃ bhāvetuṃ labbhā,
anya-e0103n:1397_2: na ca sammutisaccavasena pavattaṃ sattaggahaṇaṃ paricchinnarūpādiggahaṇaṃ hotīti appanāppattiyā aparāmāsasattaggahaṇamuddhabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1397_4: Evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvāti yathā uddhumātakādīsu atirekuddhumātakādibhāvappatte padese nimittaṃ gayhati,
anya-e0103n:1398_6: evaṃ domanassasahitānaṃ byāpādavihiṃsāratīnaṃ nissaraṇabhūtā mettākaruṇāmuditā na somanassarahitā honti.
anya-e0103n:1398_7: Nissaraṇaggahaṇeneva ca pubbabhāgiyānaṃ tāsaṃ upekkhāsampayogopi anuññātoti daṭṭhabbaṃ anissaraṇabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1398_8: Tathā hi aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittuppādesu karuṇāmuditānaṃ pavattiṃ ācariyā icchanti.
anya-e0103n:1398_9: Na hi brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattati pārisuddhiupekkhā viya.
anya-e0103n:1398_10: Na hi kadāci pārisuddhiupekkhā vedanupekkhaṃ vinā vattatīti.
anya-e0103n:1399_2: Tasmāti yasmā “tato tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādikāya desanāya catunnampi appamaññānaṃ savitakkādibhāvo viya upekkhāsahagatabhāvopi viññāyati, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:1399_4: Evañhi satīti yadi mūlasamādhimhi vuttamatthaṃ anantaraṃ vuttatāya brahmavihāresu pakkhipati,
anya-e0103n:1399_6: na pana honti vipassanāvasena desitattāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0103n:1399_7: hontu kāyānupassanādayo ānāpānabhāvanāvasena catukkapañcakajjhānikāti vadeyyāti āsaṅkanto āha “vedanādīsū”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1399_8: Byañjanacchāyāmattaṃ gahetvāti “mettā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissatī”tiādīhi byañjanehi pakāsito eva
anya-e0103n:1399_9: cittasamādhi “ajjhattaṃ me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatī”tiādīhipi byañjanehi pakāsitoti byañjanato labbhamānasamādhicchāyāmattaṃ
anya-e0103n:1399_10: gahetvā ubhayattha labbhamānaṃ adhippāyaṃ aggahetvāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1399_11: Suttatthaṃ hi aññathā vadanto ayathāvāditāya satthāraṃ apavadanto nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1400_1: “Tayimaṃ dosaṃ pariharitukāmena na sabbaṃ suttaṃ nītatthameva,
anya-e0103n:1400_2: tasmā garukulato adhippāyo maggitabbo”ti dassento “gambhīraṃ hī”tiādiṃ vatvā tattha ādito paṭṭhāya adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1400_11: Cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti bahiddhā avikkhippamānaṃ ekaggabhāve ṭhitaṃ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n:1400_16: Akusalā dhammāti kāmacchandādayo akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā dhammā.
anya-e0103n:1400_17: Cittaṃ pariyādāya pavattituṃ okāsādānena kusalacittaṃ khepetvā na ca ṭhassantīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1401_1: Taṃ pana upari vuccamānānaṃ samādhivisesānaṃ mūlakāraṇabhāvato “mūlasamādhī”ti vutto.
anya-e0103n:1401_2: Svāyaṃ cittekaggatāmatto “ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmī”tiādīsu viya khaṇikasamādhi adhippeto.
anya-e0103n:1401_3: Yatheva hi aññatthāpi “āraddhaṃ kho pana me,
anya-e0103n:1401_6: samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagga”nti vatvā “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādivacanato paṭhamaṃ vuttacittekaggatā “khaṇikasamādhī”ti viññāyati,
anya-e0103n:1402_4: Evaṃ bhāvitoti yathā araṇisahitena uppādito aggi gomayacuṇṇādīhi vaḍḍhito gomayaggiādibhāvaṃ pattopi araṇisahitena uppāditamūlaggītveva vuccati,
anya-e0103n:1402_5: evamidhāpi mūlasamādhi eva mettādivasena vaḍḍhitoti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1403_1: Tattha yathā mettābhāvanāpubbaṅgamena bhāvanānayena pathavīkasiṇādīsu savitakkādibhāvavasena catukkapañcakajjhānasampāpanavidhinā
anya-e0103n:1403_3: evaṃ karuṇādibhāvanāpubbaṅgamaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsupi bhāvanāvidhiṃ dassetvā pacchā kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0103n:1403_6: Yadi evaṃ dhammānupassanāpariyosānāya desanāya arahattādhigamāya kammaṭṭhānassa kathitattā puna “tato tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
anya-e0103n:1403_9: Sā hi saṅkhārupekkhābhāvena vattamānā yathāvuttajjhānadhamme sammasantī visesato matthakappattā nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n:1404_0: Puna yato kho tetiādi arahattappattito uddhaṃ laddhabbaphāsuvihāradassanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1404_2: Tasmāti yasmā “savitakkampī”tiādikā desanā mettādīnaṃ ārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe samādhiṃ sandhāya vuttā,
anya-e0103n:1405_2: saddo “subhanteva adhimutto hotī”ti evaṃ vuttasubhavimokkhaṃ sandhāya vutto uttarapadalopena. Parama-
anya-e0103n:1405_4: Subho subhavimokkho paramo ukkaṃso paramā koṭi etissāti subhaparamā,
anya-e0103n:1405_6: tato paraṃ tāya sādhetabbaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1405_7: Asādhāraṇassa atthassa adhippetattā vipassanāsukhādayo idha anavasarā.
anya-e0103n:1406_0: Tassa tassa upanissayattāti subhavimokkhādikassa tassa tassa vimokkhassa pakatūpanissayavasena upanissayapaccayabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1406_1: Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “mettāvihārissā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1406_3: Appaṭikkūlaparicayāti mettābhāvanāvasena sattasaññite yattha katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭikkūlākāreneva gahaṇassa paricitattā.
anya-e0103n:1406_4: Tassa saṅkhārabhūtampi yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ appaṭikkūlākāreneva paccupatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0103n:1406_11: Yathāvutto ca attho anatthacaraṇādiadhippāyena sacetane ārammaṇe āghātaṃ uppādentassa paṭikkūlaparicayā
anya-e0103n:1406_13: Na tato paranti tato subhavimokkhato paraṃ kassaci vimokkhassa upanissayo na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1407_3: daṇḍābhighātādi rūpaṃ nimittaṃ yassa taṃ daṇḍābhighātādirūpanimittaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1407_6: Rūpe ādīnavo suparividito hoti karuṇāvihārissa rūpanimittattā,
anya-e0103n:1407_9: Cittaṃ pakkhandati sabbaso rūpānaṃ abhāvo vivaramapagamoti.
anya-e0103n:1408_1: tena tena bhogasampattiādinā pāmojjakāraṇena pamuditānaṃ sattānaṃ uppannapāmojjaviññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa
anya-e0103n:1408_2: yogino “sādhu vatāyaṃ satto pamodatī”ti muditāya pavattisambhavato pamuditaviññāṇassa dassanena viññāṇaggahaṇaparicitaṃ
anya-e0103n:1409_0: Anukkamādhigatanti ākāsakasiṇavajje yattha katthaci kasiṇe rūpāvacarajjhānādhigamānukkamena rūpavirāgabhāvanāya adhigataṃ.
anya-e0103n:1410_1: Sattānaṃ sukhāsīsanādivasena pavattamānā mettādibhāvanāva paramatthaggahaṇamukhena satte ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n:1410_2: upekkhābhāvanā pana tathā appavattitvā kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti āha “upekkhāvihārissa
anya-e0103n:1410_5: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissantī”tiādinā paṭikkhepavasenapi paramatthaggahaṇamukheneva upekkhābrahmavihāropi satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti?
anya-e0103n:1410_8: matthakappattiyaṃ pana kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti savisesaṃ paramatthato avijjamāne eva visaye tassa pavatti.
anya-e0103n:1410_9: Avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhatā ca ajjhupekkhanavasena appanāppattiyā aparāmāsasattaggahaṇamuddhabhūtatāya veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1411_7: Na hi lokiyadhammā buddhakaradhammehi ānubhāvato ukkaṭṭhā nāma atthi,
anya-e0103n:1411_10: Adhiṭṭhānāni viya hi appamaññā sabbāsaṃ pāramitānaṃ pāripūrikarā.
anya-e0103n:1411_12: catūhi appamaññāhi attano santānassa pageva abhisaṅkhatattā mahābodhisattā dānādipāramiyo pūretuṃ samatthā honti,
anya-e0103n:1411_17: idaṃ na dātabbanti ca vibhāgaṃ akatvā”ti vattabbato.
anya-e0103n:1414_2: Tena deyyadhammena viya dānadhammenāpi mahāsattānaṃ lokassa bahūpakāratā vuttā hoti,
anya-e0103n:1414_8: vibhāgaṃ akatvā upaghātaṃ parivajjayantā sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidānaṃ sīlaṃ samādiyantīti.
anya-e0103n:1414_14: Idhāpi “vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidāna”nti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1414_15: Na hi bodhisattā kālavibhāgaṃ katvā pabbajjaṃ anutiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0103n:1414_22: Paññaṃ pariyodapentīti yogavihitaṃ vijjāṭṭhānādiṃ assutaṃ suṇantā sutaṃ vodapentā ahaṃkāramamaṃkārādiṃ vidhunantā ñāṇaṃ visodhenti.
anya-e0103n:1414_26: Vīriyamārabhantīti yathā sattānaṃ anuppannaṃ hitasukhaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0103n:1414_31: Nānappakārakaṃ aparādhaṃ khamantīti mammacchedanākārena attani pavattitaṃ nānāvidhaṃ aparādhaṃ sahanti.
anya-e0103n:1415_0: Paṭiññaṃ na visaṃvādentīti avisaṃvādanasāmaññena sabbassapi anariyavohārassa akaraṇamāha.
anya-e0103n:1415_2: apaṭiññāte ca diṭṭhādike micchāvikapparahitā hi saccapāramitā.
anya-e0103n:1415_4: samādinnesu ca buddhakaradhammesu sammadeva avaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramitā.
anya-e0103n:1415_10: Tathā hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ parānuggahāya pāramīnaṃ anuṭṭhānena saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1415_20: Etāva hontīti etā honti evāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1420_29: saddena adinnādānādikaṃ sabbaṃ rūpahetukaṃ anatthaṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n:1420_35: Ālokoti vaṇṇaviseso evāti tattha pavattaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ ugghāṭetvā siyā ākāsanimittaṃ uggahetuṃ,
anya-e0103n:1420_37: Tassa hi ugghāṭanā nāma rūpanimitteneva siyāti āha “ṭhapetvā paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ navasū”ti.
anya-e0103n:1420_39: tassa pana ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0103n:1421_1: Nanu paṭhamajjhānādīnipi tassa anālambanavaseneva pavattanti paṭibhāganimittārammaṇattā?
anya-e0103n:1421_3: oḷārikaṅgappahānato pana santasabhāvena āneñjappattena catutthajjhānena atikkantaṃ suṭṭhu atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti “catutthajjhānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1421_11: tasmā kiṃ tassa samatikkamanenāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “kathaṃ?
anya-e0103n:1422_3: Karajarūpasamaṅgikāloti attano attabhāvarūpena ceva ārammaṇarūpena ca samannāgatakālo.
anya-e0103n:1422_8: Te hi tayo apekkhitvā bhayasantāsaadassanakāmatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1422_9: Eko kira sunakho vane sūkarena pahaṭamatto palāto,
anya-e0103n:1422_10: so arūpadassanavelāya bhattapacanaukkhaliṃ dūrato disvā sūkarasaññāya bhīto uttasanto palāyi,
anya-e0103n:1422_11: pisācabhīruko puriso rattibhāge aparicite dese matthakacchinnaṃ tālakkhandhaṃ disvā pisācasaññāya bhīto uttasanto mucchito papati,
anya-e0103n:1423_6: Tāni hi “ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā”tiādīsu santavimokkhāti āgatā.
anya-e0103n:1423_9: kārena yena pakārena etaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1424_5: sukhumato ca manasikāro siddho hotīti āha “santato anantato manasi karitvā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1424_9: Ugghāṭeti kasiṇanti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikasiṇarūpaṃ apaneti.
anya-e0103n:1424_19: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇarūpaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ manasi karoto,
anya-e0103n:1424_20: tena ca phuṭṭhokāsaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti manasi karoto yadā taṃ bhāvanānubhāvena ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1425_2: tato paṭṭhāya cassa na nesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1425_5: Yaṃ paneke vadanti “attheva sukhumāni arūpajjhānavikkhambhaneyyāni nīvaraṇāni,
anya-e0103n:1425_8: Na hi mahaggatakusalesu lokuttarakusalesu viya odhiso pahānaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0103n:1425_10: so bhāvanāvisesena santatarapaṇītatarabhāvena tesuyeva purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimānaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1425_12: Tathā hi aññatthāpi heṭṭhā pahīnānaṃ upari pahānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1425_13: Ye pana “sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ paṭipakkhāti katvā evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
anya-e0103n:1425_15: Sati santiṭṭhatīti ākāsanimittārammaṇā sati sammā sūpaṭṭhitā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n:1425_16: Satisīsena cettha upacārajjhānānuguṇānaṃ saddhāpañcamānaṃ sakiccayogaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1425_22: taṃ pana pathavīkasiṇaniddese vuttanayānusārena veditabbanti āha “pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayamevā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1426_1: taṃ atidisitvā idāni visiṭṭhaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1427_5: Rūpajjhānampi rūpanti vuccati uttarapadalopena “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”tiādīsu yathā rūpabhavo rūpaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1427_7: Ārammaṇampi kasiṇarūpaṃ rūpanti vuccati purimapadalopena yathā “devadatto datto”ti.
anya-e0103n:1427_8: Rūpāni passatīti kasiṇarūpāni jhānacakkhunā passatīti attho.
anya-e0103n:1427_10: purimapadalopena ca yathākkamaṃ rūpajjhānakasiṇarūpesu rūpavohāro dissati, tasmā.
anya-e0103n:1427_14: tena pāḷiyaṃ “rūpasaññāna”nti sarūpekasesena niddeso katoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1427_17: Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1427_18: Tassa sabbākārena virāgā anavasesānaṃ nirodhāti evaṃ vā ettha yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0103n:1428_0: “Ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hotī”ti idaṃ yasmā imāni jhānāni ārammaṇātikkamena pattabbāni,
anya-e0103n:1428_2: Yasmā panettha saññāsamatikkamo ārammaṇasamatikkamena vinā na hoti,
anya-e0103n:1428_3: tasmā “samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hotī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1428_9: Yadi saññāsamatikkamassa anunipphādiārammaṇasamatikkamo vibhaṅge ca avutto,
anya-e0103n:1428_10: atha kasmā idha gahitoti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1428_12: “tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacana”ntiādinā vibhaṅge viya saññāsamatikkamameva avatvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1429_2: Atthaṅgamātiādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa atthavacanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1429_3: tasmā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamo jhānasamaṅgikāle anuppattīti tassa idheva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ anuyogamukhena dassetuṃ “kāmañcetā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1430_1: paṭighasaññānaṃ pana atthaṅgamo idheva vattabbattā vuttoti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1430_2: Tattha sabhāvadhammassa abhāvo nāma paṭipakkhena pahīnatāya vā paccayābhāvena vā.
anya-e0103n:1430_9: Na pahīnattā na santīti na tadā paṭighasaññā pahīnabhāvena na santi nāma.
anya-e0103n:1430_10: Tattha kāraṇamāha “na hi rūpavirāgāya rūpāvacarabhāvanā saṃvattatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1430_11: Nanu ca paṭighasaññāpi arūpadhammā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “rūpāyattā ca etāsaṃ pavattī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1430_16: “Ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā”tiādinā santavimokkhatā ca vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1431_1: Dosadassanapubbakapaṭipakkhabhāvanāvasena paṭighasaññānaṃ suppahīnattā mahatāpi saddena arūpasamāpattito na vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n:1431_2: Tathā pana na suppahīnattā sabbarūpāvacarasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ siyā,
anya-e0103n:1431_3: paṭhamajjhānaṃ pana appakampi saddaṃ na sahatīti taṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭakoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1431_4: Āruppabhāvanāya abhāve cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānaṃ yāva attano vipākappavatti,
anya-e0103n:1431_7: Nānattasaññāsu pana yā tasmiṃ bhave na uppajjanti ekantarūpanissitā,
anya-e0103n:1431_12: javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ appavesanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1432_0: Tena ca nānattasaññāmanasikārahetūnaṃ rūpānaṃ samatikkamā samādhissa thirabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhepato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1432_1: Apica imehi tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā vaṇṇo kathito sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1432_3: Ye hi akusalā evaṃgāhino “sabbassādarahite ākāse pavattitasaññāya ko ānisaṃso”ti,
anya-e0103n:1432_4: te tato micchāgāhato nivattetuṃ tīhi padehi jhānassa ānisaṃso kathito.
anya-e0103n:1432_5: Taṃ hi sutvā tesaṃ evaṃ bhavissati “evaṃ santā kirāyaṃ samāpatti evaṃ paṇītā,
anya-e0103n:1433_6: Ākāso pana asabhāvadhammattā tadubhayābhāvato ananto vutto.
anya-e0103n:1433_7: Ajaṭākāsaparicchinnākāsānaṃ idha anadhippetattā “ākāsoti kasiṇugghāṭimākāso vuccatī”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1433_10: Manasikāravasenāpīti rūpavivekamattaggahaṇena paricchedassa aggahaṇato anantapharaṇākārena pavattaparikammamanasikāravasenāpi.
anya-e0103n:1433_11: Anantaṃ pharatīti aggahitaparicchedatāya anantaṃ katvā parikammasamphassapubbakena jhānasamphassena phusati.
anya-e0103n:1435_1: Ciṇṇo carito paguṇikato āvajjanādilakkhaṇo vasībhāvo etenāti ciṇṇavasībhāvo,
anya-e0103n:1435_5: taṃsamatikkameneva tadaññesaṃ samatikkamitabbānaṃ samatikkamasiddhito ca vuttaṃ “āsannarūpāvacarajjhānapaccatthikā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1435_7: paṇītabhāvasiddhito ca paṭhamāruppato dutiyāruppaṃ santatarasabhāvanti āha “no ca viññāṇañcāyatanamiva santā”ti vakkhati hi “suppaṇītatarā honti,
anya-e0103n:1435_9: Anantaṃ anantanti kevalaṃ “anantaṃ ananta”nti na manasi kātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1436_2: Ākāsaphuṭe viññāṇeti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ārammaṇabhūte.
anya-e0103n:1436_4: Sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanābhāvato idaṃ appanāppattaṃ hoti catutthāruppaṃ viya.
anya-e0103n:1436_5: Appanānayo panettha vuttanayenevāti ettha dutiyāruppajjhāne purimabhāge tīṇi,
