anya-e0103n:1436_6: cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti.
anya-e0103n:1436_7: “Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā arūpāvacara”ntiādinā paṭhamāruppajjhāne vuttena nayena,
anya-e0103n:1436_8: atha vā appanānayoti sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇe jhānassa appanānayo ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena āruppaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0103n:1436_9: “appanāppattasseva hi jhānassa ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotī”ti maraṇānussatiniddese vuttanayena veditabboti attho.
anya-e0103n:1437_5: Svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttanayena ñātuṃ sakkāti āha “sabbasoti idaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1437_6: Jhānassa ākāsānañcāyatanatā bāhiratthasamāsavasena heṭṭhā vuttāti āha “pubbe vuttanayena jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatana”nti.
anya-e0103n:1437_8: Tattha “purimanayenevā”ti idaṃ “nāssa anto”tiādinā vuttapadasiddhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1437_11: saddena idha attho yujjatīti dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1437_18: javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ amanasikaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1437_19: ārammaṇassa ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena appavattanaṃ appavattikaraṇanti atthassa sambhavato ekajjhaṃ katvā sāmaññaniddesena,
anya-e0103n:1438_0: Pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ attano pharaṇākāreneva “ananta”nti
anya-e0103n:1438_1: manasi kātabbattā “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti vuttanti puna “manasikāravasena vā ananta”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1438_4: Jhānavibhaṅgepi ayamevattho vuttoti dassento “yaṃ pana vibhaṅge vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1438_5: Tassā pāḷiyā evaṃ vā attho veditabbo –
anya-e0103n:1438_6: taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaviññāṇena manasi karotīti.
anya-e0103n:1438_8: taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭaṃ tena gahitākāraṃ manasi karoti.
anya-e0103n:1438_10: Yaṃ hi ākāsaṃ paṭhamāruppasamaṅgī viññāṇena anantaṃ pharati,
anya-e0103n:1438_11: taṃ pharaṇākārasahitameva viññāṇaṃ manasi karonto dutiyāruppasamaṅgī anantaṃ pharatīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1439_1: na ākāsassa viya uppādantādiabhāvenāti “nāssa antoti ananta”nti ettakamevāha.
anya-e0103n:1439_4: yathāvuttaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ dutiyāruppajjhānena añcīyati vuttākārena ālambīyatīti viññāṇañcanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1441_4: Tattha tassevāti yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ, tasseva.
anya-e0103n:1441_6: Etena tato aññaṃ tatiyāruppajjhānassa ārammaṇaṃ natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1441_12: “Manasi kātabbo”ti vatvā manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ viññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1441_13: Tattha amanasikaritvāti sabbena sabbaṃ manasi akatvā acintetvā. Vā-
anya-e0103n:1441_15: tena tīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1442_0: Tasmiṃ nimitteti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvasaṅkhāte jhānuppattinimitte.
anya-e0103n:1443_0: Tasmiṃ hi appanācitteti ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānasampayutte appanāvasena pavatte citte,
anya-e0103n:1443_1: tasmiṃ vā paṭhamāruppassa apagamasaṅkhāte natthibhāve yathāvutte appanācitte uppanne.
anya-e0103n:1443_2: So bhikkhu abhāvameva passanto viharatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1443_3: Puriso katthaci gantvā āgantvā suññameva passati,
anya-e0103n:1443_6: “Parikammamanasikārena antarahite”ti iminā ārammaṇakaraṇābhāvena tassa antaradhānaṃ na naṭṭhattāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1443_8: yathā so puriso tattha sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato,
anya-e0103n:1443_9: tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu kenacideva karaṇīyena apagatesu āgantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūhi suññameva passati,
anya-e0103n:1443_11: evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ disvā pacchā natthīti parikammamanasikārena
anya-e0103n:1443_12: tasmiṃ apagate tatiyāruppajjhānacakkhunā tassa natthibhāvameva passanto viharati,
anya-e0103n:1443_13: na tassa apagamanakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti.
anya-e0103n:1443_14: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1444_1: Natthitā pariyāyāsuññavivittabhāvāti “natthī”ti padassa atthaṃ vadantena suññavivittapadānipi gahitāni.
anya-e0103n:1444_3: Vibhaṅgepi imassa padassa ayamevattho vuttoti dassetuṃ “yampi vibhaṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1444_4: Tattha taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetīti yaṃ pubbe “anantaṃ viññāṇa”nti manasi kataṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1444_6: Taṃyeva hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ paṭhamena viya rūpanimittaṃ tatiyenāruppenābhāvetīti.
anya-e0103n:1444_8: Sā hi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ bhaṅgābhāvameva passantī “viññāṇampi abhāvetī”tiādinā vattabbataṃ labhatīti adhippāyenāha “khayato sammasanaṃ viya vutta”nti.
anya-e0103n:1445_2: Sabhāvadhammassa appāvasesatā nāma bhaṅgo eva siyāti āha “bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1445_3: Sati hi bhaṅgamattepi tassa sakiñcanatā siyā.
anya-e0103n:1445_4: Akiñcananti ca viññāṇassa kiñci pakāraṃ aggahetvā sabbena sabbaṃ vibhāvanamāha.
anya-e0103n:1447_1: No ca santāti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā savisesā santā,
anya-e0103n:1447_2: evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti no ca santā tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1447_11: Sā cettha paṭukiccā pañcavokārabhavato oḷārikasaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1448_3: Taṃ hi manasi bhavanti mānasanti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1448_4: Jhānasampayuttadhammānampi jhānānuguṇatāya samāpattipariyāyo labbhatīti āha “ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattisaṅkhātesu catūsu khandhesū”ti,
anya-e0103n:1449_1: Yathāvuttaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato āyatanaṃ kāraṇamassāti jhānaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1449_2: ākiñcaññameva ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ jhānassa kāraṇanti ārammaṇaṃ ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1450_0: Yāya saññāya bhāvatoti yādisāya saññāya atthibhāvena.
anya-e0103n:1450_1: Yā hi sā paṭusaññākiccassa abhāvato saññātipi na vattabbā,
anya-e0103n:1450_5: Taṃ tāva dassetunti ettha tanti taṃ sasāpaṭipadaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1450_8: Nevasaññīnāsaññīti hi puggalādhiṭṭhānena dhammaṃ uddharantena saññāvantamukhena saññā uddhaṭā,
anya-e0103n:1451_2: Asati ca ādīnavadassane samatikkamo eva na siyā”ti dassento “santato ce manasi karoti,
anya-e0103n:1452_0: Samatikkamitvāva gacchatīti tesaṃ sippīnaṃ jīvikaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno te vītivattatiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1452_3: Pubbe vuttanayenāti “santā vatāyaṃ samāpattī”tiādinā vuttena nayena santato manasi karonto.
anya-e0103n:1452_14: Paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya hi tacchantiyā viya pavattamānāya bhāvanāya anukkamena saṅkhārā tattha antimakoṭṭhāsataṃ pāpitā,
anya-e0103n:1453_3: Visesato adhipaññāsikkhāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā dhammā adhippetā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1453_4: Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvatoti yadipi catutthāruppavipākasaññāya catutthāruppakusalasaññā oḷārikā,
anya-e0103n:1453_6: tathāpi oḷārikasukhumatā nāma upādāyupādāya gahetabbāti pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannāya viya catuvokārepi
anya-e0103n:1453_7: heṭṭhā tīsu bhūmīsu saññāya viya oḷārikāya abhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1453_8: Sukhumāyāti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā sukhumāya saññāya bhāvato vijjamānattā.
anya-e0103n:1453_19: Tathā nāsaññāti ettha na- kāro, a-
anya-e0103n:1453_20: kāro ca aññattho evāti tena dvayena saññābhāvo eva dassitoti dhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya āyatanabhāvo
anya-e0103n:1454_1: yenettha saññāva edisī jātāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “na kevala”ntiādi.
anya-e0103n:1454_2: Saññāsīsenāyaṃ desanā katā “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”tiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1454_3: Evaṃ esa atthoti kañci visesaṃ upādāya sabhāvato atthīti vattabbasseva dhammassa kañci visesaṃ upādāya natthīti vattabbatāsaṅkhāto attho.
anya-e0103n:1455_0: Atithokampi yaṃ telamatthi bhanteti āha akappiyabhāvaṃ upādāya,
anya-e0103n:1456_1: taṃ saññā samānā kathamayaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti āha “dahanakiccamivā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1456_2: Saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā eva hesā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n:1456_3: tato eva ca ñāṇassa sugayhāpi na hoti.
anya-e0103n:1456_7: Khandhādimukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā dvārālambanehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammānaṃ vipassako sakkuṇeyya tabbisayaudayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ,
anya-e0103n:1456_10: Kalāpasammasanavasenevāti catutthāruppacittuppādapariyāpanne phassādidhamme avinibbhujja ekato gahetvā
anya-e0103n:1456_12: Phassādidhamme vinibbhujjitvā visuṃ visuṃ sarūpato gahetvā aniccādivasena sammasanaṃ anupadadhammavipassanā.
anya-e0103n:1456_13: Evaṃ sukhumattaṃ gatā yathā dhammasenāpatināpi nāma anupadaṃ na vipassaneyyāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1457_2: eko kira brāhmaṇo aññataraṃ purisaṃ manuññaṃ mattikabhājanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā yāci “dehi me imaṃ bhājana”nti.
anya-e0103n:1457_5: Brāhmaṇo attano samīpe ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ uddissa āha “tena hi imassa pātuṃ dehī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1457_7: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa ayogyabhāvaṃ upādāya “atthī”tipi vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1458_2: natthi kiñcī”ti tattha tattha bhāvanākāro gahito,
anya-e0103n:1458_5: “bhāvanākāro nāma sopacārassa jhānassa yathāsakaṃ ārammaṇe pavattiākāro,
anya-e0103n:1458_7: Te pana gayhamānā ekassa vā pubbaṅgamadhammassa vasena gahetabbā siyuṃ,
anya-e0103n:1458_9: Tattha paṭhamapakkhe viññāṇassa gahaṇaṃ āpannanti ‘viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa’nti manasikāre catutthāruppassa viññāṇañcāyatanabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0103n:1458_10: Dutiyapakkhe pana sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanadhammārammaṇatāya jhānassa ‘ākiñcaññaṃ ākiñcañña’nti manasikāre ākiñcaññāyatanatā vā siyā,
anya-e0103n:1458_14: Na hi catutthāruppabhāvanā viññāṇamākiñcaññaṃ vā āmasantī pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1459_6: Atha kasmā vibhaṅge viya sutte bhāvanākāro na gahitoti?
anya-e0103n:1459_9: Ye hi veneyyā yathā heṭṭhā tīsu āruppesu “ananto ākāso,
anya-e0103n:1459_12: evaṃ aggahite eva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhanti,
anya-e0103n:1459_13: tesaṃ vasena sutte tathā desanā katā,
anya-e0103n:1459_15: Ye pana veneyyā vibhajitvā vutteyeva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhanti,
anya-e0103n:1459_17: Dhammissaro pana bhagavā sammāsambuddho dhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ jānanto katthaci bhāvanākāraṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n:1459_19: Sā ca desanā yāvadeva veneyyavinayatthāti ayamettha desanāvilāso.
anya-e0103n:1459_20: Suttantadesanā vā pariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro na gahito,
anya-e0103n:1459_21: abhidhammadesanā pana nippariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro gahitoti evampettha bhāvanākārassa gahaṇe,
anya-e0103n:1460_3: Sā ca anupubbabhāvanā pahānakkamopajanitā pahātabbasamatikkamena jhānānaṃ adhigantabbato.
anya-e0103n:1460_8: sabbāpi paññā paṭipakkhadhammappahānavaseneva sampādetabbato pahātabbadhammasamatikkamadassanamukheneva desanā āruḷhā.
anya-e0103n:1460_9: Tathā hi “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādinā sīlasaṃvaro,
anya-e0103n:1460_10: “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī”tiādinā indriyasaṃvaro,
anya-e0103n:1460_12: “idha bhikkhu micchājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetī”tiādinā ājīvapārisuddhi,
anya-e0103n:1460_18: āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
anya-e0103n:1460_20: Tasmā jhānāni desento bhagavā “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā pahātabbadhammasamatikkamadassanamukheneva desesi.
anya-e0103n:1460_23: Tattha yathā rūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvanāvisesādhigatehi vitakkādīhi viya saddhādīhipi tikkhavisadasūrasabhāvehi
anya-e0103n:1460_25: tadekaṭṭhānañca pāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanato uttarimanussadhammabhāvappattaṃ kāmāvacaradhammehi saṇhasukhumaṃ, santaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1460_27: dutiyajjhānādīni pana bhāvanāvisesena oḷārikaṅgappahānato tato sātisayaṃ saṇhasukhumasaṇhasukhumatarādibhāvappattāni honti.
anya-e0103n:1460_28: Tathā arūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ rūpavirāgabhāvanābhāvena pavattamānaṃ ārammaṇasantatāyapi aṅgasantatāyapi
anya-e0103n:1461_1: mahaggatabhāvenāpi ca abhede rūpāvacaracatutthato āruppaṃ aṅgatopi santameva,
anya-e0103n:1461_5: svāyaṃ bhāvanāviseso paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya taṃtaṃpahātabbasamatikkamanavasena tassa tassa jhānassa
anya-e0103n:1461_7: Yato catutthāruppaṃ yathā anupadadhammavipassanāvasena vipassanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakativipassakassāpi
anya-e0103n:1461_9: tathā sayaṃ tatiyāruppadhammesu pavattamānaṃ te yāthāvato vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n:1461_11: Kevalaṃ pana ārabbha pavattimattamevassa tattha hoti,
anya-e0103n:1461_12: tayidaṃ ārammaṇabhāvenāpi nāma vibhūtākāratāya ṭhātuṃ appahontaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇe kiṃ pahoti.
anya-e0103n:1461_13: Tasmā tadassa avibhūtakiccataṃ disvā satthā heṭṭhā tīsu ṭhānesu bhāvanākāraṃ vatvā tādiso idha na labbhatīti
anya-e0103n:1461_14: dīpetuṃ catutthāruppadesanāyaṃ sutte bhāvanākāraṃ pariyāyadesanattā na kathesi.
anya-e0103n:1462_0: Yasmā pana sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇe pavattiākāro atthevāti atisukhumabhāvappattaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0103n:1462_1: “taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karotī”ti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ yathādhammasāsanabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1462_2: pubbabhāgavasena vā vibhaṅge “santato manasi karotī”ti vuttaṃ tadā yogino tassa vibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1462_3: Appanāvasena pana sutte bhāvanākāro na gahito avibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1462_4: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ hi kiñci ādito avibhūtaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1462_13: Catutthāruppakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana pariyosāne avibhūtaṃ bhāvanāya matthakappattiyaṃ ārammaṇassa avibhūtabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1462_14: Tasmā catutthāruppe imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ satthārā sutte bhāvanākāro na gahito,
anya-e0103n:1462_15: na sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvatoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1464_5: tena dasabalacatuvesārajjādiguṇavisesasamāyogadīpanato satthu dhammakāyasampattiyāpi asadisatā dassitā hoti.
anya-e0103n:1464_8: Pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyāti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ tattha tattha jhāne patiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0103n:1464_9: sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha tattheva pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.
anya-e0103n:1465_8: na ca ārammaṇe dosaṃ disvā anārammaṇassa vibhāvanātikkamo yujjati.
anya-e0103n:1465_10: sato vuṭṭhahitvā taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1465_13: “Anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajjā”ti ettha pana dvayaṃ vuttaṃ ārammaṇañca viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1465_18: saddassa sambandhe āpanne “ayañca ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanā”ti viññāṇañcāyatanassa nivattanatthaṃ viññāṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1466_6: pamāṇato ca samabhāve uparūpari pana kāmaguṇānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1466_7: sukhasamphassādīnañca visesena paṇītatarādibhāvo viya etāsaṃ catunnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ āruppabhāvato,
anya-e0103n:1466_8: aṅgato ca satipi samabhāve bhāvanāvisesasiddho pana sātisayo uparūpari paṇītatarādibhāvoti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yathā hī”tiādinā.
anya-e0103n:1467_6: Tannissitanti vā taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ purisanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1467_7: Maṇḍapalaggañhi anissāya tena vinābhūte vivitte bahi okāse ṭhānaṃ viya ākāsalaggaviññāṇassa viveke tadapagame tatiyāruppassa ṭhānanti.
anya-e0103n:1468_3: no ca santa”nti ca diṭṭhādīnavampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ idaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ aññassa tādisassa
anya-e0103n:1468_4: ārammaṇabhāvayogyassa abhāvena alābhena ārammaṇaṃ karoti eva.
anya-e0103n:1469_2: yathā koci puriso anekaporisaṃ dīghanisseṇiṃ āruḷho tassa uparimapade ṭhito tassā nisseṇiyā bāhumeva olubbhati aññassa alābhato,
anya-e0103n:1469_4: missakapabbatassa vā aggakoṭiṃ āruḷho tassa matthakameva olubbhati,
anya-e0103n:1469_5: yathā ca giriṃ silāpabbataṃ āruḷho paripphandamāno aññābhāvato attano jaṇṇukameva olubbhati,
anya-e0103n:1469_6: tathā etaṃ catutthāruppajjhānaṃ taṃ tatiyāruppaṃ olubbhitvā pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n:1474_2: āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti āha “ekā saññāti evaṃ uddiṭṭhāya āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāya bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto”ti.
anya-e0103n:1474_6: “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopākarūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā ekatthā udāhu nānatthā”tiādīsu samathe āgato.
anya-e0103n:1474_9: tappabhāvitaṃ vā upacārajjhānaṃ idha “āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā”ti adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1474_11: tattha nibbedavirāguppādanāya tappasaṅgena sabbampi āhāraṃ kiccappabhedādīnavopammehi vibhāvetuṃ “āharatīti āhāro”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1475_1: ṭhitiyā vā paccayabhāvena attano phalaṃ āneti nibbatteti pavatteti cāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1475_5: kabaḷīkāro ca so yathāvuttenatthena āhāro cāti kabaḷīkārāhāro.
anya-e0103n:1475_8: Ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati.
anya-e0103n:1475_11: attano sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho,
anya-e0103n:1475_17: aññe dhammā kiṃ attano phalassa paccayā na hontīti?
anya-e0103n:1475_19: ime pana tathā ca honti aññathā cāti samānepi paccayabhāve atirekapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n:1476_1: Etesu hi paṭhamo sayaṃ yasmiṃ kalāpe tappariyāpannānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayo hontova ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharati,
anya-e0103n:1476_6: Ettha ca kammajādibhedabhinnā ojā sati paccayalābhe dve tisso paveṇiyo ghaṭentī ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ āharati,
anya-e0103n:1476_7: sukhavedanīyādibhedabhinno phassāhāro yathārahaṃ tisso vedanā āharati,
anya-e0103n:1476_8: puññābhisaṅkhārādibhedabhinno manosañcetanāhāro kāmabhavādīsu tīsu bhavesu yathārahaṃ saviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1476_12: Atha vā upatthambhakaṭṭhena ime eva dhammā āhārāti vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1476_13: Yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro rūpakāyassa upatthambhakaṭṭhena paccayo,
anya-e0103n:1476_15: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0103n:1476_16: arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1476_19: phassādayo ca tayo dhammā āhārāti vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1476_20: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkārāhāro,
anya-e0103n:1477_8: Kabaḷīkārāhārahetu imesaṃ sattānaṃ chandarāgo bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa anatthassa sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa hetubhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1477_15: Upagamanaṃ appahīnavipallāsassa ārammaṇena samodhānaṃ saṅgati sukhavedanīyādiphassuppatti bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi aparimuccanato.
anya-e0103n:1477_21: Tattha tattha bhave upapajjati etenāti upapatti,
anya-e0103n:1477_23: khipanaṃ bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ upapattimūlakehi byasanehi aparimuttato.
anya-e0103n:1477_31: taṃ bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ paṭisandhinimittehi dukkhehi avimuccanato.
anya-e0103n:1478_1: Evaṃ hi tattha nikantibhayaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0103n:1478_2: Niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchati,
anya-e0103n:1478_5: vedanā ca dukkhasallādito daṭṭhabbāti phasse ādīnavaṃ passantassa upagamanabhayaṃ na hotīti āha “phassāhāro niccammagāvūpamena dīpetabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1478_6: Ekādasahi aggīhi sabbaso ādittā bhavā aṅgārakāsusadisāti passato upapattibhayaṃ na hotīti āha “manosañcetanāhāro aṅgārakāsūpamena dīpetabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1478_8: pahārasadisī vedanā duradhivāsatoti sammadeva passato paṭisandhibhayaṃ na hotīti āha “viññāṇāhāro sattisatūpamena dīpetabbo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1479_0: Evaṃ kiccādimukhena āhāresu ādīnavaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha yathādhippetaṃ āhāraṃ niddhāretvā paṭikkūlato
anya-e0103n:1479_2: Upādāyarūpaniddesepi “kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti āgatattā tato visesento “asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedo”ti āha,
anya-e0103n:1479_4: Tattha asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedoti asitabbapātabbakhāyitabbasāyitabbavibhāgo kālabhedavacanicchāya abhāvato yathā “duddha”nti.
anya-e0103n:1479_5: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro vāti avadhāraṇaṃ yathā phassāhārādinivattanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1479_7: Savatthuko eva hi āhāro idha kammaṭṭhānabhūto,
anya-e0103n:1479_8: tena āharīyatīti āhāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1479_9: Āharatīti āhāroti ayaṃ panattho nibbattitaojāvasena veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1480_1: atthato ca suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ sūpadhāritaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1480_11: kimikulasaṃvaddhanatoti evamādīhipi ākārehi āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā?
anya-e0103n:1480_19: laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ gadhito mucchito ajjhosanno anādīnavadassāvī anissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatī”ti,
anya-e0103n:1480_20: “bhutto ca āhāro kassaci kadāci maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ āvahati,
anya-e0103n:1480_22: takkoṭakādayo ca dvattiṃsa dvattiṃsa kulappabhedā kimayo ca naṃ upanissāya jīvantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1481_1: antimajīvikābhāvo tāva cittasaṃkilesavisodhanatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhinivesato pageva manasi kātabbo “māhaṃ chavālātasadiso bhaveyya”nti.
anya-e0103n:1481_2: Tathā piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesupi paritassanagedhādisamuppattinivāraṇaṃ pageva anuṭṭhātabbaṃ suparisuddhasīlassa paṭisaṅkhānavato tadabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1481_7: Iminā vā nayena itaresampettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yathāsambhavamettha paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n:1482_6: ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo,
anya-e0103n:1482_10: Nidadhāti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo,
anya-e0103n:1482_19: sammakkhanaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato paṭikkūlanti sabbapacchā ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1483_1: Evaṃ mahānubhāveti idāni vattabbapaṭipattiyā mahānubhāveti vadanti,
anya-e0103n:1483_2: sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānapariharaṇādisiddhaṃ vā dhammasudhammataṃ purakkhatvā yogāvacarena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti
anya-e0103n:1483_7: Ayañca gamanādito paccavekkhaṇā yogino na attuddesikāva,
anya-e0103n:1483_8: atha kho anuddesikāpīti dassento “sakalaratti”ntiādinā dhuradvayaṃ pariggahesi.
anya-e0103n:1483_12: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanañhi appattā bhāvanā pharaṇapītiyā abhāvato nisajjāvasena kāyakilamathaṃ na vinodatiyevāti iriyāpathacalanaṃ hotiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1483_14: Atha vā gamanato yāva sammakkhanamanasikāro eko vāro,
anya-e0103n:1483_25: tasmā ramaṇīyabhūmibhāgānīti purimāni dve pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇavacanāni.
anya-e0103n:1484_0: Kiñcāpi yogāvacarānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sujaggitaṃ susammaṭṭhameva hoti,
anya-e0103n:1484_1: kadāci pana jagganato pacchā evampi siyāti paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇāya sambhavadassanatthaṃ “pādarajagharagolikavaccādisamparikiṇṇa”ntiādi
anya-e0103n:1484_3: Tattha paccattharaṇanti bhūmiyā chavirakkhaṇatthaṃ attharitabbaṃ cimilikādiattharaṇamāha.
anya-e0103n:1484_7: Appekadā ulūkapārāvatādīhīti idhāpi “appekadā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1485_0: Vitakkamāḷaketi “kattha nu kho ajja bhikkhāya caritabba”ntiādinā vitakkanamāḷake.
anya-e0103n:1486_0: Gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādentenātiādi evamajjhāsayena nivāsanādi kātabbanti vattadassanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1486_2: Atha vā gaṇḍaṃ viya gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādayamānenāti ekaṃ gaṇḍa-
anya-e0103n:1486_6: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato gaṇḍoti attabhāvassa pariyāyo,
anya-e0103n:1486_18: Gāmaracchā vinivijjhitvā ṭhitā oloketabbā honti yugamattadassināpi satāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1487_1: Anekakuṇapapariyosānanti ettha dunnivatthaduppārutamanussasamākulānaṃ gāmaracchānaṃ olokanampi ānetvā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1487_5: Yāvañcidaṃ paṭikkūlo āhāro yadatthaṃ gamanampi nāma evaṃ jegucchaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1488_5: ito parampi mahantaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sakalaṃ adhivāsetabbamevā”ti vakkhamānaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
anya-e0103n:1488_11: Macchā dhovīyanti etenāti macchadhovanaṃ, udakaṃ. Sammissa-
anya-e0103n:1489_0: Dadamānāpītiādi satipi kesañci saddhānaṃ vasena sakkaccakāre paṭikkūlapaccavekkhaṇāyogyaṃ pana asaddhānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1489_7: Piṇḍolyassa antimajīvikābhāvenāha “kapaṇamanussena viya gāme piṇḍāya caritvā nikkhamitabba”nti.
anya-e0103n:1490_2: Lajjitabbaṃ hoti “ucchiṭṭhaṃ nu kho ayaṃ mayhaṃ dātukāmo”ti āsaṅkeyyāti,
anya-e0103n:1491_4: Vicuṇṇitamakkhitoti ubhayehi dantehi vicuṇṇito kheḷādīhi samupalitto.
anya-e0103n:1491_9: raso pana nasseyya vā na vāti āha “antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāraviseso”ti.
anya-e0103n:1491_12: Cakkhussa āpāthaṃ atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotīti ukkaṃsagataṃ tassa paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0103n:1492_2: Esa āhāro anto pavisamāno bahalamadhukatelamakkhito viya paramajeguccho hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1492_4: Nidhānamanupagato āmāsayaṃ appattoyeva āhāro pittādīhi vimissito hotīti āha “pavisamāno”ti.
anya-e0103n:1492_8: Evaṃ āsayatoti jeguccho hutvā anto paviṭṭho jegucchatarehi pittādīhi vimissito ativiya jeguccho hotīti evaṃ āsayato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0103n:1494_4: Yathāvuttappakāreti sace pana “dasavassikenā”tiādinā yathāvutto pakāro etassāti yathāvuttappakāro, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0103n:1494_6: Atiduggandhajegucche padese paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1494_8: Kālameghena abhivuṭṭhe āvāṭe bahuso vassanena ekaccaṃ asucijātaṃ uppilavitvā vigaccheyyāti akālamegha- ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1494_10: ggahaṇaṃ na asubhassāpi asubhena sammissatāya asubhabhāvappattidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1495_1: Suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viyāti yathā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo vidhinā tāpiyamānā suvaṇṇarajatādike muñcantiyo
anya-e0103n:1495_4: Ayaṃ pana āhāro kāyagginā paripakko pheṇapubbuḷake muñcanto saṇhaṃ karonti etthāti “saṇhakaraṇī”ti laddhanāmake
anya-e0103n:1495_5: nisade pisitvā nāḷike khuddakaveḷunāḷikāyaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānamattena pakkhippamānapaṇḍumattikā viya karīsabhāvaṃ
anya-e0103n:1495_8: Gahaṇiyā indhanabhāgo viya kimibhakkhabhāgo ca apākaṭova.
anya-e0103n:1495_10: aparipakkasabhāgā ca teti te anāmasitvā karīsamuttabhāgā evettha dassitā.
anya-e0103n:1496_1: Paṭikkūlassa nāma phalena paṭikkūleneva bhavitabbanti dassento “sammā paripaccamāno”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1496_3: saddena na kevalaṃ tacādīni eva dvattiṃsākārapāḷiyaṃ āgatāni,
anya-e0103n:1496_4: atha kho akkhigūthakaṇṇagūthadantamalajallikāsambhavādīni dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsavinimuttāni asubhāni saṅgaṇhanto “nānākuṇapānī”ti āhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1497_10: sakalakāye lomakūpehi sedajallikāti evaṃpakāraṃ asuciṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1497_16: Rattoti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmākārena chandarāgena ratto.
anya-e0103n:1497_17: Giddhoti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena giddho gedhaṃ āpanno.
anya-e0103n:1497_18: Gadhitoti dummocanīyabhāvena ganthito viya tattha paṭibaddho.
anya-e0103n:1498_4: Evanti ekena dvārena pavesanaṃ anekehi dvārehi anekadhā nikkhāmanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1499_2: saddena paviṭṭhamattopi nāma pavesadvāraṃ jegucchaṃ karoti,
anya-e0103n:1499_16: Cokkhajātikā pana mukhādīnipi dhovitvā hatthaṃ puna dhovantiyeva.
anya-e0103n:1499_20: Ettha ca āhāratthāya gamanapariyesanānaṃ paṭikkūlatā āhāre paṭikkūlatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n:1500_1: Taṃ nimittanti yathāvuttehi ākārehi punappunaṃ manasi karontassa paṭikkūlākāravasena upaṭṭhitaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārasaññitaṃ bhāvanāya nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1500_5: Tathā ca sati appanāppattena jhānena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1500_10: Ettha hi yadipi paṭikkūlākāravasena bhāvanā pavattati.
anya-e0103n:1500_13: na paññattīti paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇamukhenapi sabhāvadhammeyeva ārabbha bhāvanāya pavattanato,
anya-e0103n:1500_14: sabhāvadhammānañca sabhāveneva gambhīrabhāvato na tattha jhānaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0103n:1500_17: kathaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ “saññā” icceva voharīyatīti āha “paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1501_0: Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “imañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1501_2: Patilīyatīti saṅkucati anekākāraṃ tattha paṭikkūlatāya saṇṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n:1501_7: madābhāvaggahaṇeneva cassa davamaṇḍanavibhūsanādīnampi abhāvo gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1501_8: Kabaḷīkārāhārapariññāmukhenāti vuttanayena paṭikkūlākārato kabaḷīkārāhārassa paricchijja jānanadvārena.
anya-e0103n:1501_9: Pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgoti anativattanaṭṭhena pañcasu kāmaguṇesu niyutto,
anya-e0103n:1501_12: Rasataṇhāya hi sammadeva vigatāya rūpataṇhādayopi vigatā eva honti bhojane mattaññutāya ukkaṃsagamanato.
anya-e0103n:1501_13: Sati ca visayisamatikkame visayo samatikkanto eva hotīti āha “so pañcakāmaguṇapariññāmukhena rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1501_15: taggāhakā pasādā ca sukheneva pariññaṃ gacchantīti.
anya-e0103n:1501_21: phalaggahaṇena kesādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ pariggaho siddho hotīti āha “kāyagatāsatibhāvanāpi pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1501_24: Anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇena kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchabhāvasallakkhaṇato.
anya-e0103n:1501_25: Imaṃ pana paṭipattinti imaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1501_26: Amatapariyosānatanti nibbānaniṭṭhitaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nibbānādhigamanti attho.
anya-e0103n:1504_1: “Ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhassa catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto”ti uddeso nāma niddesattho mudumajjhapaññābāhullato,
anya-e0103n:1504_2: āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1504_3: Tattha satipi visayabhedena vavatthānassa bhede vavatthānabhāvasāmaññena pana taṃ abhinnaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti,
anya-e0103n:1504_4: pubbabhāge vā satipi visayabhede atthasiddhiyaṃ tassa ekavisayatāvāti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1504_5: Yathā hi dvattiṃsākāre kammaṃ karontassa yogino yadipi pubbabhāge visuṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1504_6: aparabhāge pana ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse atthasiddhi hoti,
anya-e0103n:1504_10: yathā paṭikkūlabhāvasāmaññena dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhāne abhedato manasikāro pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1504_11: evaṃ idha dhātubhāvasāmaññena abhedato manasikāro pavattatīti “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti?
anya-e0103n:1504_13: Tattha hi paṇṇattisamatikkamato paṭṭhāya paṭikkūlavaseneva sabbattha manasikāro pavattetabbo,
anya-e0103n:1504_14: idha pana sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇato dhātuyo manasi kātabbā,
anya-e0103n:1504_18: aññehi ekūnacattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ nāma ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti dassetuṃ “ekaṃ vavatthāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1504_24: Kathaṃ pana bhāvanā niddisīyati tassā vacīgocarātikkantabhāvatoti?
anya-e0103n:1505_1: Idaṃ hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikammaṭṭhānaṃ viya na paṇṇattimattasallakkhaṇavasena,
anya-e0103n:1505_22: tatthāpi ajjhattikānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pabhedato anavasesapariyādānassa katattā,
anya-e0103n:1505_24: Atha vā dvidhā āgatanti ettha dvidhāva āgatanti na evaṃ niyamo gahetabbo,
anya-e0103n:1505_26: tena tatiyassāpi pakārassa saṅgaho siddho hoti.
anya-e0103n:1505_27: So ca nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayo “saṅkhepato ca vitthārato cā”ti ettha āvuttivasena, ca-
anya-e0103n:1505_29: Atha vā yo nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena atisaṅkhepapaṭikkhepamukhena labbhamāno vitthārabhāgo,
anya-e0103n:1505_31: Evañca katvā “nātitikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena vitthārato āgata”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0103n:1506_0: Kāmaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhāne atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā desanā āgatā,
anya-e0103n:1506_1: upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyatthavibhāvanatthāti upamaṃ tāva dassetvā upameyyatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādinā pāḷi ānītā.
anya-e0103n:1506_7: ekaccaveneyyajanacaritānukulatāya ca mahābhūtavasena kammaṭṭhānaniddeso katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1507_0: Evaṃ tikkhapaññassātiādīsu evanti yathādassitaṃ pāḷiṃ paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n:1508_1: yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā,
anya-e0103n:1508_5: Antevāsīti kammakaraṇavasena tassa samīpavāsī tassa tannissāya jīvanato.
anya-e0103n:1508_7: Mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāteti catunnaṃ mahāpathānaṃ tāya eva vinivijjhanaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte.
anya-e0103n:1508_8: Yasmā te cattāro mahāpathā catūhi disāhi āgantvā samohitā viya honti,
anya-e0103n:1508_11: Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhajjantīti bīlā, bhāgā, va-
anya-e0103n:1508_15: Tameva hi bhāgatthaṃ dassetuṃ “koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1508_19: saddassa aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako,
anya-e0103n:1508_20: idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhita”nti.
anya-e0103n:1508_22: Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāsaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya “iriyāpathā”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0103n:1508_27: Ṭhitanti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1508_28: Paṇihitanti paccayakiccavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1508_29: Dhātusoti dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1508_30: Paccavekkhatīti pati pati avekkhati ñāṇacakkhunā vinibbhujitvā passati.
anya-e0103n:1509_0: Yathā chekotiādinā pāḷiyā saddatthavivaraṇavasena vuttamevatthaṃ idāni bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ “yathā goghātakassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1509_5: Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā,
anya-e0103n:1509_9: tato vā vivecitaṃ maṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā.
anya-e0103n:1509_13: Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti yathāvuttaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso paccavekkhantassa.
anya-e0103n:1509_15: vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato.
anya-e0103n:1509_16: Evaṃ hi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena opameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti.
anya-e0103n:1510_1: Evaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānassa saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “mahāhatthipadūpame panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1510_4: na sabbaṃ desanānayaṃ aññathāpi tattha desanānayassa āgatattā.
anya-e0103n:1511_2: Ajjhattaṃ paccattanti padadvayenāpi taṃtaṃpāṭipuggalikadhammo vuccatīti āha “ubhayampi niyakassa adhivacana”nti.
anya-e0103n:1511_3: Sasantatipariyāpannatāya pana attani gahetabbabhāvūpagamanavasena attānaṃ adhikicca pavattaṃ ajjhattaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1511_8: Yasmā taṃ thaddhabhāvena sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0103n:1511_12: Yasmā pana kharasabhāvaṃ pharusākārena upaṭṭhānato pharusākāraṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1511_16: Taṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya upādinnampi atthi anupādinnampi,
anya-e0103n:1511_17: taṇhādīhi ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena sabbampetaṃ upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ “upādinnanti daḷhaṃ ādinna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1511_19: Seyyathidanti kathetukamyatāpucchāvācīti āha “taṃ katamanti ceti attho”ti.
anya-e0103n:1511_23: Kiñcāpi matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjeneva saṅgahetvā idha pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1511_24: paṭisambhidāmagge pana vīsatiyā ākārehi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ visuṃ gahitanti tampi saṅgaṇhanto thaddhabhāvādhikatāya
anya-e0103n:1511_25: pathavīdhātukoṭṭhāsesuyeva “matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n:1511_26: “Yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī”ti vā iminā pāḷiyaṃ matthaluṅgassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1511_27: Tasmā idha “yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī”ti idaṃ pubbāparāpekkhaṃ “matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā,
anya-e0103n:1511_29: Puna yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcīti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesūti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1512_4: So hi vissandanabhāvena sasambhārapathavīsaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ visarati,
anya-e0103n:1512_7: Sopi hi sahajātaaññamaññanissayādipaccayatāya sesabhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ dravabhāvasiddhena vissandanabhāvena ābandhattaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1513_5: Tejodhātuvasena labbhamānā imasmiṃ kāye jarāpavatti pākaṭajarāvasena veditabbāti dassetuṃ “indriyavekallata”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1513_7: sarīrassa dahanavasena pavatto mahādāho paridāhoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n:1513_8: Yena jīrīyatīti ca ekāhikādijararogena jarīyatītipi attho yujjati.
anya-e0103n:1513_9: Satakkhattuṃ tāpetvā tāpetvā sītudake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭā sappi “satadhotasappī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:1513_13: Sammā paripākaṃ gacchatīti samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1513_14: asammāparipākopi pana visamavepākiniyā tassā eva vasena veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1513_17: Asitādibhedassa hi āhārassa pariṇāme raso hoti,
anya-e0103n:1514_8: saddena pana antantarassa vuccamānattā tadavasiṭṭho udarappadeso idha kucchi-
anya-e0103n:1514_9: saddena vuccatīti āha “kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1514_12: “Assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāvā”ti etena assāsapassāsānaṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā pavatti natthīti dīpeti.
anya-e0103n:1514_13: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānassa sambhavo atthīti.
anya-e0103n:1514_18: santāne pavattautusamuṭṭhānassa ca vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1514_19: Sabbatthāti āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ niddesaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n:1514_20: Tattha āpodhātuniddese “yaṃ vā panañña”nti iminā sambhavassa,
anya-e0103n:1514_22: vāyodhātuniddese dhamanijālānusaṭassa tattha tattha cammakhīlapīḷakādinibbattakavāyuno saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1514_26: Na hi samiñjanādinibbattakā eva aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātā,
anya-e0103n:1515_2: Etthāti etasmiṃ vitthārato āgate dhātukammaṭṭhāneti attho.
anya-e0103n:1515_3: Tena ayaṃ vaṇṇanā na kevalaṃ mahāhatthipadūpamasseva,
anya-e0103n:1516_5: Yasmā yesaṃ “tikkhapañño nātitikkhapañño”ti imesaṃ duvidhānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ dvidhā āgataṃ dvidhā desitaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1516_6: tasmā kammaṭṭhānābhinivesopi tesaṃ dvidhāva icchitabboti taṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1516_10: lomā pathavīdhātū”tiādinā evaṃ dvācattālīsāya ākārehi vitthārato dhātukammaṭṭhānapariggaho.
anya-e0103n:1516_12: Yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇanti kesādīsu yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ kakkhaḷabhāvo.
anya-e0103n:1516_14: Evaṃ manasi karototi vatthuṃ anāmasitvā evaṃ lakkhaṇamattato manasikāraṃ pavattentassa.
anya-e0103n:1516_16: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1516_17: tassa vā lakkhaṇassa suṭṭhu upaṭṭhānato taṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ manasikārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ visadaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1516_19: Sabbaso mandapaññassa bhāvanāva na ijjhatīti āha “nātitikkhapaññassā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1516_20: Evaṃ manasi karototi vuttanayena saṅkhepato manasi karoto.
anya-e0103n:1516_21: Andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hotīti anupaṭṭhānato andhaṃ viya karontaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti kammaṭṭhānanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1516_23: Vatthuāmasanena vitthārato manasi karontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1517_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā dvīsu bhikkhūsū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1517_1: Tattha peyyālamukhanti peyyālapāḷiyā mukhabhūtaṃ dvārabhūtaṃ ādito vāraṃ,
anya-e0103n:1517_6: Yathā ganthaparivattane tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno saṅkhepo ruccati,
anya-e0103n:1518_3: taṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti idha na āmaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1518_10: Paṭisallīnenāti pati pati puthuttārammaṇato cittaṃ nisedhetvā kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena,
anya-e0103n:1518_12: Sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ āvajjetvāti uddhaṃ pādatalā,
anya-e0103n:1518_14: tiriyaṃ tacapariyantaṃ sabbampi attano karajakāyaṃ dhātuvasena manasi karonto yasmā cātumahābhūtiko ayaṃ kāyo,
anya-e0103n:1518_15: tasmā “atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”ti catumahābhūtavasena samannāharitvāti attho.
anya-e0103n:1518_17: upaṭṭhānākārato ca manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “yo imasmiṃ kāye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1519_10: upaṭṭhānākāro ca nāma dhātūnaṃ sakiccakaraṇavasena ñāṇassa vibhūtākāro.
anya-e0103n:1519_13: Ekaccassa hi dhātuyo manasi karontassa tā sabhāvato gahetabbataṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0103n:1519_16: Tatrāyaṃ yogī dhātuyo manasi karonto ādito paccekaṃ salakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1519_18: Tenāha “yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā…pe…
anya-e0103n:1519_20: Tattha pariggahetvāti pariggāhakabhūtena ñāṇena dhātuyo lakkhaṇato,
anya-e0103n:1520_0: Evaṃ pana dhātuyo pariggahetvā “atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā,
anya-e0103n:1520_3: vāyodhātu vitthambhanabhāvo vā samudīraṇabhāvo vā”ti evaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi saddhiṃyeva dhātuyo manasi karontena
anya-e0103n:1520_4: kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1520_6: Tassevaṃ manasi karoto yaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu supākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1520_7: tadeva gahetvā itaraṃ vissajjetvā tena saddhiṃ “pathavīdhātu āpodhātū”tiādinā manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0103n:1520_15: tayo ca suttantāti imehi dasahākārehi manasikārakosallaṃ anuṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1521_0: Tattha anupubbatoti anupaṭipāṭito ācariyassa santike uggahitapaṭipāṭito,
anya-e0103n:1521_2: Evaṃ anupubbato manasi karontenāpi nātisīghato manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1521_3: Atisīghato manasi karoto hi aparāparaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro nirantaraṃ pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1521_9: Atisaṇikato manasi karoto hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati,
anya-e0103n:1521_11: Atisīghaṃ atisaṇikañca maggaṃ gacchantā purisā ettha nidassetabbā.
anya-e0103n:1521_12: Vikkhepapaṭibāhanatoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo.
anya-e0103n:1521_13: Bahiddhā vikkhepe hi sati kammaṭṭhānā parihāyati paridhaṃsati.
anya-e0103n:1521_16: taṃ atikkamitvā lakkhaṇesu eva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1522_0: Evaṃ paṇṇattiṃ vijahitvā kakkhaḷalakkhaṇādīsu eva manasikāraṃ pavattentassa lakkhaṇāni supākaṭāni suvibhūtāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0103n:1522_1: Tassevaṃ punappunaṃ manasikāravasena cittaṃ āsevanaṃ labhati.
anya-e0103n:1522_2: Sabbo rūpakāyo dhātumattato upaṭṭhāti suñño nissatto nijjīvo yantaṃ viya yantasuttena aparāparaṃ parivattamāno.
anya-e0103n:1522_4: athassa āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā dhātusamūhavaseneva upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0103n:1522_5: tehi kariyamānā kiriyā dhātumayena yantena pavattiyamānā hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0103n:1522_6: tehi ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi dhātusaṅghāte pakkhippamāno dhātusaṅghāto viya upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0103n:1522_7: Athassa tathā laddhāsevanampi cittaṃ yadi accāraddhavīriyatāya uddhaccavasena vā atilīnavīriyatāya kosajjavasena vā bhāvanāvidhiṃ na otareyya,
anya-e0103n:1522_10: bojjhaṅgasuttanti imesu tīsu suttesu āgatanayena vīriyasamādhiyojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0103n:1522_12: Evaṃ pana vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā tasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamatāni suvisadāni pavattanti,
anya-e0103n:1522_13: tadā asaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti,
anya-e0103n:1522_14: tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāniyeva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi.
anya-e0103n:1522_15: Ettāvatā cānena upacārajjhānaṃ samadhigataṃ hoti dhātulakkhaṇārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1523_2: lokiyamahājano ca “satto jīvo”tiādikaṃ visesaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve avijjamānaṃ vikappanāmatteneva samāropenti,
anya-e0103n:1523_6: Manasi kātabbanti punappunaṃ bhāvanāvasena dhātumattato dhātulakkhaṇaṃ manasi ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1523_7: Paccavekkhitabbanti tadeva dhātulakkhaṇaṃ pati pati avekkhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1524_0: Tassevaṃ vāyamamānassāti tassa yogino evaṃ vuttappakārena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa,
anya-e0103n:1524_7: antarā saṅkocaṃ anāpajjantena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ussoḷhiyaṃ avaṭṭhānena sammadeva vāyāmaṃ payogaṃ parakkamaṃ pavattentassa.
anya-e0103n:1524_9: bhāvanāpaññāya ādimajjhapariyosānesu avijahanena sabbato gahito mahaggatabhāvaṃ appattatāya upacāramatto
anya-e0103n:1524_12: Appanaṃ hi upecca cārī samādhi upacārasamādhi,
anya-e0103n:1524_14: Tādisassa pana samādhissa samānalakkhaṇatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1524_17: Sabhāvadhamme hi tassa gambhīrabhāvato asati bhāvanāvisese appanājhānaṃ na uppajjati,
anya-e0103n:1524_19: āruppaṃ ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena appanāppattaṃ hotīti maraṇānussatiniddese vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0103n:1525_0: Evaṃ rūpakāye avisesena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni tattha
anya-e0103n:1525_1: aṭṭhiādīnaṃ vinibbhujanavasena saṅkhepato sutte āgataṃ dhātumanasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1525_2: Tattha ye ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā vuttāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1525_3: Yathāpaccayaṃ ṭhitā sannivesavisiṭṭhā kaṭṭhavallitiṇamattikāyo upādāya yathā agārasamaññā,
anya-e0103n:1525_4: na tattha koci agāro nāma atthi,
anya-e0103n:1525_5: evaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ sannivesavisiṭṭhāni pavattamānāni aṭṭhinhārumaṃsacammāni paṭicca sarīrasamaññā,
anya-e0103n:1525_9: Tattha aṭṭhiñca paṭiccāti paṇhikaṭṭhikādibhedaṃ paṭipāṭiyā ussitaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ atirekatisatabhedaṃ aṭṭhiṃ upādāya.
anya-e0103n:1525_10: Nhāruñcāti tameva aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitaṃ navasatappabhedaṃ nhāruṃ.
anya-e0103n:1525_11: Maṃsanti tameva aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ navapesisatappabhedaṃ maṃsaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1525_12: Cammanti macchikapattakacchāyāya chaviyā sañchāditaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ bahalacammaṃ paṭicca upādāya.
anya-e0103n:1525_15: Ākāso parivāritoti yathā bhittipādādivasena ṭhapitaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1525_19: bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso agārantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0103n:1525_22: bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso tāneva aṭṭhiādīni upādāya rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0103n:1525_24: Yathā ca kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ loke “khattiyagehaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1525_27: natthettha koci satto vā jīvo vāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1526_0: Teti te cattāro koṭṭhāse vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1526_1: Taṃtaṃantarānusārināti aṭṭhinhārūnaṃ nhārumaṃsānaṃ maṃsacammānanti tesaṃ tesaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ vivarānupātinā ñāṇasaṅkhātena hatthena.
anya-e0103n:1526_3: Atha vā vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti paccekaṃ aṭṭhiādīnaṃ antarānusārinā ñāṇahatthena vinibbhogaṃ katvā.
anya-e0103n:1526_4: Etesūti sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ catudhā katvā vibhattesu yathāvuttesu aṭṭhiādīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu.
anya-e0103n:1526_5: Purimanayenevāti “yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayeneva.
anya-e0103n:1527_4: nanu ādito dvattiṃsākārā dhātuyo na hontīti?
anya-e0103n:1527_6: Vuttappakāreti “gocaragāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgate”tiādinā vuttappakāre.
anya-e0103n:1527_7: Katasabbakiccenāti palibodhupacchedādikaṃ kataṃ sabbakiccaṃ etenāti katasabbakicco,
anya-e0103n:1527_8: tenassa sīlavisodhanādi pana kammaṭṭhānuggahaṇato pageva siddhaṃ hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1527_13: Kesādīsu hi vīsatiyā ākāresu “pathavī”ti buddhivohārā pathavīnimittakā thaddhataṃ upādāya pavattanato.
anya-e0103n:1527_14: Tasmā tattha pathavīsambhāro nāma savisesāya tassā atthitāya kesādayo saha sambhārehīti sasambhārā.
anya-e0103n:1527_20: chasu ca koṭṭhāsesu yathākkamaṃ pathavīādikā catasso dhātuyo pariggahetvā dhātuvavatthānaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāvanā.
anya-e0103n:1528_0: Sasambhāravibhattitoti sasambhārānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādike vīsati koṭṭhāse pubbe viya ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0103n:1528_10: kesādike vīsati koṭṭhāse ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tattha thaddhatādikaṃ catubbidhampi lakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā bhāvanā salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato bhāvanā.
anya-e0103n:1528_12: Salakkhaṇavibhattitoti thaddhalakkhaṇādinā salakkhaṇānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādīsu dvācattālīsāya
anya-e0103n:1528_13: ākāresu paccekaṃ thaddhatādīnaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vavatthāpanavasena bhāvanā.
anya-e0103n:1529_0: Evaṃ catūhi ākārehi uddiṭṭhaṃ bhāvanānayaṃ niddisituṃ “kathaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāvetī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1529_1: Ettha ca yathā tikkhapañño puggalo tikkhatāya paropariyattasabbhāvato tikkhindriyamudindriyatāvasena duvidhoti.
anya-e0103n:1529_2: Tattha tikkhindriyassa vasena saṅkhepato paṭhamanayo vutto,
anya-e0103n:1529_11: Tassa evaṃ vavatthāpayato eva dhātuyo pākaṭā honti savisesaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggahitattā.
anya-e0103n:1530_7: Dvattiṃsākāreti dhātumanasikāravasena pariggahite kesādike dvattiṃsavidhe koṭṭhāse.
anya-e0103n:1530_8: “Dvattiṃsākāre”ti ca idaṃ tejavāyukoṭṭhāsesu vaṇṇādivasena vavatthānassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1530_9: Sabbaṃ tattha vuttavidhānaṃ kātabbanti “vacasā manasā”tiādinā vuttauggahakosalluddesato paṭṭhāya yāva “anupubbamuñcanādivasenā”ti padaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1530_10: tāva āgataṃ sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1530_12: Ayañca vaṇṇādivasena manasikāro dhātupaṭikkūlavaṇṇamanasikārānaṃ sādhāraṇo pubbabhāgoti nibbattitadhātumanasikārameva
anya-e0103n:1531_1: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti ete “sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ kesā”ti evaṃ vohariyamānā bhūtupādāyadhammā “mayi kesā jātā,
anya-e0103n:1531_3: Iminā kāraṇassa ca phalassa ca abyāpāratāya dhātumattataṃ sandasseti,
anya-e0103n:1531_4: tena ca ābhogapaccavekkhaṇānampi evameva abyāpāratā dīpitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1531_6: tesaṃ kāraṇāni ca tathā tathā ābhujitvā,
anya-e0103n:1531_16: Tato eva pathavīdhātūti evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabboti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1532_0: 312. Suññagāmaṭṭhāneti ettha suññagāmaggahaṇaṃ paramatthato vedakavirahadassanatthaṃ kāyassa.
anya-e0103n:1538_1: Paṇhikaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādhārabhāvo viya gopphakaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādheyyabhāvopi asamannāhārasiddhoti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0103n:1538_2: “paṇhikaṭṭhigopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna “sīsaṭṭhigīvaṭṭhike patiṭṭhita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1542_2: Evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānātīti ettha na vakkahadayāni jānanti “mayaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchannānī”ti,
anya-e0103n:1542_3: na sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchanna”nti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1546_1: Āmāsaye ṭhito paribhuttāhāro udariyanti adhippetanti āha “udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyita”nti.
anya-e0103n:1547_2: kāyusmā viya ca kammajarūpapaṭibaddhavuttikanti āha “ābaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti.
anya-e0103n:1547_3: Paṭibaddhatāvacanena cassa jīvitindriye sati sabbhāvameva dīpeti,
anya-e0103n:1549_1: Pubbāsayo mandapaññānaṃ kesañcideva hotīti katvā asabbasādhāraṇanti adhippāyenāha “pubbo anibaddhokāso”ti.
anya-e0103n:1550_4: itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇena ca temetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1550_5: Heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni temayamāneti temakatemitabbānaṃ abyāpāratāsāmaññanidassanatthaṃ eva upamā daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0103n:1550_9: Yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ “mayi lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti na jānāti,
anya-e0103n:1550_10: vakkādīni “amhe temayamānaṃ lohitaṃ ṭhita”nti na jānantīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1551_4: Medassa satipi patthinnatāya ghanabhāve maṃsassa viya na baddhatāti vuttaṃ “patthinnayūso”ti.
anya-e0103n:1552_1: Udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesūti nātipariṇatānaṃ sajalakānaṃ aggato chinnānaṃ tālasalāṭukānaṃ vivarāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1553_1: Vasāya attano ādhāre abhibyāpanamukhena abyāpāratāsāmaññaṃ vibhāvetabbanti ācāmagatatelaṃ nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1555_1: Kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā tejokoṭṭhāsesu pavattetabbo manasikāroti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1556_3: Dhātuyo pākaṭā hontīti vitthārato pariggahitattā dhātuyo vibhūtā honti.
anya-e0103n:1558_0: Puna tatthevāti tesuyeva dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesūti attho.
anya-e0103n:1558_1: Ettha ca kesādikoṭṭhāsānaṃ saṃviggahatāya tattha vijjamānā āpodhātuādayo nhāniyacuṇṇādīsu udakādayo viya
anya-e0103n:1559_0: Santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsesu pana vāyodhātuādayo na tathā suviññeyyāti katvā “tena avinibhutta”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1559_4: Vāyukoṭṭhāsāpi hi uddhaṅgamavātādayo piṇḍākāreneva pariggahetabbataṃ upagacchanti,
anya-e0103n:1559_9: Evaṃ vavatthāpayatoti vuttākārena salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo vavatthāpentassa.
anya-e0103n:1560_1: Evampi bhāvayatoti salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo pariggahetvā bhāventassāpi.
anya-e0103n:1560_2: Pubbe vuttanayenāti sasambhāravibhattito bhāvanāyaṃ vuttena nayena.
anya-e0103n:1560_4: Sabbakoṭṭhāsesūti ekacattālīsabhedesu sesasabbakoṭṭhāsesu evamettha aṭṭhasaṭṭhidhātusatassa pariggaho vutto hoti.
anya-e0103n:1561_0: Idāni vacanatthādimukhenapi dhātūsu manasikāravidhānaṃ dassetuṃ “vacanatthato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1561_1: Tattha vacanatthatoti yasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānassa uggahaṇaṃ vacanavasena hoti vacanadvārena tadatthassa ādito gahetabbato,
anya-e0103n:1561_4: sāmaññato ca dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa yasmā tā piṇḍaso pavattanti,
anya-e0103n:1561_7: Te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti tappariyāpannānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ ekasmiṃ sarīre parimeyyaparicchedaṃ
anya-e0103n:1561_9: So panāyaṃ tāsaṃ cuṇṇato manasikāro saṅghāṭavasena hotīti nibbaṭṭitasarūpameva pariggahetabbaṃ dassetuṃ lakkhaṇādito manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n:1561_10: Lakkhaṇādito dhātuyo pariggaṇhantena salakkhaṇavibhattito kammaṭṭhānābhinivese yasmā dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ
anya-e0103n:1561_12: ettakā cittādisamuṭṭhānā”ti ayaṃ vibhāgo ñātabbo hoti,
anya-e0103n:1562_0: Evaṃ pariññātasamuṭṭhānānampi tāsaṃ saddānusārena vinā visesasāmaññapariggaho kātabboti dassetuṃ nānattekattato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n:1562_1: Lakkhaṇavisesato vinibhuttarūpāpi etā aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya padesena avinibhuttāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti
anya-e0103n:1562_4: kāci visabhāgāti ayampi viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ sabhāgavisabhāgato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n:1562_6: bāhirā tabbiparītāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ ajjhattikabāhiravisesato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n:1562_7: Sajātisaṅgahādiko dhātusaṅgahavisesopi pariggahitabboti dassetuṃ saṅgahato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n:1562_8: Sandhāraṇādīhi yathāsakakiccehi aññamaññūpatthambhabhāvatopi dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ paccayato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n:1562_9: Abyāpāranayato dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ asamannāhārato manasikāro vutto.
anya-e0103n:1562_11: paccayabhāvavisesato ca dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ paccayavibhāgato manasikāro vuttoti evametesaṃ
anya-e0103n:1563_11: Sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n:1564_0: Evaṃ tāva visesato vacanatthaṃ vatvā idāni sāmaññato vattuṃ “avisesena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1564_1: Salakkhaṇadhāraṇatoti yathā titthiyaparikappito “pakati attā”ti evamādiko sabhāvato natthi,
anya-e0103n:1564_3: Etā pana salakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
anya-e0103n:1564_5: Etā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā ayalohādidhātuyo viya ayalohādiṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti.
anya-e0103n:1564_7: taṃ vā dukkhaṃ etāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi sattehi anuvidhīyati,
anya-e0103n:1564_8: tathāvihitañca taṃ etāsveva dhīyati ṭhapīyatīti evaṃ dukkhādhānato, dhātuyo.
anya-e0103n:1564_10: Tathā hi bhagavā “chadhāturoyaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0103n:1564_12: sādhāraṇato ca dhātūnaṃ sarasalakkhaṇameva vibhāvīyatīti āha “evaṃ visesasāmaññavasena vacanatthato manasi kātabbā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1564_13: Manasikāro pana vacanatthamukhena dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1565_2: Atha vā ākarīyanti dissanti ettha dhātuyoti ākārā, koṭṭhāsā.
anya-e0103n:1565_3: Aṭṭhadhammasamodhānāti yathāvuttānaṃ paccayavisesena visiṭṭharūpānaṃ vaṇṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ samavadhānato
anya-e0103n:1565_7: Yathā hi vaṇṇādayo aṭṭha dhammā paññāya vinibbhujjamānā aññamaññabyatirekena paramatthato upalabbhanti,
anya-e0103n:1565_8: na evaṃ vaṇṇādibyatirekena paramatthato kesā upalabbhanti.
anya-e0103n:1565_9: Tasmā ye ca dhamme samudite upādāya “kesā”ti sammuti,
anya-e0103n:1565_10: tesu visuṃ visuṃ katesu natthi “kesā”ti sammuti,
anya-e0103n:1566_0: “Aṭṭhadhammakalāpamattamevā”ti idaṃ kesapaññattiyā upādāyabhūte vaṇṇādike ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1566_4: Dasadhammakalāpopīti ettha asitādiparipācako tejokoṭṭhāso navadhammakalāpopīti vattabbo.
anya-e0103n:1566_6: atha kasmā pathavīādidhātumattato manasi karīyantīti āha “ussadavasena panā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1566_10: Ettha hi udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttañca utusamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0103n:1566_13: sedoassu kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti cattāro utucittavasena dvisamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0103n:1567_0: Tesu asitādiparipācake tejokoṭṭhāse eko kalāpo jīvitanavako,
anya-e0103n:1567_8: cakkhādisaññitesu maṃsakoṭṭhāsesu cakkhusotaghānajivhāvatthudasakasahitā cāti paripuṇṇāyatanake rūpakāye
anya-e0103n:1567_9: bhedaṃ anāmasitvā ekattavasena gayhamānā sattacattālīsādhikasatarūpakalāpā rūpavibhāgato sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍharūpasahassaṃ hoti,
anya-e0103n:1567_10: koṭṭhāsānaṃ pana avayavavibhāgena tadavayavakalāpānaṃ bhede gayhamāne rūpadhammānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyabhedatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n:1567_11: Evaṃ dhammavibhāgato anekabhedabhinnāpi ime dvācattālīsa koṭṭhāsā ussadaggahaṇena catudhātuvaseneva vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0103n:1568_1: Majjhimena pamāṇenāti ārohapariṇāhehi majjhimasarīre labbhamānena majjhimena parimāṇena.
anya-e0103n:1568_3: Paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇāti ettha yathā “aṅgulassa aṭṭhamo bhāgo yavo,
anya-e0103n:1568_9: evaṃ aṇuno aṭṭhamo bhāgo paramāṇu nāmā”ti keci.
anya-e0103n:1568_17: Tasmā aṇuno chattiṃsatimabhāgamatto paramāṇu nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṃsacakkhussa agocaro dibbacakkhusseva gocarabhūto.
anya-e0103n:1569_5: taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n:1569_8: Anupālitāti yathā paggharaṇasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1569_12: Na vikirati na viddhaṃsatīti sukhumarajabhūtāpi pathavīdhātu ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi āpotejovāyodhātūhi
anya-e0103n:1569_13: laddhapaccayā sinehena temitā tejasā paripakkā vāyunā vitthambhanaṃ pāpitā piṭṭhacuṇṇā viya na ito cito
anya-e0103n:1569_15: atha kho piṇḍitā ghanabhūtā hutvā nānappakārena gahetabbataṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0103n:1569_20: na tādiso tejovāyodhātūsu labbhatīti meyyabhāvābhāvato tattha cuṇṇabhedo na uddhaṭo.
anya-e0103n:1569_21: Tathā hi sasambhāratejovāyūsupi meyyabhāvo na labbhateva.
anya-e0103n:1571_0: Usumākārabhūtāti etena kāye pākatikausmāpi gahaṇīsaṅkhātāya tassāyeva tejodhātuyā vasena hotīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n:1571_2: Sā hi yathābhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti santejetīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1571_5: cittappasādahetukāya ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo,
anya-e0103n:1571_6: pageva utuāhārasamuṭṭhānāya rūpasampattiyā yathāvuttatejodhātūti āha “vaṇṇasampattiñcassa āvahatī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1572_13: Tattha dhātuyantanti suttena viya yantarūpakaṃ asatipi kattubhūte attani cittavasena dhātumayaṃ yantaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0103n:1573_1: Yadipi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ lakkhaṇādayo heṭṭhā tattha tattha vuttā eva,
anya-e0103n:1573_2: tathāpi te anavasesato dassetvā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggahavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “lakkhaṇādito”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1573_7: tathāpi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena abhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato.
anya-e0103n:1573_10: kakkhaḷattaṃ hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1573_13: Tato eva nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatīti sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1573_16: Yathā vā dhammuddesavāravaṇṇanādīsu rasādinā aññesaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā paccayavantatādassanatthaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṭaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1573_18: Idha pana dhātūnaṃ anaññasādhāraṇavisesavibhāvanaparāya codanāya aññadhammabhūtaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1573_20: Tathā hi sā nesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti vuccati.
anya-e0103n:1573_21: Saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraudakaṃ viya nhānīyacuṇṇassa sahajātadhammānaṃ saṅgahaṇapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1573_22: Maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1574_7: Sabbepīti te sabbepi kammādivasena uppajjanato catusamuṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n:1574_8: Kesādīnampi hi maṃsato avimuttabhāgo kammāhāracittasamuṭṭhānova hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1575_7: saddena rasapaccupaṭṭhānānaṃ viya mudusaṇhapharusabhāvādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1575_9: nanu kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekattaṃ hoti sādhāraṇattāti? Na,
anya-e0103n:1575_11: aññā utuādisamuṭṭhānā”tiādikaṃ bhedaṃ sandhāya tathā vacanato.
anya-e0103n:1575_16: tasmiṃ vā sati yo vijjamānasseva visadisuppattiyā hetubhāvo,
anya-e0103n:1577_4: mahantāni vā abhūtāni etthāti mahābhūto, māyākāro.
anya-e0103n:1577_6: niruḷho vā ayaṃ tesu mahābhūtasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1577_10: Tattha vañcakatā sayaṃ anīlādisabhāvāni hutvā nīlādisabhāvassa upaṭṭhāpanaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1577_13: bahi ca aṭṭhitānaṃyeva aññamaññaṃ nissāya avaṭṭhānato aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatā.
anya-e0103n:1577_14: Yadi hi imā dhātuyo aññamaññassa anto ṭhitā,
anya-e0103n:1577_19: Evaṃ santepi patiṭṭhānādinā yathāsakaṃ kiccavisesena sesānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upakārikā honti,
anya-e0103n:1577_21: Tenāha “na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1578_0: Mahāparihāratoti ettha vacanatthaṃ vadanto āha “mahantehi…pe… bhūtāni,
anya-e0103n:1579_0: Tathā hīti tato eva vikārassa mahantattā evāti taṃ vikāraṃ dassetuṃ “bhūmito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1579_2: Koṭisatasahassaṃ ekaṃ koṭisatasahassekaṃ cakkavāḷanti taṃ sabbaṃ āṇākhettabhāvena ekaṃ katvā vadati.
anya-e0103n:1579_3: Vilīyatīti vipattikarameghābhivuṭṭhena khārudakena lavaṇaṃ viya vilayaṃ gacchati viddhaṃsati.
anya-e0103n:1580_3: Yathā kaṭṭhamukhena sappena ḍaṭṭho patthaddho hoti,
anya-e0103n:1580_4: evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti,
anya-e0103n:1580_10: kaṭṭhamukhena ḍaṭṭhopi kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho hoti,
anya-e0103n:1580_11: tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hotīti. Vā-
anya-e0103n:1580_14: kaṭṭhamukhena ḍaṭṭho kāyo patthaddho hoti vā,
anya-e0103n:1580_16: pathavīdhātuppakopena pana mantāgadarahito so kāyo kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hoti ekantapatthaddhoti.
anya-e0103n:1581_2: Sañchinnoti samantato chinno paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇo āyasmato upasenattherassa sarīraṃ viya.
anya-e0103n:1581_3: Mahāvikārāni bhūtānīti mahāvikāravantāni bhūtāni mahābhūtānīti purimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n:1581_4: “Pathavī”tiādinā sabbalokassa pākaṭānipi vipallāsaṃ muñcitvā yathāsabhāvato pariggaṇhane mahantena vāyāmena
anya-e0103n:1581_7: “Amahantānī”ti mantvā ṭhitā tesaṃ duppariggahataṃ disvā “aho mahantāni etānī”ti jānātīti mahābhūtekadesatādīhi vā kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0103n:1582_8: Pathavīādayo pana catasso dhātuyo tassa mahābhūtassa ekadesabhūtā “mahābhūtā”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0103n:1582_9: Samudāyesu hi pavattavohārā avayavesupi dissanti yathā “samuddo diṭṭho,
anya-e0103n:1582_11: Mahābhūtasamaññatoti tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavanti ettha upādārūpānīti bhūtāni,
anya-e0103n:1582_13: Sā panāyametāsu bhūtasamaññā anaññatthavuttitāya upādārūpānaṃ aviparītaṭṭhā,
anya-e0103n:1582_15: cakkhusamuddādīnaṃ nissayabhūtā cāti mahantāni bhūtānīti samaññāyiṃsu.
anya-e0103n:1582_22: sāvakānaṃ upādāyupādāya vā sabbesampi bhūtānaṃ sattānaṃ nissayabhūtatāya mahantā bhūtā etesūti mahābhūtā.
anya-e0103n:1582_27: Pathavīādayo ca dhātuyo ekasmimpi attabhāve aparimeyyappabhedā pavattanti.
anya-e0103n:1582_28: Tasmā mahantā bahū anekasatasahassappabhedā bhūtāti mahābhūtā.
anya-e0103n:1584_0: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto, sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacī”ti. –
anya-e0103n:1585_1: So hi ucchinnabhavanettikatāya āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikattā ekantato “bhūto”ti vuccati, na itare,
anya-e0103n:1585_3: Bhūto eva idha pūjāvasena “mahābhūto”ti vutto yathā “mahākhīṇāsavo,
anya-e0103n:1585_5: Imāsañca dhātūnaṃ anādimati saṃsāre pabandhavasena pavattamānānaṃ yathāvuttassa mahābhūtasseva santāne pariyosānappatti, nāññatra.
anya-e0103n:1585_6: Tasmā mahābhūte bhūtā pariyosānaṃ pattāti mahābhūtā purimapade bhūta-
anya-e0103n:1588_1: teneva “dhammā”tipi vuccanti ubhayathāpi nissattanijjīvatāya eva vibhāvanato.
anya-e0103n:1588_5: Arūpānaṃ khaṇato rūpānaṃ khaṇassa nātiittaratāyāha “attano khaṇānurūpa”nti.
anya-e0103n:1589_1: Sahuppannāva etāti etā catasso dhātuyo saha uppannāva saha pavattamānāva samānakāle labbhamānāpi avakaṃsato
anya-e0103n:1589_3: kammajesu jīvitanavaketi ekekasmiṃ suddhaṭṭhakādikalāpepi padesena avinibbhuttā visuṃ visuṃ aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya.
anya-e0103n:1589_4: Yattha hi tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena pathavī,
anya-e0103n:1590_1: Purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā aññamaññanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n:1590_2: Ettha ca nanu pathaviyāpi lahubhāvo atthi.
anya-e0103n:1590_3: Tathā hi sā “kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka”nti niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0103n:1590_6: Garubhāvo eva hi pathavīdhātuyā garutaraṃ upādāya lahubhāvoti pariyāyena vutto sītabhāvo viya tejodhātuyā.
anya-e0103n:1590_8: Ayampi vuttanayā eva lahutākāraṃ upādāya labbhanato.
anya-e0103n:1590_9: Na hi paricchedavikāralakkhaṇāni paramatthato labbhanti nipphannarūpānaṃ avatthāvisesasabhāvato.
anya-e0103n:1590_10: Tasmā paramatthasiddhaṃ garubhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1591_9: “Vuttaviparītappakārā”ti idaṃ bāhirānaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathā sabbaso viññāṇavatthuviññattiindriyānaṃ anissayatā ca iriyāpathaviraho ca vuttavipariyāyo,
anya-e0103n:1591_11: na lakkhaṇarūpassa viya kutocipi samuṭṭhānassa abhāvato utusamuṭṭhānatāya tāsaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1593_1: Tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hotīti yehi mahābhūtehi sampiṇḍanavasena saṅgahitā,
anya-e0103n:1593_4: tesaṃ attanā sahajātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā tato eva sandhāraṇavasena avassayo hoti,
anya-e0103n:1593_5: vuttanayena vā patiṭṭhā hutvā sahajātādivasena paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0103n:1594_1: Yadipi aññamaññaābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti heṭṭhā dhātūnaṃ asamannāhāratā dassitā eva,
anya-e0103n:1594_2: athāpi imināva nayena visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggaho kātabboti dassento “pathavīdhātu cetthā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n:1594_7: Ahaṃ “pathavīdhātū”ti vā “paccayo homī”ti vā na jānātīti attani viya attano kicce ca ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0103n:1594_8: upakārakassa viya upakattabbānampi ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “itarānipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1595_2: “Paccayato”ti hi iminā pathavīādīnaṃ aññāsādhāraṇo patiṭṭhābhāvādinā sesabhūtattayassa paccayabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0103n:1595_3: Idha pana yehi dhammehi pathavīādīnaṃ uppatti,
anya-e0103n:1595_4: tesaṃ pathavīādīnañca anavasesato paccayabhāvavibhāgo vuccatīti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ākārānaṃ viseso.
anya-e0103n:1595_11: tena akammajānampi kesañci kammassa pariyāyapaccayabhāvo dīpito hoti.
anya-e0103n:1595_13: Nanu ca kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ kammato aññenapi paccayena bhavitabbanti?
anya-e0103n:1595_15: so pana kammagatikovāti paṭiyogīnivattanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0103n:1595_21: Vuttaṃ hi “kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0103n:1596_1: Pariyāyato upanissayapaccayo hotīti paṭṭhāne arūpānaṃyeva upanissayapaccayassa āgatattā nippariyāyena rūpadhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayo natthi.
anya-e0103n:1596_2: Sutte pana “puggalaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍaṃ upanissāyā”ti vacanato suttantikapariyāyena vinā abhāvo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1596_3: Cittaṃ janakapaccayo hotīti sahajātanissayāhārādivasena paccayo hontaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhāpakataṃ upādāya “janakapaccayo hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1597_0: Evaṃ kammādīnaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ vasena dhātūsu paccayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ dhātūnampi
anya-e0103n:1597_1: vasena paccayavibhāgaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ tāva “kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādinā uddisitvā puna “tattha
anya-e0103n:1597_3: Tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātūti “kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta”nti ettha sāmaññato vuttā kammajapathavīdhātu.
anya-e0103n:1597_4: Kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsanti kammajānaṃ āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sahuppattiyā attano upakārakānaṃ tāsaṃ upakārakato,
anya-e0103n:1597_7: vigamābhāvato ca sahajātaaññamaññanissayaatthiavigatavasena ceva patiṭṭhāvasena ca paccayo hoti,
anya-e0103n:1597_9: tāsañca na janakavasena paccayo hoti asamuṭṭhāpakattā tāsaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1597_12: pathavīdhātuyā pana anaññasādhāraṇakiccaṃ sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvoti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “patiṭṭhāvasena cā”ti visuṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1597_16: Pathavīdhātuyā patiṭṭhābhāvo nāma sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃyevāti āha “na patiṭṭhāvasenā”ti.
anya-e0103n:1597_19: “Cittasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsa”ntiādīsu sukaro tantinayo netunti “cittaāhāra…pe…
anya-e0103n:1598_3: tadubhayena ca yathāvuttasahajātādipaccayehi pavattamānā dhātuyo iminā visesena pavattantīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0103n:1599_1: Tattha ekaṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca tisso dhātuyo catudhā sampavattanti,
anya-e0103n:1599_2: tisso dhātuyo paṭicca ekāva dhātu catudhā sampavattati,
anya-e0103n:1599_3: dve dhātuyo paṭicca dve dhātuyo chadhā sampavattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n:1599_4: Attho pana pathavīādīsu ekekissā paccayabhāve itarāsaṃ tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayuppannatāti ayameko catukko,
anya-e0103n:1599_5: tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayabhāve itarāya ekekissā paccayuppannatāti ayamaparo catukko,
anya-e0103n:1599_11: dutiyatatiyāti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayabhāve tattha tattha itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayuppannatāti ayameko chakko.
anya-e0103n:1599_13: chadhā ca pavattamānānaṃ ekakadvikatikavasena tikadukaekakavasena ca yathākkamaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n:1599_16: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ paṭiccavāre “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā,
anya-e0103n:1599_18: dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0103n:1600_2: Uppīḷanassa paccayo hoti ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuvasena sijjhanato.
anya-e0103n:1600_5: pathavīdhātuyā ca padhānabhāvanti patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi sātisayakiccattā tassā patiṭṭhāpanassa pādaṭṭhapanassa paccayo hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n:1600_7: Tattha ca garutarasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā sātisayo byāpāroti āha “pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātū”ti.
anya-e0103n:1600_8: Tathā uddhaṅgatikā tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0103n:1600_9: Tiriyaṃ gatikāya vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo gahito.
anya-e0103n:1600_10: Tattha ṭhitaṭṭhānato abhimukhaṃ pādassa haraṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1601_0: Ekekena mukhenāti “patthaṭattā pathavī”tiādinā vibhattesu terasasu ākāresu ekekena dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanamukhena.
anya-e0103n:1602_1: Idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “idañca panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1602_2: Suññataṃ avagāhatīti dhātumattatādassanena rūpakāyassa anattakataṃ vavatthāpayato tadanusārena nāmakāyassāpi
anya-e0103n:1602_3: anattakatā supākaṭā hotīti sabbaso attasuññataṃ pariyogāhati tattha patiṭṭhahati.
anya-e0103n:1602_4: Sattasaññaṃ samugghātetīti tato eva “satto poso itthī puriso”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ ayāthāvasaññaṃ ugghāteti samūhanati.
anya-e0103n:1602_5: Vāḷamigayakkharakkhasādivikappaṃ anāvajjamānoti sasantāne viya parasantānepi dhātumattatāya sudiṭṭhattā khīṇāsavo viya “ime sīhabyagghādayo vāḷamigā,
anya-e0103n:1602_6: ime yakkharakkhasā”ti evamādivikappaṃ akaronto bhayabheravaṃ sahati abhibhavati.
anya-e0103n:1602_10: Mahāpañño ca pana hoti dhātuvasena kāye sammadeva ghanavinibbhogassa karaṇato.
anya-e0103n:1602_11: Tathā hidaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ buddhicaritassa anukūlanti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0103n:1605_2: Sarūpādito hi ñātassa pabhedo vuccamāno suviññeyyo hoti saṅkhepapubbakattā vitthārassa,
anya-e0103n:1605_3: vitthāravidhinā ca saṅkhepavidhi saṅgayhatīti “samādhissa vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1605_4: Atha vā “ko samādhī”tiādināpi samādhisseva pakārabhedo dassīyati,
anya-e0103n:1605_5: bhāvanānisaṃsopi bhāvanānayanissito evāti adhippāyena “vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1605_6: Sabbappakāratoti palibodhupacchedādikassa sabbassa bhāvanāya pubbakiccassa karaṇappakārato ceva sabbakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāvibhāvanato ca.
anya-e0103n:1606_0: “Samattā hotī”ti vatvā tameva samattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “duvidhoyevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1606_2: Dasasu kammaṭṭhānesūti yāni heṭṭhā “upacārāvahānī”ti vuttāni dasa kammaṭṭhānāni, tesu.
anya-e0103n:1606_3: Appanāpubbabhāgacittesūti appanāya pubbabhāgacittesu aṭṭhannaṃ jhānānaṃ pubbabhāgacittuppādesu.
anya-e0103n:1608_4: “ekaggacittā”ti pana padena upacārasamādhinopi gahaṇaṃ hotīti tato nivattanatthaṃ “appanāsamādhibhāvanā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0103n:1608_5: Na kho paneteti ete bāhirakabhāvitā jhānadhammā cittekaggatāmattakarā.
anya-e0103n:1608_6: Ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane “sallekhā”ti na vuccanti kilesānaṃ sallekhanapaṭipadā na hotīti katvā,
anya-e0103n:1609_0: Sambādheti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā saṃkiliṭṭhatāya paramasambādhe ativiya saṅkaṭaṭṭhānabhūte saṃsārappavatte.
anya-e0103n:1609_2: Tassa hi dullabhatāya appanādhigamampi anadhigamayamāno saṃvegabahulo puggalo upacārasamādhimhiyeva ṭhatvā
anya-e0103n:1610_3: tena “iminā pakārena vuttanayā”ti sesābhiññānampi vuttappakāraṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n:1610_4: Sati sati āyataneti purimabhavasiddhe abhiññādhigamassa kāraṇe vijjamāne.
anya-e0103n:1610_10: Dhammassāti bhāvetabbassa ceva vibhāvetabbassa ca dhammassa.
anya-e0103n:1611_0: Taṃ taṃ bhavagamikammaṃ ārabbha bhavapatthanāya anuppannāyapi kammassa katūpacitabhāveneva bhavapatthanākiccaṃ
anya-e0103n:1612_1: udāhu itarāpīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “upacārasamādhibhāvanāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0103n:1613_1: Rūpadhamme pariyāpannā vijjamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā cittassa abhāvena asantasamāva.
anya-e0103n:1613_9: ubhayesaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ ekaṃ katvā evaṃ navā”ti vadanti.
